src_text: Merero ye Bohlokwa Seemong sa Bjale.
tgt_text: Ulawulo lweentlekele emva kwezikhukhula.

src_text: Taolo ya Masetlapelo Morago ga Mafula.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ithi mabalale ngenxeba bonke abantu abaswelekelwe zizihlobo zabo kwezi zikhukhula zakutsha nje zenze umonakalo omkhulu bezithwaxe iindawo ezithile kweli lizwe lethu, ingakumbi kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Kabinete lebišitše mahloko yona go batho ka moka bao ba lobilego bao ba phelago le bona mo mafuleng go setla pelo malobanyana ao wetšego dikarolo tša naga ya gaborena, kudukudu KwaZulu-Natal..     Tsebagatšo ya Maemo Masetlapelo Bosetšhaba gotee le magato kimollo ya ikonomi maphelong batho ao tsebagaditšwego ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa malobanyana mo be nepile go netefatša kgato ye nago le mohola le ya go rulaganywa ka tsela ye maleba go potologa didiko ka moka ka mmušo, ka Senthara ya Bosetšhaba ya Taolo ya Masetlapelo..     R1 bilione ya go tlišwa ke mmušo gare šomišwa go thekga maitekelo kimollo le go boetša seemo sekeng, go bušetša ditirelo tša motheo sekeng le go fana ka thušo ya botho ka sebopego sa dijo, madulo, tlhwekišo le diaparo..     Tshepedišo ya go agaleswa mafelo ao amilwego ke mafula šetše thomile ka ge batho ba naga ya gaborena ba ipopa ngatana ye tee ka maikemišetšo go thuša bao ba lobilego magae le dithoto tša bona.
tgt_text: Ukubhengezwa kweMeko yeNtlekele kwiZwelonke kunye namanyathelo oncedo kwezentlalo nakwezoqoqosho abhengezwe nguMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa, kuneenjongo zokuqinisekisa ukuba kukho intsebenziswano emandla nebambeneyo kuwo onke amaqoqo karhulumente, ngokusebenzisa iZiko leSizwe loLawulo lweeNtlekele.

src_text: Tsebišo ya Seemo sa Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Le mali iyibhiliyoni yeerandi ikhutshwe ngurhulumente iza kusetyenziselwa ukuncedisa kumaphulo oncedo nawohlangulo, ukubuyisela iinkonzo ezisisiseko kunye nokunikezela uncedo olunxulumene nentlalontle yabantu olufana nokutya, amanzi, iindawo zokufihla intloko, ugutyulo kunye neempahla zokunxiba.

src_text: Kabinete hlobaetšwa ke tlhatlogo ya bjale ya diphetelo tša COVID-19 dikarolong tše dingwe tša naga ya gaborena ebile hlohleleditše batho ka moka go latela magato go ihlokomela gore ba itšhireletše kgahlanong le baerase ye ya go iša batho ga maotwanahunyela, kudukudu ka nako ye ya marega.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yokwakha kwakhona iindawo ebezichaphazelekile sele iqalile njengoko abantu belizwe lakuthi bathe bafunquka ngobuninzi babo bafaka isandla kwabo amakhaya abo adilizwe zizikhukhula baze futhi balahlekelwa nazizinto zabo.

src_text: Baerase ye santše le tlhobaboroko yeo tšwelago pele ebile meento sale sebetša sa go ba le mohola kudu sa go itšhireletša.
tgt_text: Ezakutsha malunga nesiFo seNtsholongwana ye-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Kabinete thabišwa ke gore batho ba bantši ba tšea sephetho sa go hlaba meento bjalo ka mekgwa ya bona ya mathomo ya go itšhireletša kgahlanong le COVID-19 morago ga gore dipalopalo tša moragorago di laetše gore re fihleletše phenyo ya go feta seripa sa meento bathong ba bagolo diprofenseng tše tlhano..     Kabinete dira boipiletšo go bao ba sa kago ba hlaba meento go dira bjalo gore ba itšhireletše le go šireletša bao ba phelago le bona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ixhalatyisiwe kukunyuka kwenani labantu abosulelwe yi-COVID-19 kutsha nje kwiindawo ezithile kweli lizwe kwaye ibongoza bonke abantu ukuba bathathe amanyathelo okuzikhusela kule ntsholongwana ingubhubhane, ingakumbi ngeli xesha lasebusika.

src_text: Re swanetše go tšwelapele go obamela magato ka moka thibelo ya COVID-19, go akaretšwa le go apara maseke wa go pipetša nko le molomo, go hlapa matsogo ka meetse le ka sesepe goba ka go šomiša sanithaesa sa diatla sa go tswakwa ka alekhohole ya go feta 70%, le go šielana sekgala sa go bolokega se ka bago mithara tee..     Thušo ya Tšhelete ya Kimollo ya Masetlapelo Leago (SRD).
tgt_text: Le ntsholongwane iseyingxaki kuthi sonke kwaye inye indlela yokuyilwa nokuzikhusela kuyo, kukugonya.

src_text: Kabinete hlohleleditše badudi bao ba amogelago Thušo ya tšhelete ya SRD ya R350 go dira dikgopelo gape morago ga gore go tsebagatšwe melao ye meswa ya go laola dikgopelo le maswanedi go hwetša thušo ye ya tšhelete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukubona abantu abaninzi beqhubeleka besebenzisa amachiza okugonya njengezona zixhobo zokuzikhusela kwi-COVID-19 njengoko iingxelo zakutsha nje zichaza ukuba kumaphondo amahlanu ngabantu abadala abangaphezulu kwe-50% asele begonyiwe.

src_text: Dikgopelo di ka dirwa wepsaeteng ya Etšensi ya Afrika Borwa ya Tšhireletšego ya Leago (SASSA) mo go https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi icela abo bangekagonyi ukuba baye kugonya ukuze bakhusele bona kunye nezihlobo zabo.

src_text: Peakanyo ya dikgopelo butšwe ka la 23 Moranang 2022 ebile ke tshepedišo yeo dirwago ka mokgwa wa titšithale ka moka ga yona go kgontšha gore dikgopelo di dirwe ka bonako..     Thušo ye ya tšhelete ya kimollo ke boikokotlelo bja go bolokega go malapa go ihlokela bao ge nkabe se ka yona ba ka be ba amilwe gampe ke lemena la bohloki le tlhokego ya mešomo.
tgt_text: Kufuneka futhi siqhubeleke nokuthobela imiqathango yokuthintela i-COVID-19, equka ukunxiba isifonyo esigquma impumlo nomlomo, ukuhlamba izandla ngamanzi anesepha okanye ukusebenzisa isibulala-ntsholongwane esine-alkhoholi eyi-70%, kunye nokuqinisekisa ukuba kukho umgama oyimitha enye phakathi kwethu.

src_text: Mmušo ikgafetše go fana ka thušo ya leago go bao ba lego kotsing gore le bona ba kgone go fihlelela dinyakwa tša motheo.
tgt_text: IsiBonelelo sezeNtlalo soNcedo (i-SRD).

src_text: Polokego le Tšhireletšego.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikhuthaza abemi beli abafumana isiBonelelo se-SRD esiyi-R350 ukuba baphinde bafake izicelo kwakhona kulandela ukuqaliswa kwemigaqo emitsha eza kulandelwa xa kuphicothwa izicelo kujongwa ukuba umntu ufanelekile na ukuba afumane esi sibonelelo.

src_text: Kabinete tšwelapele go sola ka bogale dipolao tša go setla pelo tša basadi ebile amogetše magato bonako ka bahlankedi ba phethagatšo ya molao ge ba kgonne go golega bagononelwa ba go amana le lehu la Mohumagatšana Hillary Gardee (28), wa kua Kamagugu gola Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Izicelo kufuneka zifakwe kwiwebhusayithi ye-Arhente yoMzantsi Afrika yeziBonelelo zeNtlalo (i-SASSA) ethi: https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.

src_text: Kabinete sotše gape le polao ya batho ba tshela kua Khayelitsha, Motsekapa.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yokungenisa izicelo yavulwa ngomhla wama-23 kuTshazimpunzi 2022 kwaye yonke iqhutywa ngobuxhaka-xhaka be-intanethi into leyo iza kwenza ukuba ikhawuleze..     Isibonelelo soncedo sibalulekile ukunceda amakhaya angathathi ntweni engethwaxwa kanobom yindlala nentswela-msebenzi ukuba besingekho.

src_text: Dipolao tše tša go setla pelo ke segopotšo go rena sa gore re swanetše go dira tšohle bjalo ka setšhaba go fediša dikgaruru ka kakaretšo le dikgaruru tša go ikala ka bong le polao ya basadi (GBVF)..     Kabinete hlohleleditše batho ka moka ka mo nageng go šomišana le mmušo go lwantšha bosenyi le GBVF.
tgt_text: Urhulumente uzimisele ukunikezela ngezibonelelo kubantu abangathathi ntweni ukuba bakwazi ukufumana izinto ezisisiseko zokuziphilisa..     Ukhuselo nokhuseleko.

src_text: Re le mmogo re ka netefatša gore setšhaba sa gaborena le mebila bolokegile bathong ka moka, go akaretšwa batšofadi, basadi le bana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyaqhubeleka nokugxeka kabukhali umkhuba wokubulawa kwamabhinqa ngolunya kwaye iyawubulela umsebenzi owenziwe ngamagosa olwaphulo-mthetho athe abamba ngokukhawuleza abarhanelwa abakrokrelwa ngokubulala uNksz Hillary Gardee (obeneminyaka engama-28 ubudala), waKamagugu eMpumalanga.

src_text: Ikonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyakugxeka kunye nokubulawa kwabantu abathandathu eKhayelitsha.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše pulo ya semmušo ya fabriki ya go foroma ditena ya Corobrik Kwastina gola Driefontein profenseng ya Gauteng ka Mopresidente Ramaphosa ka Laboraro, 4 Mopitlo.
tgt_text: Lo mkhuba wokubulawa kwabantu ngolunya usikhumbuza ukuba kusekuninzi ekufuneka sikwenzile sisisizwe ukulwa ubundlobongela ngokubanzi kunye nobo busekelwe kwisini kunye nokubulawa kwamanina (i-GBVF).

src_text: Faporiki ye ye tšwago pele ka theknolotši ya sebjalebjale bopa karolo ya dipeeletšo tša R800 milione, tša go gata ka mošito tee le dipeeletšo tše dingwe gape tša go lekana R200 milione tšeo go lebeletšwego gore di tla oketša mešomo ya tšweletšo ya lekgwara ka Corobrik gola KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoza bonke abantu elizweni ukuba basebenzisane norhulumente kwidabi lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho ne-GBVF.

src_text: Corobrik ke ye nngwe ya dikgwebo tše mmalwa tšeo di phethagaditšego kgoeletšo ya Mopresidente Ramaphosa dikgwebong tša Afrika Borwa le tša boditšhabatšhaba go beeletša ikonoming ye.
tgt_text: Xa sibambisene singaqinisekisa ukuba bakhuselekile abantu kunye neendawo abahlala kuzo, abo bantu baquka abantu abadala, amanina kunye nabantwana..     Ezoqoqosho.

src_text: Kabinete lemogile gore ikonomi ye fokolago ya haedrotšene tsošološitšwe ge Anglo American tsebagatša lori ya go sepela ka haedrotšene.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuvulwa ngokusesikweni komzi-mveliso wokwenza izitena wakwa-Kwastina Corobrik ose-Driefontein e-Gauteng nguMongameli Ramaphosa ngoLwesithathu, umhla wesi-4 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Lori ye yeo go dirilwego diphetogo go yona gore sepele ka haedrotšene go tšwa go disele, le go sepela gape ka dipeteri tša mohuta wa lithium-ion ke ya mathomothomo lefaseng.
tgt_text: Lo mzi-mveliso wale mihla uyinxalenye yotyalo-mali oluxabisa izigidi zeerandi ezingama-800, oluhambisana nolunye lwezigidi zeerandi ezingama-200 ezibekelwe ukwandisa umzi-mveliso wakwa-Corobrik oKwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Ikonomi ya haedrotšene hlaotšwe bjalo ka yeo tlago pele ga tšohle godimo ga ikonomi ya naga ya borena ya go ikala ka tlhago, le go sepetša kgolo ya ikonomi le tlhomo ya mešomo..     Kabinete amogetše dipeeletšo tše dingwe ka gare ga ikonomi ya gaborena ka khamphani ya dijo ya Ireland ya go bitšwa The Kerry Group, yeo butšego polante ye mpsha ya go bitša R650 milione kua Hammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natal yeo nepilego go tšweletša dijo tša go swarelela nako ye telele kontinenteng.
tgt_text: U-Corobrik yenye yeenkampani eziliqela zeli ezithe zasabela ikhwelo elahlatywa nguMongameli Ramaphosa kwinkampani zoMzantsi Afrika nezehlabathi ukuba zityale imali kuqoqosho lweli lizwe..     IKhabhinethi ithethile nangomba wecandelo lehaydrojini elikhulayo elithe lahlutshezwa nayiloli ehamba ngehaydrojini yakwa-Anglo American.

src_text: Polante ye ke ya moswananoši ka baka la gore thekga mekgwa ye mmalwa ya go swarelela lebaka le le telele go akaretšwa didirišwa tša tšhomišo ya fase ya enetši, go fehlwa ga mohlagase ka seetša sa letšatši go fokotša tirišo ya mohlagase go tšwa go tšweletšo ya mohlagase ya ka mo nageng, tšhomišo ya phišo ge go fišwa dilahlwa go fehla mohlagase, le mekgwa ya go šoma gabotse ya go ageletša meetse, go šomiša seswa le go fokotša tšhomišo ya ona.
tgt_text: Le loli – ebikade ihamba ngedizili yaza yatshintshwa yayesebenzisa ihaydrojini futhi isebenzisa neebhetri ze-lithium-ion – yeyokuqala elolu hlobo ehlabathini.

src_text: Khamphani ye ya Kerry Group fihlile ka mo Afrika Borwa ka 2011, le gona dipeeletšo tša yona tšeo di tšwelago pele ke sešupo sa gore Afrika Borwa santše le naga ya boikgethelo dipeeletšong.
tgt_text: Icandelo lehaydrojini lityuntywe njengalamanye abalulekileyo ekufuneka akhokeliswe phambili kuqoqosho lweli olungenabungozi kokusingqongileyo, kunye nokukhokela kumaphulo okukhulisa uqoqosho nawokudala imisebenzi..     IKhabhinethi iphinde yalubulela notyalo-mali olwenziwe yinkampani yase-Ireland, i-Kerry Group, evule umzi-mveliso oxabisa imali ezizigidi zeerandi ezingama-650 e-Hammersdale, kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal, inkampani leyo iza kuvelisela eli lizwekazi ukutya ngendlela engazikwenza monakalo kokusingqongileyo.

src_text: Dipeeletšo tše di gata mohlaleng wa tsebagatšo ya bene yeo dirilwego ka mo nageng ya Isuzu D-Max gola Gqeberha kua Kapa Bohlabela kgwedi ya go feta.
tgt_text: Lo mzi-mveliso ufana wodwa kuba usebenzisa iintlobo zobuxhaka-xhaka obungenzi monakalo kokusingqongileyo obuquka izixhobo ezingatyi mbane kakhulu, ukuvelisa umbane ngemitha yelanga ukuze ungatyi kakhulu umbane oveliswa liziko lombane leli, ukuvelisa amandla okuzifudumeza kusetyenziswa inkunkuma, ukuqokelelwa, ukusetyenziswa kwakhona kunye nokuphungulwa kwamanzi asetyenziswayo ngendlela ehlakaniphileyo.

src_text: Mohuta wo moswa wa D-MAX ke seka sa go rweša kgare maikgafo Isuzu ka mo Afrika Borwa ebile ke ye nngwe ya dikatlego tšeo di fihleletšwego ka fase ga Lenaneotlhabollo la Tšweletšo ya Difatanaga (APDP).
tgt_text: Le nkampani yakwa-Kerry Group yaqala ukusebenza eMzantsi Afrika ngowama-2011, futhi ukutyala kwayo enye imali kubonakalisa ukuba uMzantsi Afrika lilizwe elithandwayo ngabatyali-mali.

src_text: Lenaneo la APDP ke setlamo sa tlhohleletšo ya botšweletši intastering ya dikoloi leo nepokgolo ya lona lego go hlohleletša palo ya godimo ya dikoloi tšeo di tšweletšwago mo intastering ya difatanaga yeo go boletšwego ka yona, go tlhohleletša boleng bja tlaleletšo lefapheng la intasteri ya dikoloi gore go hlongwe mešomo go potologa makala le dikgwebokamano ka moka tša difatanaga.
tgt_text: La maphulo otyalo-mali alandela kanye emva kokuba kuveliswe i-bakkie eluhlobo lwe-Isuzu D-Max eGqebera eMpuma Koloni kule nyanga iphelileyo.

src_text: Go tla dirwa tšhelete ya go balelwa R2,8 bilione go Makala le dikgwebokamano tša tšweletšo ya ka mo nageng ka magatotatelano APDP.
tgt_text: Olu hlobo lutsha lwebakkie luyi-D-MAX lubonisa phandle ukuba abakwa-Isuzu bazimisele ukuzinza eMzantsi Afrika kwaye luyeminye yemisebenzi emihle ezelwe yiNkqubo yokuPhuhlisa iMizi-mveliso yeziThuthi (i-APDP).

src_text: Dipeeletšo tše di tla hloma mešomo ya thwi ya go feta ye 1 000 polanteng le go thwala ka tsela ya go rarela batho ba go lekana 24 000 gomme se se tla thuša kudu go kaonafatša setšhaba mo seleteng se..     Indaba ya tša Meepo.
tgt_text: I-APDP sisibonelelo secandelo lezithuthi esenzelwe ukunyusa umthamo wezithuthi eziveliswayo , into leyo eza kukhwezela necandelo leentsimbi zeemoto ngolo hlobo kudaleke imisebenzi kuwo onke amashishini achaphazelekayo kwicandelo lezithuthi.

src_text: Tiragalo ya Indaba ya Meepo ya Afrika ya 2022 yeo bego swaretšwe kua Sentharengkgoparara ya Boditšhabatšhaba gola Motsekapa go thoma ka la 9 go fihla ka la 12 Mopitlo 2022 ke ye nngwe ya difala tše kgolokgolo tša dikopano le tša kgwerano magareng ga bakgathatema ka moka intastering ya meepo.
tgt_text: Imali eqikelelwa kwiibhiliyoni zeerandi eziyi-2,8 iza kwenziwa kumashishini avelisa iintsimbi zeemoto alapha ekhaya ngoku isaqhubeka ukusebenza i-APDP.

src_text: Morero wa tiragalo ye ke wo: “Mpshafatšo ya Meepo ka mo Afrika: Go Beeletša ka gare ga Diphetogo tša Enetši, ESG, le Diikonomi”.
tgt_text: Olu tyalo-mali luza kudala imisebenzi engaphezulu kwe-1 000 eza kuvela ngqo kulo mzi-mveliso luze ludale neminye engama-24 000 kwamanye amacandelo asebenzisana neli, into leyo iza kuphelisa intsokolo kubantu balo mmandla.

src_text: Kabinete nale tshepho ya gore Indaba ye ya Meepo tla thuša go laetša le go hlohleletša Afrika Borwa go ba naga ya boikgethelo dipeeletšong.
Afrika Borwa amogela dipeeletšo tšeo di dirilwego ka mo nageng ya gaborena ebile ikgafetše go hlola maemo go kgontšha phethagalo ya kgolo ye akaretšago ya ikonomi le diphetogo ikonoming.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela yezeMigodi.

src_text: Dikamano tša Boditšhabtšhaba le tša Dilete.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela yokuTyala iMali kwezeMigodi e-Afrika yowama-2022 ibibanjelwe kwiZiko laseKapa leNgqungquthela zeHlabathi ukususela ngomhla wesi-9 ukuya kowe-12 kuCanzibe 2022, yenye yeendibano ezinkulu yokudibana nokusebenzisana phakathi kwawo onke amahlakani akwicandelo lemigodi.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše Kopano ya malobanyana mo ya Mopresidente Ramaphosa ge be kopana le Mopresidente Joe Biden wa Amerika, Mopresidente Emmanuel Macron wa Fora le Mopresidente Hakainde Hichilema wa Zambia difaleng tša go fapafapana.
tgt_text: Umxholo wale ngqungquthela ubusithi: “Ukutshintsha kweMigodi e-Afrika: Ukutyala imali kwiMithombo eMitsha yaMandla, i-ESG kunye noQoqosho”.

src_text: Dikopano tše di kgontšhitše Mopresidente go matlafatša dikamano tša magareng ga dinaga magareng ga Afrika Borwa le mebušo ya dinaga tšeo gweranego le tšona mererong ye bohlokwa ya dilete le ya boditšhabatšhaba, go karetšwa le go tla ka tharollo ya go rena moya wa khutšo dithulanong tša Ukraine     Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekile ukuba le Ngqungquthela yezeMigodi iza kubonisa futhi ithengise noMzantsi Afrika njengelizwe eliphambili elinamathuba otyalo-mali.

src_text: Diboutu tša Tekanyetšokabo.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uyawamkela amaphulo otyalo-mali eza kweli kwaye uyathembisa ukuba uza kudala iimeko ezifanelekileyo eziza kukhuthaza uhlumo oluza kuxhanyulwa ngumntu wonke kunye neenguqu kuqoqosho lweli lizwe..     Ubudlelwane namazwe ehlabathi nawengingqi.

src_text: Kabinete dira boipiletšo go badudi ka moka go šala morago Diboutu tša go fapafapana tša Tekanyetšokabo tša go tla ka dikgoro tša mmušo tša bosetšhaba le ka Kantoro ya Mopresidente gore ba tle ba kgone go netefatša gore mmušo wa ikarabela diphethong tša ona..     Ka nako ya Diboutu tša Tekanyetšokabo, dikgoro ka moka di fana ka tlhalošo ye tseneletšego ya dithulaganyo tša ona le ka mananeo ao beilwego pele ngwaga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyalwamkela uqhakamshelwano uMongameli Ramaphosa abenalo noMongameli Joe Biden wase-United States, uMongameli Emmanuel Macron wase-France kunye noMongameli Hakainde Hichilema wase-Zambia esebenzisa amaqonga awahlukeneyo.

src_text: Diboutu tša Tekanyetšokabo di nepile go netefatša gore dikhwama tša mmušo di šomišwa ka pabalelo gore di tle di kgone go fihlelela dinyakwa tša batho setšhabeng..     Diboutu tše tša Tekanyetšokabo di fana gape le ka monyetla wo mobotse go Ditona gore ba kgone go hlatholla goya pele mošomo wa mmušo, go akaretšwa le dikatlego le ditlhotlo..     Phethagatšo ya Leanopeakanyo la Gase ya Petroleamo yeo Fetošeditšwego Diela (LPG).
tgt_text: Olu qhakamshelwano lunike uMongameli ithuba lokuqinisa ubudlelwane nentsebenziswano phakathi koMzantsi Afrika nala mazwe angamahlakani wawo kwimiba engundoqo etya le ngingqi nehlabathi, equka ukusombulula ungquzulwano oluse-Ukraine     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go hlongwa ga Phethagatšo ya Leanopeakanyo la LPG, leo le phatlaladitšwego ka Hlakola.
tgt_text: IiVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali.

src_text: Leanopeakanyo le le nepile go oketša intasteri ya LPG ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlaba ikhwelo kubo bonke abemi beli ukuba bamamele iintetho zeVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali lwamasebe esizwe karhulumente kunye nolwe-Ofisi kaMongameli ukuze bakwazi ukuqinisekisa ukuba urhulumente bambeke phantsi kweliso ngenene..     Ngethuba kuqhutywa ezi ntetho zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali, onke amasebe aza kunika iinkcukacha ezigcweleyo ngezicwangciso zawo kunye nezinto aza kuzikhokelisa phambili kulo nyaka.

src_text: LPG tla ba le mohola wo mogolo go fetošafetoša methopo ya enetši..     Leanopeakanyo le, magareng ga magatotharollo mangwe, le tla laola go bewa ga ditheko magatong dikgwebokamano le go thekga bohlami bja disilintere tša LPG ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: IiNtetho zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali zenzelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuba imali yombuso isetyenziswa ngobunono kwizinto ezifunwa luluntu.

src_text: Le tla thuša gape go ruta batho setšhabeng ka mehola ya go šomiša LPG bjalo ka mokgwa wo mongwe wa enetši..     Leanopeakanyo le le tla thoma go hwetšagala morago ga ge le phatlaladitšwe ke Kgoro ya Methopo ya Diminirale le Enetši mo go www.dmr.gov.za.
tgt_text: Zikwanika ithuba nabaPhathiswa ukuba bacacise ngokupheleleyo umsebenzi karhulumente, kuquka izinto ezenziwe ngempumelelo kunye nezo ziseyimingeni.

src_text: Tlhako ye Logetšwego Maano ya Bosetšhaba ka Temošo ya Ditokelo tša bao ba Phelago ka Bogole – Kwalakwatšo ya Masolo Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole.
tgt_text: IsiCwangciso-qhinga sokuZisa iRhasi Elulwelo (i-LPG).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Tlhako ye Logetšwego Maano ya Bosetšhaba godimo ga Temošo ya Ditokelo tša Digole – Go Hloma Masolo Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba siqalise ukusebenza isiCwangciso-qhinga sokuZisa i-LPG, esasipapashwe ngenyanga yoKwindla yowama-2022 ukuba uluntu luhlomle kuso.

src_text: Tlhako ye nepile go fa tlhahlo go bobedi mafapha praebete le setšhaba go netefatša gore ditokelo tša batho ba go phela ka bogole di šireletšwa, goya le ka fao di hlalošitšwego ka gare ga Molaotheo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sineenjongo zokwandisa icandelo le-LPG kweli lizwe.

I-LPG iza kunceda kakhulu kwiphulo lokuqinisekisa ukuba sineentlobo ezahlukeneyo zamandla..     Esi sicwangciso-qhinga siza kubeka imithetho eza kulawula ukubekwa kwamaxabiso kumashishini akweli candelo size sixhase nokuveliswa kwamagadlela e-LPG kweli lizwe, phakathi kwezinye izinto.

src_text: Tlhako ye fana ka setlabakelo seo se tla thušago go fediša mapheko semorafe ge go tšewa diphetho, kudukudu diphetho tša go amana le batho ba go phela ka bogole thuša gape le ka go lemoša batho ba go phela ka bogole go tseba ditokelo tša bona goya le ka fao di šireleditšwego ke Molaotheo.
tgt_text: Siza kufundisa noluntu malunga nezinto eziluncedo ngokusebenzisa i-LPG njengolunye uhlobo lwamandla.

src_text: Tlhako ye fana le ka tlhahlo, dipego tša babegaditaba le go lemoša batho setšhabeng ka ditokelo tša batho ba go phela ka bogole kgontšha Sengwalwa sa Makgoraditsela ka Ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka bogole.
tgt_text: Siza kufumaneka emva kokuba sipapashiwe liSebe leMithombo yeziMbiwa naMandla ku: www.dmr.gov.za.

src_text: Afrika Borwa ke ye nngwe ya dinaga tša go tsenela Kwanokgoparara ya Ditšhabakopano (UN) ka ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole le Tshepedišo ya UN Kwanong ya Afrika ka Ditokelo tša Botho le Ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole (Tshepedišo ya Afrika ya Ditokelo tša Digole).
tgt_text: IsiCwangciso-qhinga seSizwe esiQiqisisiweyo samaPhulo okuFundisa ngamaLungelo okuKhubazeka Abantu abaKhubazekileyo.

src_text: Tlhako ye rerišanwe le bakgathatema ka moka, go akaretšwa le Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Bašomi le Tlhabollo ya Bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isiCwangciso-qhinga seSizwe esiQiqisisiweyo samaPhulo okuFundisa ngamaLungelo okuKhubazeka Abantu abaKhubazekileyo.

src_text: Samiti ya Tsamaišo ya Naga le Pušetšo ya Naga Mafelong Dinagaborekwa.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sineenjongo zokusebenza njengesikhokelo sokunceda icandelo labucala kunye norhulumente ukuba aqinisekise ukuba akhuselekile amalungelo abantu abakhubazekileyo, njengoko noMgaqo-siseko weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-1996 usitsho.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga Samiti ya Tsamaišo ya Naga le Pušetšo ya Naga  Mafelong Dinagaborekwa ka Labohlano, 27 le ka Mokibelo, 28 Mopitlo 2022 gola Gauteng.
tgt_text: Esi scwangciso-qhinga sisixhobo esiza kunceda xa kuguzulwa imiqobo ecalulayo xa kuthathwa izigqibo, ingakumbi ngokumayelana nabantu abakhubazekileyo.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše Pego ya Maikemišetšo ka Tsamaišo ya Naga le Pušetšo ya Naga Mafelong Dinagaborekwa ka Hlakola.
tgt_text: Senzelwe kwanokufundisa abantu abakhubazekileyo ngamalungelo wabo akuMgaqo-siseko.

src_text: Kabinete file tlhahlo ya gore ditherišano tša goya pele di swarwe gotee le bakgathatema ba maleba.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sikwanceda nangoqeqesho, indlela amajelo eendaba anika iingxelo ngazo kunye nokufundisa uluntu ngamalungelo abantu abakhubazekileyo.

src_text: Samiti ye tla ba tatelano le pheletšo ya mošomo wo dirilwego ngwageng wa go feta, fao dikgopolo tša bakgathatema ba go fapafapana di tla akaretšwago     Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.
tgt_text: Sikwazalisekisa izithembiso ezikwiPhepha eliCacisa uMgaqo-nkqubo wamaLungelo Abantu abaKhubazekileyo.

src_text: Khonferense ya Bohlano ya Lefase ka Bophara ya Phedišo ya Tšhomišo ya Bana Bokgoba.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika lelinye lamazwe atyikitya isiVumelwano seZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UN) samaLungelo Abantu Abakhubazekileyo kunye nesiVumelwano se-UN soXwebhu lwase-Afrika lwamaLungelo oLuntu nawaBantu abaKhubazekileyo (isiVumelwano samaLungelo Abantu abaKhubazekileyo e-Afrika).

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla swara Khonferense ya Bohlano ya Lefase ka Bophara ya Phedišo ya Tšhomišo ya Bana Bokgoba kua Sentharengkgoparara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Durban gola KwaZulu-Natal go thoma ka Lamorena, 15 go fihla ka Labohlano, 20 Mopitlo.
tgt_text: Onke amahlakani afanelekileyo ebelinikiwe ithuba lokuhlomla kwesi sicwangciso-qhinga, kuquka neBhunga leSizwe loPhuhliso lezoQoqosho nezaBasebenzi (i-Nedlac).

src_text: Ke lekga la mathomothomo Mokgatlo wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Bašomi (ILO) swara khonferense ye ka mo Afrika..     Baetapele ba mebušo, ditona tše 120, baemedi ba seboka sa boraro ba dinaga tše 187 tše lego maloko ILO, dietšensi tša UN, ditheo tša thuto, mekgatlo yeo thomilwego setšhabeng, babegaditaba le mekgatlo setšhabeng go letetšwe gore be gona khonferenseng ye.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela yoLawulo loMhlaba namaLungelo oMhlaba kwiiNdawo zoLuntu.

src_text: Tiragalo ye tla fa Afrika Borwa monyetla wa go hlagiša Molaotheo wa naga ye ka ge šireletša ditokelo tša bana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba kubanjwe iNgqungquthela yoLawulo loMhlaba kunye namaLungelo oMhlaba kwiiNdawo zoLuntu ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-27 nangoMgqibelo, umhla wama-28 kuCanzibe 2022 e-Gauteng.

src_text: Naga ye tla kopana le dinaga tša go fapafapana tšeo di lego pejana ga rena go fedišwa tšhomišo ya bana bjalo ka makgoba le go ithuta go tšwa go bona..     Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Mmotlolo wa Tlhabollo ya Dilete (DDM).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilamkele iPhepha elinoLuvo ngoLawulo loMhlaba kunye namaLungelo oMhlaba kwiiNdawo zoLuntu ngeyoKwindla.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla swara Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya DDM gola  Mpumalanga ka Labohlano, 20 Mopitlo 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Ga go tlogelwe motho morago”.
tgt_text: Iye yalela ukuba kufuneka usasazwe kumahlakani afanelekileyo ukuba nawo alihle amahlongwane.

src_text: Bjalo ka sefala se bohlokwa sa kgathotema setšhabeng, Imbizo ye dumelela Mopresidente go kgokagana thwi le bakgathatema ba go fapafapana – kudukudu baduding ba dinagamagae – le go theeletša dillo le ditlhotlo tša bona ka nepo ya go di rarolla.
tgt_text: Le ngqungquthela iza kwenzeka ngenxa yomsebenzi owenziwa kulo nyaka uphelileyo, obuquka ukufuna izimvo zamahlakani awahlukeneyo     Imisitho Ezayo.

src_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya DDM nepile gape le go tloša tseleng mapheko go šitiša kabo ya mohlakanelwa ya ditirelo le go hlohleletša kgathotema setšhabeng ka go tsamaišana le DDM.
tgt_text: INkomfa yesiHlanu yokuLwa ukuSetyenziswa kwaBantwana.

src_text: MaAfrika Borwa ba ka šala morago le go kgatha tema ditherišanong tša dikgokagano tša leago ka fase ga hashtag #PresidentialImbizo.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kusingatha iNkomfa yesiHlanu yokuLwa ukuSetyenziswa kwaBantwana e-Durban International Convention Centre kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natala ngeCawe, umhla we-15 ukuya ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-20 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika.
tgt_text: Kokokuqala uMbutho wezaBasebenzi weHlabathi (i-ILO) ubamba le nkomfa e-Afrika..     INtloko zamazwe, abaphathiswa abali-120, amahlakani angunxantathu amazwe ali-187 angamalungu e-ILO, ii-arhente ze-UN, amaziko emfundo ephakamileyo, imibutho yoluntu, imibutho engekho phantsi korhulumente, amajelo eendaba kunye noluntu kulindeleke ukuba azimase le nkomfa..

src_text: Meketeko ya ngwaga ka ngwaga ya Kgwedi ya Afrika ka Laboraro, 25 Mopitlo gare ya ketekwa ka fase ga morero wo: “Ngwaga wa Phepho: Go tiišeletšwa phepho le tšhireletšego ya dijo kontinenteng ya Afrika”..     Bjalo ka karolo ya ponelopele ya lebaka le le telele yeo theilwego ka gare ga Lenaneothero la 2063 (leo lego seakanywa sa Afrika sa tlhabollo go fihlelela tlhabollo ye akaretšago le ya go tšea nako ye telele go hlabolla seemo sa ikonomi maphelong mo mengwageng ye 50 ye tlago), morero šeditše mabokgoni batho ba Afrika go lebeletšwe kudu basadi, batšwamahlalagading le bana.
tgt_text: Lo msitho uza kunika uMzantsi Afrika ithuba lokuba uqhayise ngoMgaqo-siseko wawo okhusela amalungelo abantwana.

src_text: Se se bohlokwa tlhabollong ka ge se tliša maphelo ao kaonafetšego go motho mang le mang, letseno leo le hlatlogetšego godimo le meputso yeo kaonafetšego ya dinaga.
tgt_text: Eli lizwe liza kubamba iingxoxo namazwe ahlukeneyo asele ehambe umgama omde kwidabi lokulwa ukuqeshwa kwabantwana njengabasebenzi lize lifunde kuwo.

src_text: Tiragalo ya go itshwanetša le noši ya meketeko ya Kgwedi ya Afrika ke Beke ya Afrika ya Dikgokagano, yeo tlo swarelwago kua Constitutional Hill gola Johannesburg go thoma ka la 23 go fihla ka la 27 Mopitlo.
tgt_text: Imbizo kaMongameli yeNkqubo yoPhuhliso lweziThili (i-DDM).
UMongameli Ramaphonsa uza kubamba Imbizo kaMongameli ye-DDM eMpumalanga ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-20 kuCanzibe 2022 phantsi komxholo othi: “Masingashiyi namnye ngasemva”.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika ke monyetla wa go hlohleletša botee bja Afrika le momaganyo ye tseneletšego ya dilete tša yona, le go ikgafa ka leswa katlegong ye swanago ya Afrika.
tgt_text: Njengokuba le iyindibano ebalulekileyo enika uluntu ithuba lokuthatha inxaxheba, le Mbizo iza kunika uMongameli ithuba lokuba athethe ngqo namahlakani ahlukeneyo – ingakumbi abantu basemaphandleni – aze amamele imiba kunye nemingeni ngeenjongo zokuza nezisombululo.

src_text: Kabinete gopotša motho mang le mang gore kgahlego ya rena ya bosetšhaba ke monwana le lenala le tielelo ya Afrika, botee le katlego     Melaetša.
tgt_text: Imbizo kaMongameli ye-DDM yenzelwe ukususa imiqobo ethintela ukuhanjiswa kweenkonzo ngendlela ehlangeneyo kunye nokukhuthaza uluntu ukuba luthathe inxaxheba njengoko i-DDM isitsho.

src_text: Mahloko     Kabinetee lebiša mahloko yona go malapa le bagwera ba: Mme Phindile Xaba (53), yo bilego le mošomo wo motelele wa go hlomphega intastering ya babegaditaba, ka mo Afrika Borwa le ka mošate šomile bošego le mosegare go kaonafatša naga ya gaborena.
tgt_text: Abemi boMzantsi Afrika bangazilandela iingxoxo futhi bathathe nenxaxheba kuzo kumakhasi oluntu onxibelelwano phantsi kwesihloko esithi: #PresidentialImbizo..     INyanga ye-Afrika.

src_text: Motseta Silumko Sokupa (74), yo hlanketšego Etšensi ya Tšhireletšego ya Mmušo maemong go fapafapana mo mošomong wa gagwe wa go tšea nako ye telele le wa go hlomphega Ditirelong tša Mmušo.Moprofesara Francis Wilson (83), raikonomi wa go tsebega kudu le mothomi wa Yuniti ya Bašomi ya Borwa bja Afrika le ya Tlhabollo ya Dinyakišišo     Bao ba Thwetšwego Mešomong Batho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona dithuto tlo netefatšwa le go tiišeletšwa ka tsela ye maleba.
tgt_text: Ukubhiyozelwa minyaka le kweNyanga ye-Afrika noSuku lwe-Afrika oluza kuba ngoLwesithathu, umhla wama-25 kuCanzibe kuza kuqhutywa phantsi komxholo othi: “UNyaka weSondlo: Ukuqinisa ukunyamezela kwesondlo nokuqinisekisa ukuba kukho ukutya okwaneleyo kwilizwekazi le-Afrika”.

src_text: Ngaka Kesavan Naidoo bjalo ka Motlatša Molaodipharephare (DDG): Tlhabollo ya Setheo kua Kgorong ya Tirišano ya Makala Mmušo (DCoG).
tgt_text: Njengenxalenye yombono wale minyaka izayo njengoko uchaziwe ku-Ajenda 2063 (esisikhokelo sophuhliso lwe-Afrika esifuna ukuba kubekho uphuhliso oluzinzileyo loqoqosho nentlalo kule minyaka ingama-50 izayo), lo mxholo ugxininisa kwizakhono zabantu base-Afrika ikakhulu amanina, abantu abasaqala ukufikisa kunye nabantwana.

src_text: Ntate Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomuka bjalo ka DDG: Thekgo ya Pušoselegae le Taolo ya Magato kua DCoG..     Ntate Risimati Patrick Mathye bjalo ka DDG: Taolo ya Ditirelo tša Meetse le Tlhwekišo kua Kgorong ya Meetse le Tlhwekišo (DWS)..     Ntate Collin Xolani Zwane bjalo ka DDG: Taolo, Kobamelo le Phethagatšo kua DWS.
tgt_text: Oku kubalulekile kuphuhliso njengoko kuza kukhokelela ekubeni kuphucuke ubomi babantu, bafumane imivuzo ephezulu futhi namazwe abe nengeniso engcono.

src_text: Ntate Melanchton Makobe bjalo ka DDG: Kgonthišišo ya Pušo ya SOC le Bodiragatši kua Kgorong ya Dikgwebo tša Mmušo     Kabinete dumelelane le Ditona ka dithwalo tšeo di latelago:.
tgt_text: Umsitho omkhulu oza kukhapha imibhiyozo yale Nyanga ye-Afrika yiVeki ye-Afrika yoNxibelelwano, eza kubanjelwa e-Constitutional Hill eRhawutini ukususela ngomhla wama-23 ukuya kowama-27 kuCanzibe..     INyanga ye-Afrika inika ithuba lokuba sikhuthaze umanyano lwama-Afrika kunye nentsebenziswano emandla kule ngingqi kunye nokuzibophelela kwe-Afrika ukuba iza kusengela thungeni linye.

src_text: Ntate Bhekuyise Mathews Khenisa bjalo ka Mohlankediphethišimogolwane (CEO) wa Etšensi ya Tlhabollo ya Dintlo (HDA).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifuna ukukhumbuza wonke umuntu ukuba izinto ezibalulekileyo nezilulutho zeli lizwe zixhomekeke kuzinzo, umanyano kunye nenkqubela ye-Afrika iphela     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Mme Joy Keledi Masemola bjalo ka Mohlankedimogolwane wa Ditšhelete (COO) wa HAD.
tgt_text: Amazwi ovelwanoIKhabhinethi ithumela amazwi ovelwano  kusapho nezihlobo zika:Nksz Phindile Xaba (obeneminyaka engama-53) obengumakhwekhwetha owasebenza iminyaka emininzi kumajelo eendaba, eMzantsi Afrika nakwihlabathi liphela.

src_text: Ngaka Cornelius Ruiters bjalo ka CEO ya Lepelle Northern Water.
tgt_text: Ebesebenza ngokuzinikela encedisa kumalinge okuphucula izwe lakuthi.Nozakuzaku uSilumko Sokupha (obeneminyaka engama-74), osebenzele ii-Arhente yoKhuseleko lweLizwe (i-SSA) kwizikhundla ezahlukeneyo ngethuba esebenzela uRhulumente iminyaka emininzi.Njng Francis Wilson (obeneminyaka engama-83), usoqoqosho ebengumpondo-zihlanjiwe kunye nengqanga eyaseka icandelo i-Southern Africa Labour and Development Research Unit     IzikhundlaZonke izikhundla zixhomekeke ekuqinisekisweni kwamabakala ezemfundo kunye nokuqinisekiswa okufanelekileyo kwezokhuselo.

src_text: Matsapa go Boetša Seemo Sekeng le go Aga ka Leswa Morago ga Mafula.
tgt_text: Amalinge okuhlangula nokwakha ngokutsha emva kwezikhukhula.

src_text: Kabinete retile le go thabela batho ka moka le mekgatlo ge tsentšhitše letsogo mo matsapeng go boetša seemo sekeng le go aga ka leswa morago ga mafula moragorago go setla pelo dikarolong tše dingwe tša naga, kudukudu gola KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibulela futhi ibamba ngazibini kubo bonke abantu kunye nemibutho ethatha inxaxheba kumalinge ohlangulo nokwakha ngokutsha emva kwezikhukhula zakutsha nje ezenze umonakalo omkhulu kwiindawo ezithile zezwe lakuthi, ingakumbi kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Kabinete lebogile gape le mekgatlo ye sego ya mmušo, mekgatlo ya sedumedi, setšhaba ka kakaretšo, bengdikgwebo le mekgatlo ya go imolla batho maima bona yeo abetšego batho dijo, diaparo, mapai, diphuthelwana tša mengatana ya lehlapo, diyunifomo tša dikolo go malapa ao wetšwego ke masetlapelo gore ba kgone go fihlelela dinyakwa tša bona tša motheo.
tgt_text: Iye futhi yabulela nayo yonke imibutho engekho phantsi kukarhulumente (ii-NGO), imibutho yezenkolo, uluntu, oosomashishini kunye nemibutho yoncedo ethe yabonelela iintsapho ebezingamaxhoba ezikhukhula ngokutya, iimpahla, iingubo kunye nezinye izinto eziluncedo ukuze ezi ntsapho zikwazi ukuqhawulisa izinto ezincinci zemihla ngemihla..     Iziko leSizwe loLawulo lweeNtlekele liyaqhubeleka nokukhokela amaphulo adibanisa onke amaqoqo karhulumente okunikezela ngoncedo lwezentlalonte kuwo onke amakhaya achaphazelekileyo.

src_text: Senthara ya Bosetšhaba ya Taolo ya Masetlapelo tla kopantšha didiko ka moka tša mmušo mo matsapeng yona go fana ka kimollo ya moya wa botho malapeng ka moka ao amilwego ke mafula.
tgt_text: Abantu abangaphezulu kwama-7 000 abaphuma kwizithili ezine ezithwaxwe ngamandla zaKwaZulu-Natal babonelelwe ngeendawo zokufihla iintloko.

src_text: Ditirelo tša go abela batho madulo di gare di abelwa batho ba go feta 7 000 mo dileteng tšeo di amilwego go se lekane le selo gola KwaZulu-Natal..     Mošomo šetše thomile go aga madulo lebakanyana malapa go angwa ke mafula mo nageng ye lego ya mmušo ye hlaotšwego gola KwaZulu-Natal ka kgonagalo ya gore malapa a ka šuthišetšwa fao.
tgt_text: Sele uqalile umsebenzi wokwakhela amakhaya achaphazelekileyo izindlu zethutyana kumhlaba wombuso ofunyenwe kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Kabinete tiišeleditše maikgafo mmušo go laola dikhwama tša kimollo ya masetlapelo ka šedi ye kgolo le ka go se fihle selo.
tgt_text: La makhaya asenokufuduselwa kwezi ndawo.

src_text: Mohlakišipharephare wa Afrika Borwa fana ka ditirelo tša tlaleletšo tša go bea seemo leihlo le go lebiša dikhwama dinyakweng tše dingwe ka go tsamaišana le peakanyo ya tekanyetšo ya mmušo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yakubethelela ukuzinikela kukarhulumente ekulawuleni ngobunono nangendlela eselubala imali yokunceda kwizikhukhula.

src_text: Tsebišo ya Seemo sa Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: UMphicothi-zincwadi-Jikelele woMzantsi Afrika lelinye lamaqumrhu aza kubeka iliso kwindlela eza kusetyenziswa ngayo le mali kwaye le mali ixulwe ngokwemigaqo karhulumente yokuhlahla nokwaba imali.

src_text: Kabinete hlohleleditše batho ka moka mo Afrika Afrika go tšea magato tlhokomelo go efoga go phatlalala ga COVID-19 morago ga gore dipalopalo tša moragorago di laetše tlhatlogo ye bonagalago ya kelo ya diphetelo le malwetši go amana le sehla sa marega ka mo nageng..     Kabinete re gopoditše ka moka ga rena go tšwelapele go ihlokomela le go hlokomela ba bangwe ka go hlapa matsogo rena goba go sanithaesa kgafetšakgafetša, go apara dimaseke ge re le ka gare ga meago, go šielana sekgala sa go bolokega, go bula mafastere gore go hlabele moya le go hlaba meento.
tgt_text: Eza kutsha nje ngesiFo seNtsholongwane i-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Meento santše le boiphemelo bjo bo kaonekaone kgahlanong le COVID-19 ka ge thibela malwetši šoro, go amogelwa maokelong le go efoga mahu go hlolwa ke COVID-.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoza bonke abantu eMzantsi Afrika ukuba bazikhusele ukuze bathintele ukunwenwa kwe-COVID-19 emva kokuba iingxelo zakutsha nje zibonakalisa ukuba kweli lizwe lenyuke kakhulu inani labantu abosulelwe yile ntsholongwane kunye nabo banezifo ezinxulumene nexesha lasebusika..     IKhabhinethi isikhumbuzile ukuba masiqhubeleke sizikhusele thina buqu kunye nabanye abantu ngokuthi sihlambe izandla ngesepha okanye ngesibulala-ntsholongwane rhoqo, sinxibe izifonyo xa singaphakathi kwizakhiwo, singasondelelani nabanye abantu, sivule iifestile ukuze kubethe umoya endlini size sigonye..     Ukugonya isesesona sixhobo sinaso sokulwa i-COVID-19 njengoko kuthintela ukugula kakhulu, ukulaliswa esibhedlela kunye nokubulawa yile ntsholongwane.

src_text: Ga go hlokege aterese ya mo dulago pele ka entelwa.
tgt_text: Akunyanzelekanga ukuba ube nendawo ohlala kuyo enedilesi esesikweni ukuze ugonye.

src_text: Motho mang le mang, wa go ba le pasa goba sena yona ka hlaba moento ntle le tefo mafelong bohle go hlaba meento go potologa naga ka bophara.
tgt_text: Nabani na, futhi nokuba akanayo incwadi-sazisi, angagonywa simahla kumaziko okugonya karhulumente akho kulo lonke eli lizwe..     Phantsi ngobuhlanga!.

src_text: Semorafe se fele!.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izigxibhe kabukhala izenzo zobuhlanga kweli lizwe, eziquka iziganeko ezisematheni sithetha nje, e-Good Hope Seminary High School nakwiDyunivesiti yase-Stellenbosch eNtshona Koloni.

src_text: Kabinete sotše ka bogale ditiragalo ka moka tša semorafe ka mo nageng, go akaretšwa le ditiragalo tšeo di begilwego Sekolong seo se Phagamego sa Good Hope Seminary le Yunibesithing ya Stellenbosch gola Kapa Bodikela.
tgt_text: Lo mkhuba mbi unxamnye nemimiselo yomgaqo-siseko eli lizwe lethu lilawulwa ngentando yesininzi elasekelwa phezu kwayo, equka isidima somntu, ukungacaluli ngobuhlanga, ukungacaluli ngesini, ubulungisa entlalweni, ulingwano kunye nentlonipho..     UMgaqo-siseko weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-1996 nguwo osisikhokelo esisisebenzisayo ukusiphula neengcambu iyantlukwano engakhiyo kunye nezenzo ezingenabulungisa zangaphambili.

src_text: Ditiragalo tše tša mahlabišadihlong di thulana le metheo ya Molaotheo yeo naga ya rena ya temokrasi ithekgilego ka yona, yeo akaretšago seriti sa botho, go se kgetholle ka semorafe, go se kgetholle ka bong, tekatekano le tlhomphano..     Molaotheo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa 1996 ke ona re hlahlago gore re fediše ditiragalo tšeo di tšwago kua morago tša go se hlamatsege tšeo di dirago gore re se be ngatana ye tee le tšeo di abelanago ka toka ka go se swane.
tgt_text: Abazali bayacelwa ukuba bafundise abantwana babo ukuba babukhabe ubuhlanga, bamkele iintlanga ezahlukeneyo zeli, njengenxalenye yephulo lokwakha isizwe nokukhuthaza ukuhlalisana ngoxolo.

src_text: Batswadi ba hlohleletšwa go ruta bana go ganetša semorafe le go thabela ditšo tša go fapafapana, bjalo ka karolo ya lesolo la rena la mohlakanelwa la go hlohleletša kago ya setšhaba le phedišano setšhabeng re šomeng mmogo go bea nyanyeng semorafe nako le nako ge se se thoma go ba setlwaedi sa ka mehla le go romela molaetša wo bogale wa gore semorafe ga sena bodulo ka mo nageng ya gaborena ya temokrasi..     Dikamano tša Afrika Borwa le Germany.
tgt_text: Masisebenzisane sibhentsise imikhuba yobuhlanga naphina apho buthathwa njengento eqhelekileyo ngolo hlobo sitsho phandle ukuba ubuhlanga abamkelekanga kwaphela kweli lizwe lethu lilawulwa ngentando yesininzi.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše ketelo ye atlegilego ya semmušo ka Mokhanseliri wa Rephabliki ya Germany, Mohlomphegimogolo Olaf Scholz, go tla ka mo Afrika Borwa ka Labobedi, 24 Mopitlo.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano phakathi koMzantsi Afrika ne-Germany.

IKhabhinethi iyalwamkela uTyelelo lwasebuRhulumenteni olube yimpumelelo lweNgqonyela ye-Federal Republic of Germany, oHloniphekileyo u-Olaf Scholz, eMzantsi Afrika ngomhla wama-24 kuCanzibe..     Olu Tyelelo lwasebuRhulumenteni lweNgqonyela u-Scholz lwenziwe emva kokuba uMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa wathi wamema le Ngqonyela, futhi noqhuba iphulo lokuqinisa amatyathanga obudlelwano amazwe engingqi nawehlabathi nawokutsala utyalo-mali olufunwa ngabomvu kweli.

src_text: Ketelo ye ya Semmušo ka Mokhanseliri Scholz ebile gona ka baka la taletšo ya go tšwa go Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa yo eteletšego pele seboka sa go kgontšha dikamano tše botse tša dilete le tša boditšhabatšhaba, gotee le go goka dipeeletšo tšeo di hlokagalago kudu.
tgt_text: Ezi nkokeli zimbini zigwadle iindlela zokuqinisa ubudlelwane kumacandelo afana nelezamandla kunye noguqu-guquko lwemozulu, urhwebo notyalo-mali kunye namacebo okulwa i-COVID-19 kunye nokwanda kwabantu abadinga ichiza lokugonya, phakathi kwezinye izinto.

src_text: Baetapele ba bababedi ba boletše ka, magareng ga tše dingwe, mekgwa ya go thoma tirišano magorong go swana le enetši le phetogo ya klaemete, kgwebišano le dipeeletšo, le magato kgahlanong le COVID-19 le nyakego ya meento.
tgt_text: Iingxoxo zabo ziquke nezinye izinto ezingundaba-mlonyeni kweli lizwekazi le-Afrika nakwihlabathi liphela, kuquka ungquzulwano olwenzeka e-Ukraine kwakunye nomonakalo oluwenzayo kuqoqosho lwehlabathi kunye nokutya namandla..     I-Germany ayilolizwe likwindawo yesibini ngobukhulu njengehlakani lezorhwebelwano nje kuphela koko likwakwindawo yesithathu ngokwamanani abakhenkethi abangena kweli, likwalilizwe eliphambili kwezotyalo-mali nehlakani eliluncedo kwezophuhliso.

src_text: Baetapele ba ba ile ba lebeledišiša kgatelopele ye lego gona kontinenteng ya Afrika le maemong boditšhatšhaba, go akaretšwa le dithulano nageng ya Ukraine le ditlamorago tša gona go lebeletšwe ikonomi ya boditšhatšhaba le tšhireletšego ya dijo le ya enetši..     Germany se fela mogwebišani wa bobedi wo mogologolo wa Afrika Borwa, eupša ke gape mothopo wa boraro wo mogologolo wa baeti ba moše mmeeletši wo mogolo le mogwebišani go tša tlhabollo..     Khonferense ya Bohlano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Phedišo ya Tšhomišo ya Bana Bokgoba.
tgt_text: INkomfa yeHlabathi yesiHlanu yokuLwa ukuSetyenziswa kwaBantwana.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše thumo ye atlegilego ya Khonferense ya Bohlano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Phedišo ya Tšhomišo ya Bana Bokgoba yeo bego swaretšwe gola Durban go thoma ka la 15 go fihla ka la 20 Mopitlo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyakwamkela ukuqukunjelwa ngempumelelo kweNkomfa yeHlabathi yesiHlanu yokuLwa ukuSetyenziswa kwaBantwana ebibanjelwe eThekwini ukususela ngomhla we-15 ukuya kowama-20 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Bakgathatema go tšwa lefaseng ka bophara ba bile gona khonferenseng ye, yeo bego swerwe ka tšhomišano le Mokgatlo wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Bašomi..     Morago ga go rerišana ka ditlwaedi tše botse tše phethagaditšwego ke dinaga tša go fapafapana le go hlaola mabošaedi le magato ka pelapela ao nyakegago go akgofiša phedišo ya bobedi tšhomišo ya bana bokgoba le ya dikgoka, bakgathatema khonfereseng ye ba kwanetše morero wo ‘Boipiletšo bja Durban bja go Tšea Magato’ go swaragana le lemena la tšhomišo ya bana bokgoba.
tgt_text: Amahlakani aphuma bombo zone zehlabathi azimase le nkomfa, ibibanjwe ngentsebenziswano noMbutho weHlabathi wezaBasebenzi (i-ILO).

src_text: Tšhomišo ya bana bokgoba ke ye nngwe ya go laetša bohlogo bjo bo ka dirwago ke setšhaba ebile išeletša bana maemong kotsi.
tgt_text: Emva kokuba kuxoxwe iindlela ezifanelekileyo ezisetyenziswa ngamazwe ahlukeneyo kunye nokubona iindawo ezinezikroba ezifuna kuthathwe amanyathelo akhawulezileyo afunekayo ukuze ipheliswe ngokukhawuleza le ngxaki yokusetyenziswa kwabantwana kunye nokusetyenziswa kwabantu ngenkani, kuye kwamkelwa umgaqo othi ‘Durban Call to Action’ okulwa le ngxaki yokusetyenziswa kwabantwana..     Ukusetyenziswa kwabantwana ngumkhuba ombi kakhulu kwaye kubabeka emngciphekweni abantwana.

src_text: Tšhomišo ya bana bokgoba ka boyona ke tlaišo ebile thibela bana go hwetša thuto ye maleba le menyetla ye mengwe ya go ba hlabolla.
tgt_text: Ukwenza oku kukuxhaphaza abantwana kwaye kubenza bangakwazi ukuya esikolweni futhi baxhamle namanye amathuba okuziphuhlisa.

src_text: Ngwana wo mongwe le wo mongwe ka mo Afrika Borwa nale tokelo yeo ka se ganetšwego ke motho ya gore šireletšege kgahlanong le ditlwaedi tša go jabetša tša go šomišwa bokgoba.
tgt_text: Wonke umntwana eMzantsi Afrika unelungelo elingenakuthathwa mntu lokuba akhuselwe ekubeni lixhoba lokuxhatshazwa ngokusetyenziswa..     Ilungelo lokufumana imfundo esisiseko likuMgaqo-siseko kwaye ngokoMthetho weziKolo zoMzantsi Afrika, wowe-1996 (uMthetho uNombl 84 wowe-1996), “wonke umzali makavumele wonke umfundi ophantsi kwakhe ukuba aye esikolweni ngosuku lokuqala lokuvulwa kwezikolo xa eneminyaka esixhenxe ubudala ade abe neminyaka eli-15 ubudala okanye afikelele kwibanga lesithoba, nokuba yeyiphi efike kuqala kwezi”..     NgokoMthetho waBantwana, wowe-2005 (uMthetho uNombl 38 wowe-2005), “akukho mntu uvumelekileyo ukuba asebenzise, afune uncedo, anike okanye aqeshe umntwana njengomsebenzi”     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Tokelo ya go hwetša thuto ya motheo gona ka gare ga Molaotheo wa rena ebile goya le ka Molao wa Dikolo wa Afrika Borwa, 1996 (Molao 84 wa 1996), “motswadi mang le mang swanetše go gapeletša morutwana ofe goba ofe yo lego ka fase ga taolo ya gagwe go ya sekolong go tloga ka letšatši la mathomothomo la go bulwa ga dikolo ngwageng wo go fihlela ge morutwana wo fihlelela mengwaga ye šupa goba mphato wa bosenyane, goya le ka gore go tlile efe pele”..     Goya ka Molao wa Bana, 2005 (Molao 38 wa 2005), “ga gona motho yo dumeletšwego go šomiša, go bapatša, go nea goba go thwala ngwana goba go mo diriša mo mešomong bjalo ka mo mešomong ya tšhomišo ya bana bokgoba”     Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: Ukuvuma ukutyikitya isiVumelwano seHlabathi sokuKhusela Bonke Abantu Ukuba baNyanyalaliswe ngeNkani (i-ICPPED).

src_text: Kwanelo ya Kwano ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka go Šireletšwa ga Batho ka Moka Kgahlanong le go Nyameletšwa ka Dikgoka ke Maphodisa (ICPPED).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba kungeniswe ePalamente i-ICPPED ukuze kuqwalaselwe umba wokuvuma koMzantsi Afria ukutyikitya esi sivumelwano.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo ya ICPPED Palamenteng go lebeledišišwa le go dumelelwa go šomišwa ga kwano ye ke Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: I-ICPPED sisivumelwano esibophelela amazwe ehlabathi seZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UN) nesimalunga nokunyhashwa kwamalungelo abantu ngokuba banyanyalaliswe ngenkani.

src_text: Kwano ye ke tumelelano yeo tlemago gohlegohle ya Ditšhabakopano (UN) yeo swaraganego le go gatakwa ga ditokelo tša botho ka go nyameletšwa ga batho ka dikgoka ke maphodisa..     Kwano ye hlaloša go nyameletšwa ga batho ka dikgoka ke maphodisa go akaretša go tšhabišwa, go golegwa, go swarwa goba mokgwa ofe goba ofe wo pheletšo ya ona ka dirago gore mosolwa latole go dumela goba gona go uta fao motšwasehlabelo lego gona..     Ge šetše dumetše gore kwano ye tsenywe melaong ya rena ya ka mo nageng, Afrika Borwa go tla letelwa gore begele UN mengwaga ye mengwe le ye mengwe ye mebedi ka fao phethagatšago seo se dumeletšwego kwanong ye.
tgt_text: Esi sivumelwano sikuchaza ukunyanyalaliswa komntu ngenkani, njengokuxhilwa, ukubanjwa, ukuvalelwa okanye nawaphi na amanyathelo anokukhokelela ekubeni umenzi wobubi angavumi ukuba uyalazi apho likhoyo ixhoba okanye ayifihle le ndawo likuyo.

src_text: Kwano ye fana ka magato thibelo ao dinaga tšeo di lego maloko kwano ye di swanetšego go hloma go efoga go nyameletšwa ga batho ka dikgoka ke maphodisa dinageng tša bona tša go fapafapana..     Pego ya Bone ya Naga ya Afrika Borwa ka Tšhireletšo le Tlhohleletšo ya Ditokelo tša Botho.
tgt_text: Sakuba esi sivumelwano sivunyiwe ukuba sibe yinxalenye yemithetho yeli, uMzantsi Afrika uza kulindeleka ukuba unike ingxelo kwi-UN rhoqo emva kweminyaka emibini ngendlela oqinisekisa ngayo ukuba esi sivumelwano siyasebenza.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo ya Pego ya Bone ya Naga ye ka Tšhireletšo le Tlhohleletšo ya Ditokelo tša Botho go Khansele ya Ditokelo tša Botho ya Ditšhabakopano.
tgt_text: Esi sivumelwano sicacisa amanyathelo ekufuneka amazwe awutyikityileyo awalandele ukuthintela ukunyanyalaliswa ngenkani kwabantu kumazwe wabo..     INgxelo yeLizwe yesine yokuKhuselwa nokuLwelwa kwamaLungelo oLuntu yoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Bafetleki ba UN ba Gohlegohle le ba Kgafetšakgafetša ba tla fetleka pego ye ge ngwaga ela go fela.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba kungeniswe iNgxelo yeLizwe yesine yokuKhuselwa nokuLwelwa kwamaLungelo oLuntu kwiBhunga lamaLungelo oLuntu leZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UNHRC).

src_text: Go tloga mola bago naga ye kwanetšego ya Kwano ya UN ya Ditokelo tša Botho, Afrika Borwa sekasekilwe makga mararo, ebile tshekatsheko ya mafelelo dirilwe ka Lewedi..     Pego ye fana ka seemo sa ditšhišinyo tše 187 tše amogetšwego go tšwa tshepetšong ya diphetleko tša ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: I-UN Universal Periodic Review iza kuhlaziya le ngxelo ekupheleni kwalo nyaka.

src_text: Dikgopolo di hweditšwe go tšwa go tshedimošo yeo kgonthišišitšwego, tshedimošo go tšwa go dikgoro tše maleba, Ditheo tša go Thekga Molaotheo le mekgatlo ye maleba ya go tšwa setšhabeng..     Kabinete thabišitšwe ke kgatelopele ye fihleletšwego phethagatšong ya ditšhišinyo tše le fao mošomo sa tšwelago pele gona.
tgt_text: Oko watyikitya isiVumelwano samaLungelo oLuntu se-UN, uMzantsi Afrika sele uphononongwe izihlandlo ezithathu.

src_text: Pego ye tla dirwa phatlalatša morago ga ge hlagišeditšwe UN ka Phato.
tgt_text: Wagqibela ukuphononongwa ngenyanga yoMsintsi ngowama-..

src_text: Pholisi ya  2022 ya Taolo ya Meetse Meepo.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo inika iinkcukacha ngomsebenzi osele wenziwe malunga nezindululo ezivunyiweyo ezili-187 zophononongo lowama-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Pholisi ya 2022 ya Taolo ya Meetse Meepo gore phethagatšwe.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha zithatywathwe kulwazi oluqinisekisiwe, amasebe karhulumente afanelekileyo, amaziko axhasa ulawulo lwentando yesininzi kunye nemibutho yoluntu efanelekileyo.

src_text: Pholisi ye fana ka mekgwa le magato go šireletša le go babalela tšhomišo ya meetse.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yonelisekile ngumsebenzi osele wenziwe mayelana nezi zindululo kwakunye nazezo ndawana zisaphethweyo.

src_text: Yona lekalekanya ditiragalo tša ikonomi tša meepo ka taelo ya go kgontšha tšhomišo ye swarelelago ya meetse ka mo nageng ya gaborena.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo iza kupapashwa esidlangalaleni emva kokuba ingeniswe kwi-UN ngenyanga yeThupha kowama-.

src_text: Godimo ga magato mangwe, pholisi ye hlatholla mehola le maikarabelo ka gare ga didiko tše tharo tša mmušo mabapi le merero ya go amana le meetse ka meepong.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo wowama-2022 wokuLawulwa kwaManzi eMigodi.

src_text: Diphetogo tšeo di šišintšwego di tla rarolla ditlhotlo tša go thoma go hloma melao ya go iletša bao ba hlolago tšhilafalo le go dira gore go be moroba go gapeletša molawana wa gore mang le mang yo hlolago tšhilafalo rwešwe maikarabelo go phošolla goba go bušetša morago.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwuvumile uMgaqo-nkqubo wowama-2022 wokuLawulwa kwaManzi eMigodi ukuba uqalise ukusetyenziswa.

src_text: Pholisi ye hlamilwe ka go tsamaišana le Molao wa Bosetšhaba wa Meetse, 1998 (Molao 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucacisa amacebo okukhusela nokonga amanzi.

src_text: Pego ka Tlhako ya Thulaganyo ye Hlamilwego goya ka Bong, Bolekanyetši, Phetleko ya Mošomo le Botlhakiši.
tgt_text: Uqinisekisa ukuba imisebenzi yemigodi yezoqoqosho iyahambelana nephulo leli lizwe elikhuthaza ukusetyenziswa kwamanzi ngobunono.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše pego ya mošomo wo dirilwego godimo ga phethagatšo ya Tlhako ya Thulaganyo ye Hlamilwego goya ka Bong, Bolekanyetši, Phetleko ya Mošomo le Botlhakiši.
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezinye izinto, lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucacise indima kunye noxanduva lwala maqoqo mathathu karhulumente ngokumayelana nomba wamanzi emigodini.

src_text: Kabinete thabetše kgatelopele ye kgolo ye fihleletšwego ke bontši bja dikgoro tša mmušo go hloma ditheong tša tšona tlhako ye yeo sale amogelwa ka 2019 gore phethagatšwe..     Ga sale go tloga fao, dikgoro tše ntši di thomile go hloma dinyakwa tše bohlokwa tša pholisi ye go hlahla mananeo thupetšo ao nepišitšwego basading, go baswa le bathong ba go phela ka bogolofadi.
tgt_text: Ezi zilungiso zicetywayo ziza kusombulula iingxaki ezinxulumene nezohlwayo ezinikwa abo bangcolisa amanzi futhi ziza kwenza kube lula ukunyanzelisa ukuba kuhanjwe ngalo mgaqo uthi iqumrhu elingcolisileyo malibhatale.

src_text: Kabinete dirile gape le boipiletšo bja tekolo ya mošomo le dipego tše tiišeleditšwego letsogo, kudukudu go tše dingwe tša dikgoro tšeo go fihla gabjale di sa kago tša fa dipego.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uyahambelana noMthetho waManzi eSizwe, wowe-1998 (uMthetho uNombl 36 wowe-1998).

src_text: Dipoledišano tša Baswa go Hlompha Nelson Mandela (NMYD).
tgt_text: INgxelo ngesiCwangciso-sikhokelo soCwangciso, uHlahlo-mali, uHlolo, uVavanyo kunye noPhicotho oluSekelwe kwiSini.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše NMYD go kgatlampana ngwaga ka ngwaga go thoma ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifumene ingxelo malunga nomsebenzi osele wenziwe malunga nokuqaliswa kwesiCwangciso-sikhokelo soCwangciso, uHlahlo-mali, uHlolo, uVavanyo kunye noPhicotho oluSekelwe kwiSini.

src_text: NMYD ya pulamadibogo tla swarwa go thoma ka la 7 go fihla ka la 20 Mosegamanye.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyawuncoma umsebenzi osele wenziwe ngamasebe karhulumente awahlukeneyo okusebenzisa esi sicwangciso-sikhokelo samkelwa ngowama-2019 ukuba siqaliswe ukusetyenziswa, njengenxalenye yezikhokelo zawo.

src_text: Le ke lesolo la Mopresidente go nea baswa ba Kontinente ye monyetla wa go tsenela dipoledišano tše di ba agago mererong ye ba amago kudu..     Dipoledišano tše, tšeo di tla bego di bolela ka senatla sa rena sa boditšhabatšhaba bago Mopresidente wa Maloba Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – di tla thoma ka dipoledišano tše ka maikemišetšo go ruta batho ka go itlwaetša boetapele bja  potego mo Afrika.
tgt_text: Amasebe amaninzi sele eqalise imigaqo-nkqubo eza kuba neenkqubo ezingundoqo eziza kugxila kumanina, ulutsha kunye nabantu abakhubazekileyo.

src_text: Dipoledišano tše di tla nea baswa monyetla wa go nyetlela ba bangwe ka bohwa bjo humilego bja ditšo tša bona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi imemelele ukuba kubekwe iinkqubo ezingqingqwa zokuhlola nokunika iingxelo, ingakumbi kwamanye amasebe la angekaniki zingxelo..     INgxoxo zoLutsha zika-Nelson Mandela (i-NMYD).

src_text: Lesolo le le tla tiišeletša le dikamano tša magareng ga batho go lebeletšwe baswa ba kontinente ye.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyivumile i-NMYD eza kubanjwa rhoqo ngonyaka.

src_text: Kgoro ya Basadi, Baswa le Batho ba go Phela ka Bogolofadi tla fana ka dintlha ka botlalo tša lenaneo le ditiragalo tšeo di tla bago gona ka moragonyana.
tgt_text: I-NMYD yokuqala iza kubanjwa ngomhla wesi-7 ukuya kowama-20 kweyeKhala.

src_text: Pego ya 2021/22 ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya go Bewa Leihlo ga Bodiragatši ka Matlafatšo ya Basadi le Tekatekano ya Bong, Tlhabollo ya Baswa le Tlhohleletšo ya Ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka Bogolofadi.
tgt_text: Eli liphulo likaMongameli lokunika ulutsha lweli Lizwekazi ithuba lokubamba iingxoxo ezakhayo ngemiba echaphazela lona..     Ezi ngxoxo – eziza kusekelwa kwimbalasane yeli ehlonitshwa kwihlabathi jikelele uMongameli wangaphambili uNelson Rolihlahla Mandela – ziza kuqala iingxoxo-mpikiswano eziza kukhuthaza ukubaluleka kweenkokeli ezinyanesekileyo e-Afrika..     Ziza kunika abantu abatsha ithuba lokuba bafundisane ngeenkcubeko zabo ezahlukeneyo nezityebileyo.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše pego ya ngwaga ka ngwaga ya go bewa leihlo ga bodiragatši go lebeletšwe pego ya 2021/22 ya go matlafatšwa ga basadi, baswa le batho ba go phela ka bogolofadi.
tgt_text: Eli linge liza kukhuthaza nobudlelwano obushushu phakathi kwabantu abatsha beli lizwekazi.

src_text: Pego ye latišiša mohlala wa ditaetšo tše bohlokwa tša tlhohleletšo ya tekatekano, maemo mešomo, taolo le go kgatha tema ga dihlopha tše tša batho ka gare ga ditiragalo tša dikgoro le makalakgwebo go laolwa ke mmušo.
tgt_text: ISebe lamaNina, uLutsha naBantu abaKhubazekileyo liza kunika iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngenkqubo yalo msitho apha ekuhambeni kwexesha..     INgxelo yoNyaka wama-2021/22 yokuHlola uMsebenzi wokuXhotyiswa kwamaNina noLingwano ngokweSini, uPhuhliso loLutsha nokuLwelwa kwamaLungelo Abantu abaKhubazekileyo.

src_text: Pego ye ngwadilwe ka go bapetšwa le tlhako ya bolekanyetši bjo bo hlamilwego goya ka bong, phetleko ya mošomo le botlhakiši yeo amogetšwego ke Kabinete ka     Melaokakanywa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifumene ingxelo yonyaka wama-2021/22 yokuhlola umsebenzi wokuxhotyiswa kwamanina nolingwano ngokwesini, uphuhliso lolutsha nokulwelwa kwamalungelo abantu abakhubazekileyo.

src_text: Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa Maphelo le Polokego ya tša Meepo.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo inyathela imiba ephambili emalunga nokukhuthazwa kolingwano, umgangatho wengqesho kunye nobunini kunye nokuthatha inxaxheba kwaba bakhankanyiweyo kwimisebenzi yamasebe kunye namaqumrhu karhulumente..

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ga Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa Maphelo le Polokego ya tša Maphelo gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ibhalwe kusetyenziswa isicwangciso-sikhokelo socwangciso, uhlahlo-mali, uhlolo, uvavanyo kunye nophicotho olusekelwe kwisini esamkelwa yiKhabhinethi ngowama-     ImiThetho eYilwayo.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo šetšane le go kaonafatša maphelo le polokego ya bašomedi ba meepo, go akaretšwa le tikologo yeo go yona ditiragalo tša meepo di phethagalago.
tgt_text: UMthetho-sihlomelo oYilwayo weMpilo noKhuseleko eMgodini.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo fetoša Molao wa bjale wa Maphelo le Polokego ya tša Meepo, 1996 (Molao 29 wa 1996).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba uMthetho-sihlomelo oYilwayo weMpilo noKhuseleko eMgodini upapashwe ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di fetekilwego magareng ga tše dingwe, di fana ka tlhathollo ya mangwe mareo ka Molaong wo, di tiišeletša tlhako ya taolo ya tša maphelo le polokego le go di bapiša le ditlwaedi tše kaonekaone tša boditšhabatšhaba mabapi le polokego meepong.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo ufuna ukuphucula impilo nokhuseleko lwabasebenzi-mgodini, kuquka nezi ndawo kwembiwa kuzo izimbiwa.

src_text: Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa Molaotheo wa bo-18 wa.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo wenza izilungiso kulo Mthetho ukhoyo weMpilo noKhuseleko eMgodini, wowe-1996 (uMthetho uNombl 29 wowe-1996).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše phatlalatšo ya Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2022 wa bo-18 wa Molaotheo gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona le gape gore Tona ya Toka le Tshokollo ya Bagolegwa, Morena Ronald Lamola kgone go fana ka tsebišo ye nago le dintlha ka botlalo tša diphetošo tšeo di šišinywago Molaotheong..     Molaokakanywa wo fetoša Karolo 6(1) ya Molaotheo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa 1996, wo bolelago gore maleme semmušo 11 Afrika Borwa ke Sepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, siSwati, Tshivenḓa, Xitsonga, Afrikaans, English, isiNdebele, isiXhosa le isiZulu..     Diphetošo tše di tla dira gore Polelo ka Diatla ya Afrika Borwa (SASL) lemogwe bjalo ka polelo ya semmušo ya bo-12 ya naga ye ebile tla iša pele kamogelo ya yona ya setšo le go netefatša ditokelo tša go lekalekana go MaAfrika Borwa ka moka, go sa kgathale bogolofadi bja bona.
tgt_text: Ezi zilungiso zitsha zinika ingcaciso malunga nesigama esithile salo Mthetho, zenza ngqingqwa imithetho elawula impilo nokhuseleko zize ziwenze uhambelane nemithetho yehlabathi elawula impilo nokhuseleko emigodini, phakathi kwezinye izinto.

src_text: Kgoro ya Thuto ya Motheo šetše lemoga SASL bjalo ka polelo ya letswele     Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.
Beke ya Tšhireletšo ya Bana.
tgt_text: UMthetho oYilwayo wowama-2022 wokuHlonyelwa okweShumi elinesiBhozo koMgaqo-siseko.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla keteka Beke ya Bosetšhaba ya Tšhireletšo ya Bana go thoma ka la 29 Mopitlo go fihla ka la 4 Phupu 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “A re šireletšeng Bana nakong ye ya COVID-19 le go fetela pele”..     Mo gare ga beke, šedi ya moswananoši tla lebišwa godimo ga tlhobaboroko ya bosetšhaba ya go ima ga ditšwamahlalagading, yeo hlatlogetšego godimo nakong ya COVID-19 ka ditšwamahlagading bao ba beleilego masea ka..     Kabinete dirile boipiletšo bja mohlakanelwa go tšwa go batswadi, mekgatlo ye lego setšhabeng, dihlopha tša sedumedi le setšhaba ka kakaretšo gore be ngatana ye tee go thuša go fokotša tlhatlogo ya go ima ga ditšwamahlalagading.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa koMthetho oYilwayo wowama-2022 wokuHlonyelwa okweShumi elinesiBhozo koMgaqo-siseko ukuze uluntu luhlomle nokuba uMphathiswa wezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko, uMnu Ronald Lamola, akhuphe isaziso esineenkcukacha ngesi silungiso sifuna ukwenziwa kuMgaqo-siseko.

src_text: Foramo ya Bolefase ya Ikonomi (WEF).
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo wenza izilungiso kwiCandelo 6(1) loMgaqo-siseko weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-1996, elibhengeza ngokusesikweni ukuba iilwimi ezisemthethweni ezili-11 zoMzantsi Afrika zezi: Sepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, Siswati, Tshivenda, Xitsonga, isiBhulu, isiNgesi, isiNdebele, isiXhosa kunye nesiZulu.

src_text: Afrika Borwa kgatha tema go WEF gola Davos-Klosters, Switzerland go thoma ka la 22 go fihla ka la 26 Mopitlo 2022, ka fase ga morero wo: “Re šoma mmogo, go bušetša potego sekeng”..     Afrika Borwa hlompha monyetla wa go ba karolo ya tharollo le go nyetlela naga tše dingwe maitemogelo rena foramong ya bolefase.
tgt_text: Ezi zilungiso ziza kubeka uLwimi lweZandla loMzantsi Afrika (i-SASL) njengolwimi olusemthethweni lwe-12 kweli lizwe kwaye ziza kucacisa igalelo lwalo njengenxalenye yenkcubeko futhi zibethelele namalungelo alinganayo kubo bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrika, kuquka nabo bakhubazekileyo.

src_text: Go ba gona ga naga ya rena kua WEF go bohlokwa go godiša seriti sa rena bjalo ka naga ya dipeeletšo lefaseng ka bophara, ka go nyetlela lefase ka bophara ponelopele ya bokamoso le go bonagatša ditlhabollo tše diswa ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: ISebe leMfundo esiSiseko sele layamkela i-SASL njengolwimi lwenkobe     Imisitho Ezayo.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Baswa.
tgt_text: IVeki yokuKhuselwa kwaBantwana.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Lenaneo la Kgwedi ya Baswa la 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Tlhohleletšo ya mekgwa ya boiphedišo ya go tšea telele le bopelotelele bja baswa go fihlelela bokamoso bjo kaone”.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kuphawula iVeki yeSizwe yokuKhuselwa kwaBantwana ukususela ngomhla wama-29 kuCanzibe ukuya kowesi-4 kweyeSilimela phantsi komxholo othi: ‘Masikhusele Abantwana ngeXesha le-COVID-19 Nasemva Kwawo”.

src_text: Letšatši la semmušo la Baswa le tla ketekwa gola Kapa Bohlabela..     Letšatši le ke anibesari yabo-46 ya 16 Phupu 1976 ya megwanto ya baswa kgahlanong le go gapeletšwa go ithuta dithuto ka moka ka leleme la Afrikaans..     Ka moya wa Phupu 1976, Kabinete dirile boipiletšo go baswa ba naga ye go kalokana le tlhotlo ya tlhokego ya mešomo yeo golelago godimo basweng ka go kgatha tema mananeong go ba hlabolla go swana le boithutelamošomo le boithutela maitememogelo mošomo.
tgt_text: Kule veki, kuza kugxininiswa kakhulu kumba oxake isizwe wokukhulelwa kwamantombazana asafikasayo, ingxaki leyo ethe yathatha unyawo ngethuba le-COVID-19 kuba amantombazana asafikasayo amaninzi athi afumana abantwana ngowama-..     IKhabhinethi imemelele ukuba kubanjiswane ngabazali, imibutho yoluntu, imibutho yenkolo kunye noluntu ngokubanzi kuliwe le ngxaki yokukhulelwa kwamantombazana aselula..     INgqungquthela yezoQoqosho yeHlabathi (i-WEF).

src_text: Mmušo hlamile mananeo go thekga go thwalwa ga baswa le tlhomo ya mešomo ya lebakanyana.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kuthatha inxaxheba kwi-WEF e-Davos-Klosters, e-Switzerland ukususela ngomhla wama-22 ukuya kowama-26 kuCanzibe 2022, phantsi komxholo othi: “Sisebenzisana, Masibuyisele ukuThembana”.

src_text: Dikgwebo le tšona di hlohleletšwa go gokagoketša baswa ba bangwe ba bantši mešomong ka go ba hlolela dibaka tša mešomo..     Lenaneo la baswa la kgwedi ka moka ya Phupu le akaretša ditiragalo ka moka go thoma ka go thakgolwa ga lesolo la baswa la makgoraditsela, go tsebagatšwa ga Lenaneo la Moemedi wa Leswaokgwebo la NYDA le bontši bja go thomišwa ga Ditirelo tša Bosetšhaba tša Baswa go potologa naga ka bophara..     Tona Kantorong ya Mopresidente ya Basadi, Baswa le Bao ba Phelago ka Bogolofadi tlare go se goye kae hlatholla lenaneo ka botlalo.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uyakwazi ukubaluleka kweli thuba lokuba yinxalenye yabo bagwadla izisombululo nokwabelana nehlabathi ngeengxaki nawo ojamelene nazo.

src_text: Ditiragalo ka moka tša baswa go letetšwe gore di obamele ditshepedišo tša maphelo tša COVID-.
tgt_text: Ukuthatha inxaxheba kwezwe lakuthi kule ngqungquthela kunceda igama lelizwe lakuthi elihlonitshwe nangakumbi kwihlabathi njengelizwe elinamathuba amaninzi otyalo-mali, futhi kuza kusinika nethuba lokwazisa ihlabathi ngombono wethu ngendlela eliya kuyo eli lizwe kwaye siza kuthetha nangezinto ezintsha ezenzekayo kwizwe lakuthi..     INyanga yoLutsha.

src_text: Samiti ya Dinaga tša go Laolwa ke Magoši.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyamkele iNkqubo yeNyanga yoLutsha yowama-2022 phantsi komxholo othi: “Ukukhuthaza indlela yokuziphilisa nokomelela kolutsha okuzinzileyo ukwenzela ikamva elingcono”.

src_text: Mmušo, ka tšhomišano le Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Ntlo ya Magoši tla swara Samiti ya Dinaga tša go Laolwa ke Magoši ka Labohlano, 27 le ka Mokibelo, 28 Mopitlo go rerišana ka merero ya go amana le taolo ya naga..     Tše ka moka di akaretša tshepedišo ya go fetišetša dinaga tša go laola ke magošigo tšwa Mmušong goya go beng ba tšona ba maloka maleba lego taba ye bohlokwa go matlafatša batho ba go tšwa dinagamagaeng.
tgt_text: Umsitho osesikweni woSuku loLutsha oza kubanjelwa eMpuma Koloni.

src_text: Ditiragalo tša go dira gore batho ba palelwe ke go ba beng ba dinaga ba semmušo mo dinageng tšeo ba dulago go tsona ko magaeng ga sesefatše fela ditokelo tša batho bao tša go bale naga ye lego ya bona eupša fokotša le mabokgoni bona go šomiša yona naga yeo go kaonafatša maphelo bona le maemo bona ditšhelete     Melaetša.
tgt_text: Lo ngunyaka wama-46 emva kwezidube-dube zabafundi zomhla we-16 kweyeSilimela 1976 ezazise-Soweto apho abantu abatsha bathi baqhankqalazela ukunyanzeliswa ngurhulumente wocalucalulo ukuba bafunde ngolwimi lwesiBhulu.

src_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebiša ditebogišo tša yona le go lakaletša mahlatse le mahlogonolo go: Mme Leanne Manas, Modiragatši wa Lenaneo la Mesong la SABC la Morning Live, ge amogeditšwe sefoka sa Botswerere bja Bosetšhaba sa go bitšwa Knight of France go tšwa France ka Labobedi, 17 Phupu 2022, ka go kgatha tema ga gagwe go bongwadi, bobegaditaba le magoro mangwe kakaretšo go fapafapana..     Mahloko Kabinete lebiša mahloko yona go malapa le go bagwera ba: Ntate Mpho Moerane (52), Meyaraphethiši wa maloba wa Toropokgolo ya Johannesburg, yo gape bego le mafolofolo mo dipolotiking bophelo bja gagwe ka moka le mohlankedi wa batho ba Johannesburg.
tgt_text: Besebenzisa la moya mnye wawuboniswe ngabafundi ngenyanga yeSilimela ngowe-1976, iKhabhinethi ihlaba ikhwelo kubantu abatsha beli lizwe ukuba balwe ingxaki yabantu abatsha abangenamisebenzi ngokuthi bathathe inxaxheba kwiinkqubo zophuhliso ezifana nokufunda umsebenzi usemsebenzini kunye nawokuqeqeshwa emsebenzini..     Urhulumente uqulunqe iinkqubo zokuncedisa kumaphulo okuqesha ulutsha nawokudala imisebenzi ezizingxungxo zexeshana.

src_text: Pele tlo thwalwa go ba Meyaraphethiši hlanketše setšhaba bjalo ka Leloko la Komiti ya Meyara ya go šoma ka Tikologo le Ditirelo tša Mananeokgoparara.
tgt_text: Amashishini ayakhuthazwa ukuba aqeshe abantu abatsha abaninzi ngokuthi adalele ulutsha amathuba..     Inkqubo yolutsha yale nyanga yeSilimela yonke iquka izinto ezininzi eziquka ukuphehlelela iphulo lolutsha olungamatshantliziyo, ukusekwa kweNkqubo ye-NYDA Brand Ambassador kunye namaphulo okuvuselelwa kweNkonzo yeSizwe yoLutsha (i-YES) kulo lonke eli.

src_text: Ngaka Deborah Fraser (56), seopedi sa mmino wa sedumedi yo thopilego difoka tše mmalwa yo malobanyana mo hlomphilwego ka Bongaka bja Filosofi ka Mmino wo Galalelago ka Christian Leadership Academy.Ngaka Namane Magau (70), serutegi sa go hlomphega kudu le leloko leo le hlomphegago la Lekgotla la Babolokedi la Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya AIDS ya Afrika Borwa.Ntate Mike Schüssler (60), raikonomi wa go tsebega kudu wa Moafrika Borwa yo bego le mmotegi wa intasteri ye ebile le yena bego kgona go botša batho ka se le sela mabapi le seemo sa ikonomi ya Afrika Borwa.Ntate Jamie Bartlett (56), modiragatši wa go ratega kudu, wa go thopa difoka tše mmalwa tša difala tša Afrika Borwa le bodiragatši bja thelebišene, yo bego tsebega kudu ka ditema tšeo di bapetšego bjalo ka Mike O'Reilly go Isidingo le David Genaro go Rhythm City.Kabinete le yona bile le Mopresidente Ramaphosa go lebiša mahloko mmušong le setšhabeng sa United Arab Emirates (UAE) morago ga go hlokagala ga Lešika la ka Bogošing Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (73), Mopresidente wa UAE      Bao ba Thwetšwego MešomongBatho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona dithuto tlo netefatšwa le go tiišeletšwa ka tsela ye maleba.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa okwi-Ofisi kaMongameli wezamaNina, uLutsha naBantu abaKhubazekileyo uza kunika ingcaciso egcweleyo kungekudala ngeenkqubo epheleleyo.

src_text: Ntate Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla bjalo ka Mohlankediphethišimogolwane wa Lekgotla la Tlhabollo ya Intasteri ya Kago.
tgt_text: Yonke imisitho yolutsha kulindeleke ukuba ithobele imiqathango yezempilo ye-COVID-.

src_text: Ntate Shabeer Hamid Khan bjalo ka Mmalamatlotlopharephare kua Matlotlong Bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela yoMhlaba woLuntu.

src_text: Mme Mendoe Ntswahlana bjalo ka Mohlankedimogolwane wa Dithekišetšano kua Matlotlong Bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: Urhulumente, ebambisene neNdlu yeSizwe yeeNkokeli zoMthonyama, uza kubamba iNgqungquthela yoMhlaba woLuntu ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-27 nangoMgqibelo umhla wama-28 kuCanzibe 2022 apho baza kuxoxa ngemiba enxulumene nobunini-mhlaba..

src_text: Kabinete kwanetše go thwalwa ga badiradikgopelo bao ba latelago go tlatša dikgoba tša mešomo tša Lekgotla la Balaodi ba Sekhwama sa Bohlokwa sa Enetši     Ntate Mosimaneotsile Jim Besnaar; (ii)    Mme Unati Nombakuse-Figlan.
tgt_text: Le miba iquka inkqubo yokukhutshelwa komhlaba woluntu usuka kuMbuso uye kubanikazi bawo abafanelekileyo, into leyo ibalulekileyo kumaphulo okuphuhlisa abantu basemaphandleni.

src_text: Ikonomi.
tgt_text: Ezoqoqosho .

src_text: Kabinete amogetše dikgatelopele tša moragorago tše kaonafetšego ka magato go rarolla seemo sa naga ye ao nepilego go hlohleletša kgolo ya ikonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izamkele indaba ezincumisayo zakutsha nje ezimalunga namanyathelo esizwe okungenelela ngeenjongo zokukhwezela uhlumo loqoqosho.

src_text: Goya ka dipalopalo tša moragorago tša tlhokego ya mešomo go tšwa go ba Dipalopalo tša Afrika Borwa, tlhokego ya mešomo theogetše fase go tloga go.
tgt_text: Ngokweengxelo zakutsha nje zeZiko leeNkcukacha-manani zoMzantsi Afrika (i-StatsSA), inani labantu abangasebenziyo lehlile lisuka ku-.

src_text: 3% kotareng ya bone ya 2021 go fihla go.
tgt_text: 5% kwikota yesine yowama-2021 laya kutsho ku-.

src_text: 5% kotareng ya mathomo ya.
tgt_text: 5% kwikota yokuqala yowama-.

src_text: Palo ya batho ka moka bao ba bego ba sa šome nakong ya ge go dirwa dipalopalo theogetše fase kotareng ya bobedi ka go latelana.
tgt_text: Inani labantu abangasebenziyo bebonke lehlile kwiikota ezimbini zilandelelana.

src_text: Mešomo ye mentši bile gona makaleng mešomo ya setšhaba le ya leago, mešomong ya bohlami le ya kgwebišano..     Palomoka ya Letseno la ka Nageng (GDP) kotareng ya mathomo ya 2022 goletše godimo ka.
tgt_text: Amacandelo adale eyona misebenzi mininzi leleenkonzo zoluntu nentlalontle, elemizi-mveliso kunye nelorhwebo.

src_text: 9% gomme tlhatlogo ye bušetša bogolo bja ikonomi ya gaborena go swana le ka nako ya pele naga ye welwa ke leuba.
tgt_text: Imveliso yonyaka yelizwe (i-GDP) kwikota yokuqala yowama-2022 ikhule ngo-.

src_text: Mo kotareng ye, lefapha la bohlami be le lona le legolo la go šoma bokaone ikonoming ka tlhatlogo ya tšweletšo ya petroleamo le dikhemikhale, dijo le dino, le tšhipi le metšhene.
tgt_text: 9% into leyo eyenze ukuba uqoqosho lweli lizwe lubuyele kwela nqanaba lalikulo phambi kwalo bhubhane siphuma kuye.

src_text: Ditlhatlogo tše di kaonafetšego di tloga di laetša botse gore ikonomi ya gaborena santše tiile maatla le gore magato go swana le Leano la go Agwa Leswa ga Ikonomi le go Bušetšwa Sekeng ga yona le tloga le nale mošito.
tgt_text: Kule kota, icandelo lemizi-mveliso lilo eliqhube kakuhle kakhulu nelithe landisa imveliso yepetroli neekhemikhali, ukutya neziselo, kunye nesinyithi kunye noomatshini.

src_text: Kabinete dira boipiletšo go mang le mang go thekga dikgwebo tša ka mo nageng le diintasteri ka go reka ditšweletšwa le ditirelo tša go tšwa ka mo nageng..     Kabinete amogetše sephetho ka kemedi ya kelo ya dikoloto ebago S&P Global go sekaseka ponelopele ya Afrika Borwa ya kelo ya dikoloto go tloga maemong go tielela goya maemong go kgahliša.
tgt_text: Lo mnconwana siwubonayo ubonakalisa ukuba uqoqosho lweli lizwe lusemi ngeenyawo kwaye amanyathelo okungenelela afana nesiCwangciso soKwakha Ngokutsha nokuVuselela uQoqosho (i-ERRP) ayaqalisa ukwenza umahluko.

src_text: Kemedi ye ya kelo ya dikoloto netefaditše kharensi ya kelo ya dikoloto ya nako ye telele ya dinagadišele le ya ka mo nageng go tlogelwa maemong BB minus le BB ka go latelana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlaba ikhwelo kuye wonke umntu ukuba axhase amashishini kunye nemizi-mveliso yalapha ekhaya ngokuthi athenge iimveliso kunye neenkonzo eziveliswe apha ekhaya..     IKhabhinethi isamkele isigqibo se-arhente ehlela isakhono sokukwazi ukubhatala izikweliti, u-S&P Global ngokuthi ayitshintshe indawo ebebeka kuyo uMzantsi Afrika ngokwesakhono sokukwazi ukubhatala izikweliti – isuke kwimeko ezinzileyo iye kwimeko encumisayo.

src_text: Seemo seo se Gakalago sa Ditheko.
tgt_text: U-S&P Global usibeke kwizinga ngokwesakhono sokubhatala amatyala exesha elide abalwe ngezimali zangaphandle waze wasibeka ku-BB minus naku-BB kweletyala elibalwe ngemali yalapha ekhaya.

src_text: Leuba la Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19) le dithulano tšeo di tšwelago pele lefaseng di bile le seabe se še šoro dithekong tšeo di gaketšego tša bophelo lefaseng ka bophara.
tgt_text: Iindleko zokuphila.

src_text: MaAfrika Borwa le bona ba hlobaetšwa ke ditheko tšeo di nyologelago godimo tša dibešeletšwa, dijo le tše dingwe tše bohlokwa..     Re swanetše go swarišana ka moka ga rena, re thušane le go seketša didirišwa tša rena mo nakong ye ye boima.
tgt_text: Ubhubhane weSifo seNtsholongwane ye-Corona (i-COVID-19) kunye nongquzulwano oluqhubayo kwihlabathi zenze iindleko zokuphila zenyuka kakhulu kwihlabathi liphela.

src_text: Mmušo le ona leka ka botšohle go imolla mang le mang, kudukudu bahloki.
tgt_text: Abemi boMzantsi Afrika bathwaxwa ngamaxabiso okunyuka kwamafutha ezithuthi, ukutya kunye nezinye izinto ezisisiseko.

src_text: Panka ya gaborena ya Afrika Borwa ya Resefe ya go šoma gabotsebotse, ya go tielela le ya go ikema gare thuša go šireletša setšhaba sa gaborena kgahlanong le ditlamorago tše mpe tša infleišene ka go thea infleišene gore be ka fase ga kelo ya fasefase; go ba ka fase ga kelo yeo dinaga tše dingwe tše itemogelago yona ka motsotso wo.
tgt_text: Kufuneka sibambisane, sincedane sange ubutyebi beli lizwe ngala maxesha anzima.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše sephetho sa Matlotlo Bosetšhaba sa go fana ka koketšo ya phokoletšo ya Lebikakaretšo ya Dibešeletšwa (GFL).
tgt_text: Urhulumente wenza konke okusemandleni ukuzama ukunika uncedo kumntu wonke, ingakumbi abantu abasweleyo.

src_text: GFL fokoditšwe ka  50 lithareng ka Moranang le ka Mopitlo, ebile phokoletšo ye tla tšwelapele go tloga ka la 1 Phupu go fihla ka la 6 Mosegamanye.
tgt_text: IBhanki enguVimba yoMzantsi Afrika esebenza kakuhle, ezinzileyo futhi nezimeleyo ifaka isandla izama ukuncenda isizwe singathwaxwa ngamandla kukunyuka kwamaxabiso ngokuthi igcine izinga lokunyuka kwamaxabiso lilawuleka; lingaphantsi kakhulu kweli lamanye amazwe..     IKhabhinethi isamkele isigqibo sikaNondyebo weSizwe sokwandisa kwexesha lokungatsalwa kwerhafu yawo onke amafutha ezithuthi, i-General Fuel Levy (i-GFL).

I-GFL yophulwe nge-R. 50 ilitha ngenyanga kaTshazimpunzi noCanzibe, kwaye iza kuphinda ingatsalwa ukususela ngomhla woku-1 kweyeSilimela ukuya kowesi-6 kweyeKhala..     IKhabhinethi iphinde yasamkela isigqibo seKhomishini yezoKhuphiswano sokubeka phantsi kweliso elibukhali amaxabiso okutya, ingakumbi ela solotya linyanzelisa amashishini ukuba anike izizathu ngokunyusa amaxabiso ezinto.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše sephetho sa Khomišene ya Diphenkgišano go bea leihlo ditheko tša dijo tša motheo, kudukudu peakanyetšo ya gore dikgwebo di swanetše go fahlela ka mabaka go kwagala ge di nyološa ditheko.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela yezoShishino yoMzantsi Afrika ne-Japan.

src_text: Foramo ya Kgwebo ya Afrika Borwa le Japan.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izamkele iziphumo zeNgqungquthela yezoShishino yoMzantsi Afrika ne-Japan yakutsha nje, ethe yavumelana ngenkqubo yomsebenzi ende equka ukusebenzisana kumaphulo okwakha imizi-mveliso engenabungozi kokusingqongileyo, ubuchwepheshe beemoto ezihamba ngombane kunye nehaydrojini engenabungozi kokusingqongileyo.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše dipoelo tša Foramo ya Kgwebo ya moragorago ya Afrika Borwa le Japan, yeo kwanetšego lenaneo la phišegelo ya mošomo leo le akaretšago tšhomišanommogo godimo ga go hlongwa ga diintasteri tša go šomiša dimatheriale tša tlhago, ditheknolotši tša difatanaga tša mohlagase le haedrotšene ya go mpshafatšega..
