Foramo ye kwanetše go swara pontšho ya mebileng ka dikgokagano tša bidio go laetša menyetla ya Afrika Borwa go dikgwebo tša Japan ka bontši, tlhabollo ya mabokgoni ka gare ga intasteri ya naga ye ya difatanaga, magoro ao lego gona mošomo godimo ga dibaka tša bohlami le neelano ya maitemogelo sethekniki.
tgt_text: Le ngqungquthela iphinde yavumelana ukuba kubanjwe umboniso oza kuqhutywa ngonxibelelwano lwevidiyo oza kubonisa ngamathuba akhoyo eMzantsi Afrika kumashishini ase-Japan, uphuhliso lwezakhono kwicandelo lezithuthi lalapha kweli, amaqela ajongene namathuba akhoyo kwicandelo lemizi-mveliso kunye nokwabelana ngolwazi olumayelana nobuchwepheshe.

src_text: Japan ke ye nngwe ya bagwebišani ba bohlokwa kudu ba naga ya gaborena ebile ke yona eteletšego pele dipeeletšo mafapheng mmalwa Afrika Borwa, go thoma ka lefapha la difatanaga go fihla ka metšhenekgoparara yeo gatetšego pele ya tša meepo, le gape go dikgwebo tša temo go fihla ka ditirelo tša ditšhelete.
tgt_text: I-Japan lelinye lamazwe abalulekileyo esirhweba nawo kwaye lelinye lamazwe atyala imali eninzi kumacandelo amaninzi eMzantsi Afrika, ukusuka kwelezeemoto ukuya koomatshini bale mihla basemgodini, kwezolimo ukuya kwiinkonzo zezimali.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše gape go hlongwa ga Lenaneo la Baromelantle ba Bathobaso ka Kgoro ya Kgwebišano, Intasteri le Diphenkgišano (the dtic), go kgobokantšha mmogo difeme tša go laolwa ke bathobaso tšeo gabjale di romelago ka ntle diphahlo tša go tšweletšwa ka mo nageng ye go ya dikarolong tše dingwe tša lefase.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusekwa kwe-Black Exporters Network liSebe lezoRhwebo, uShishino noKhuphiswano (i-DTIC), eza kudibanisa amashishini abantu abantsundu aqhuba ushishino lokuthumela kumazwe ehlabathi iimveliso zeli.

src_text: Lenaneo le le tla kgontšha go abelanwa ga tshedimošo, maitemogelo le tsebo ya mabokgoni, ebile le putla godimo ga dikatlego tša Lenaneo la Bahlomi ba Dikgwebo ba Bathobaso (BIS)..     Enetši.
tgt_text: Lo mbutho uza kunceda la mashishini akwazi ukwabelana ngolwazi, ngemingeni agagana nayo kunye nobuchule, kwaye wakhele kumsebenzi omhle osele wenziwe yiNkqubo yooSomashishini Abantsundu.

src_text: Magato rena go dira gore mo lebakeng le letelele le le tlago re se hlwe re sokodišwa ke mohlagase thušitše kudu ke magato go neelwa Yuniti 4 ya Setiši sa go Fehla Mohlagase sa Kusile gola Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Magato a bontšha gape maiteko mangwe Eskom go boetša sekeng peakanyo ya mohlagase ka kakaretšo ebile tla tlaleletša kabo ya mohlagase ka mo nageng ka dimekawate (MW) tše dingwe gape tše..     Kabinete lemogile gore go agwa ga diyuniti tša go fehla mohlagase tše nne godimo ga tše tshela go phethagaditšwe protšekeng ya Setiši sa Mohlagase sa Kusile..     Kabinete amogetše magato go tlaleletša mohlagase wo abiwago nageng ye ka go thomiša phehlo ye mpsha ya mohlagase, gomme ona kgonagetše ka baka la sephetho sa go dumelela bafehli ba mohlagase ba go ikema go tšweletša mohlagase.
tgt_text: Umbono wethu wokuqinisekisa ukuba sinombane owaneleyo uye wasondela ekubeni ufezekiswe emva kokuba kuye kwanikezelwa ngokusesikweni kukaYunithi 4 weZiko loPhehlo-mbane laseKusile, eliseMpumalanga.

src_text: Mmušo malobanyana mo sanetše kwano ya go reka 150 MW ya mohlagase go tšwa go motšweletši wa mohlagase wa go mpshafatšega bago, Scatec ASA.
tgt_text: Ukunikezelwa kwale Yunithi kubaluleke kakhulu kumalinge ka-Eskom okuqinisekisa ukuba kukho uzinzo kwezombane kwaye le Yunithi iza kugalela umbane ozimegawathi (i-MW) ezingama-800 kwiziko lophehlo-mbane lesizwe..     IKhabhinethi ivile nokuba sele ugqityiwe umsebenzi wokwakha iiyunithi zokuphehla umbane ezine kwezintandathu kwiZiko loPhehlo-mbane laseKusile.

src_text: Lekgotlakeletšo la Matlafatšo yeo Nabilego ya Bathobaso Ikonoming (B-BBEE).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyakwamkela ukongezwa kweYunithi entsha yokuvelisa umbane kwiziko lombane lesizwe, into leyo ethe yenzeka ngenxa yesigqibo esathathwayo sokuvumela abavelisi bombane abazimeleyo ukuba bavelise umbane.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše thwalo ka Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ya Lekgotlakeletšo le leswa la naga ye la B-BBEE.
tgt_text: Urhulumente usanda kutyikitya isivumelwano sokuthenga umbane oyi-150 MW kwa-Scatec ASA, inkampani evelisa umbane ohlaziyekayo.

src_text: Lekgotla le le hlangwa ke dihlopha tša mafapha go fapafapana go thoma ka dikgwebo, diyunione tša bašomi, mekgatlo yeo thomilwego setšhabeng le dirutegi, bao ka moka ba tlo rwalago maikarabelo go hlahla mmušo go lebeletšwe diphetogo tša ikonomi.
tgt_text: IBhunga labaCebisi ngokuXhotyiswa Banzi kwabaNtsundu ngezoQoqosho (i-B-BBEE).

src_text: Le ge le gore go bile le kgatelopele ye makatšago ya go bušetša morago megopolo ye fošagetšego ya kgethollo ikonoming, go santše go nale mošomo wo montši wo swanetšego go dirwa go rotoša taolo ya bolaodi bja bathobaso, go hlatloša mabokgoni le go nabiša dithekišetšano go nea basadi ba bathobaso le baswa menyetla.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyakwamkela ukonyulwa kweBhunga labaCebisi le-B-BBEE nguMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Mafula.
tgt_text: Eli bhunga lenziwe ngabantu abahlukeneyo abaphuma kwezoshishino, kwimibutho yabasebenzi, kwimibutho yoluntu kunye nakumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo, abaza kwenza umsebenzi wokukhokela urhulumente kwimizamo yakhe yokwenza iinguqu kuqoqosho.

src_text: Matsapa ao tšwelago pele mmušo kimollo diprofenseng tšeo di amilwego ke mafula moragorago tliša dipoelo tša go kgotsofatša.
tgt_text: Nangona umde umgama osele uhanjiwe ukulungisa umonakalo owenziwa ngurhulumente wocalucalulo wokuba uqoqosho lube sezandleni zegcuntswana, kusekuninzi ekufuneka kwenziwe ukwandisa inani labantu abantsundu kwizikhundla zolawulo, ukuphuhlisa izakhono kunye nokwandisa amaqumrhu ekuthengwa kuwo ukuze kunikwe amanina antsundu kunye nolutsha amathuba..     Izikhukhula.

src_text: Mmušo beile pele kabo ya dijo, meetse le madulo bathong bao ba šutišitšwego le go lokiša mananeokgoparara ao senyegilego.
tgt_text: Amalinge aqhubayo karhulumente okunikezela ngoncedo kumaphondo ebechatshazelwe zizikhukhula ezimandla enza umahluko obonakalayo.

src_text: Mošomo wo gare ya kgatlampana go bušetša sekeng ditirelo tša motheo go swana le meetse, mohlagase, tlhwekišo le go thothwa ga ditlakala.
tgt_text: Urhulumente uwukhokelise phambili umba wokunikezela ngokutya, amanzi kunye neendawo zokufihla iintloko ebantwini abaphulukene namakhaya abo kunye nokulungisa iziseko ezingundoqo ezonakeleyo.

src_text: Tšhelete ya go lekana R189, 217 milione gare ya šomišwa Kaonafatšong ya Lenaneo la Madulo Mekhukhung leo le nepilego go kaonafatša khwalithi ya maphelo bao ba dulago mafelong mekhukhung..     Tšhelete ya tlaleletšo ya go lekana R733, 086 milione abetšwe ka Thušo ya Tšhelete ya Tlhabollo ya Madulo Batho go thuša go direla batho madulo go swarelela nako ye telele le mohlakanelwa..     Kabinete amogetše thekgo ya moya wa botho go tšwa Mmušong wa Qatar ka sebopego sa dijo tša ka dikotikoting, diaparo, ditšenereitha, dihlwekišameetse, dihemiši, ditente le kabo ya didirišwa tša bongaka.
tgt_text: Uyaqhuba, sithetha nje, umsebenzi omkhulu wokubuyisela kwimo yesiqhelo iinkonzo ezisisiseko ezifana namanzi, umbane, ugutyulo kunye nokuthuthwa kwenkunkuma..     Imali emalunga nezigidi zeerandi ezingama-.

src_text: Neelano ye tla hola badudi ba go feta 4 000 bao ba filwego madulo lebakanyana disenthareng tša tlhokomelo ya setšhaba.
tgt_text: 217 iyasebenza ngoku kwiNkqubo yokuPhucula iiNdawo ezingamaTyotyombe ngeenjongo zokuphucula ubomi babantu abahlala kwezi ndawo.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše gape thekgo ya moya wa botho go tšwa United Arab Emirates (UAE) ka sebogego sa dijo tša ka dikotikoting le meetse go thuša batšwasehlabelo ba mafula moragorago.
tgt_text: Enye imali ezizigidi zeerandi ezingama-.

src_text: Go Tsebagatšwa ga Sekhwama sa Tlhabollo ya Leago.
tgt_text: 086 ibekelwe isiBonelelo soPhuhliso lweziNdlu ukuze incede ukwakha iindawo ezizinzileyo nezihlangeneyo zokuhlala abantu.

src_text: 1    Kabinete amogetše go tsebagatšwa ga Sekhwama sa Mešomo ya Leago ka Koporasi ya Tlhabollo ya Diintasteri (IDC) ka tšhomišano le Kantoro ya Mopresidente le dtic.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyalamkela uncedo lwezentlalontle oluvela kwilizwe lase-Qatar ebelikukutya, iimpahla, iijenereyitha, oomatshini bokucoca amanzi, iintente kunye namayeza.

src_text: Thekgo ye tla fana ka menyetla ya mathomomayo ya mešomo ya baswa ba go fihla 50 000 mo mešomong ye nago le mohola leagong yeo dirwago ke batho go tšwa mafelong mo ba dulago gona.. 2    Thekgo ye akaretša tlhokomelo ya maphelo le ya setšhaba, thekgo ya dijo le ya phepo go swana le mafelo go rekišetša batho ba go hloka madulo dijo, tlhohleletšo ya go bala le go ngwala, mananeo tlhago le phedišo ya phetogo ya klaemete gotee le masolo go thekga baswa.
tgt_text: Esi sipho siza kuxhanyulwa ngabemi abangama-4 000 abasahlala okwethutyana kumaziko oluntu.

src_text: Sekhwama se se tla thekga batho go tšwa ditšhabeng tše 26 eupša se sekhwama sa go dira poelo ya go swana le ye dirwago ke dikgwebo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwalamkele noncedo lwezentlalontle oluvela e-United Arab Emirates obelukukutya kunye namanzi okunceda amaxhoba ezi zikhukhula bezi thwaxe eli kwezi veki ziphelileyo.

src_text: Bosenyi le Bomenetša.
tgt_text: Ukusekwa kweNgxowa-mali yoPhuhliso lweMisebenzi.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše go golegwa ga batho ka tee ka tee ka bontši go amana le boradia, go timeletša tšhelete mohlala le bomenetša.
tgt_text: 1    IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusekwa ngokusesikweni kweNgxowa-mali yoPhuhliso lweMisebenzi yi-Industrial Development Corporation (i-IDC) isebenzisana ne-Ofisi kaMongameli kunye ne-DTIC.

src_text: Magareng ga bona go akaretšwa bašomedi ba maloba ba mmušo ba maemo godimo le ba makalakgwebo mmušo, ba bangwe ba bona ba lebane le melato ya go amana le go gatakwa ga Molao wa Taolo ya Ditšhelete tša Mmušo, 1999 (Molao 1 wa 1999).
tgt_text: Le Ngxowa-mali iza kunika abantu abatsha abanokude bafikelele kuma-50 000 amathuba emisebenzi ezizingxungxo eluncedo ekuhlaleni neyenziwa kwasekuhlaleni.. 2    Ezi zingxungxo ziza kuquka ukuncedisa kwicandelo lezempilo nonakekelo loluntu, ukuncedisa kwezokutya nesondlo kumaziko abonelela abantu abangathathi ntweni ngento esiwa phantsi kwempumlo, ukuncedisa kumaphulo okufundisa ukubhala nokufunda, ukutyala imithi namanye amalinge okulwa uguqu-guquko lwemozulu kunye namaphulo okunceda ulutsha.

src_text: Dikgolego tše - tša go akaretša go golegwa ga mohlankedi wa Kgoro ya Merero ya Selegae kua Senthareng ya Kamogelo ya Bafaladi ya Desmond Tutu gola Pretoria yo go gononwago gore amogetše pipamolomo go tšwa go motšwantle – bohlatse bja go laetša botse ntlha ya gore ga go na motho yo lego ka godimo ga letsogo la molao le gore bašomedi ba go hloka potego ga bana bodulo le gatee lefapheng la mmušo..     Kabinete amogetše gape kgatelopele ye fihleletšwego go buša barwarre ba Gupta lego Rajesh le Atul go tšwa mo ba lego go boela ka mo Afrika Borwa go tlo lebana le letsogo la molao.
tgt_text: Le Ngxowa-mali iza kuxhasa imibutho yoluntu kunye nengenzi ngeniso engama-.

src_text: Se se latela go golegwa ga bona malobanyana gola Dubai kua UAE morago ga gore Lebotho la Boditšhaba la Sephodisa sa Bosenyi (Interpol) le lokolle ditsebišo tša go golegwa ga bona.
tgt_text: Ulwaphulo-mthetho norhwaphilizo.

src_text: Barrwarre ba ba nyakega ka mo Afrika Borwa go amana le tema ye go gononwago gore ba kgathile ya go gogwa ga mmušo ka nko, go akaretšwa le boradia le go timeletša tšhelete mohlala.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyakubulela ukubanjwa kwabantu abaninzi ngezityholo ezinxulumene nobuqhetseba, ukuthutyeleziswa kwemali kunye norhwaphilizo.

src_text: Ditherišano magareng ga mabotho phethagatšo ya molao kua UAE le ka mo Afrika Borwa ka go bušwa ga bona ka mo nageng di gare.
tgt_text: Aba bantu baquka abo babesakuba zizikhulu kurhulumente nakumaqumrhu akhe, futhi abanye babo babekwe amatyala anxulumene nokwaphula uMthetho wokuLawulwa kweziMali zikaRhulumente (i-PFMA), wowe-1999 (uMthetho uNombl 1 wowe-1999).

src_text: Go golegwa ga bona go laetša maikemišetšo mmušo go lwantšha bosenyi le bomenetša ntle le poifo goba sepitša..     Go golegwa ga bona go tloga go laetša gore ditshepedišo le magato semolao šoma gabotse kudu go dira gore babonwamolato ba ikarabele ka magato bona boganka le go netefatša gore ga gona le motho tee yo lego ka godimo ga letsogo la molao..     Kabinete sotše maitekelo bohlaswa go nyatša ikonomi le naga ya gaborena morago ga tshenyo ya ka boomo ya kheibole kua Yuniti 1 ya Setiši sa Mohlagase sa Matla sa Eskom gola Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Aba bantu babanjiweyo – abaquka igosa leSebe leMicimbi yezeKhaya kwiziko leembacu, i-Desmond Tutu Refugee Reception Centre, ePitoli elityholwa ngokuthatha imali yokunyoba kummi wangaphandle – babubungqina bokuba ngenene umthetho awuthengi buso nokuba abasebenzi abanganyanisekanga abafuneki kurhulumente..     IKhabhinethi iyavuyiswa nangumsebenzi osele wenziwe malunga nokubuyiselwa eMzantsi Afrika kwabafo bakwa-Gupta, u-Rajesh no-Atul.

src_text: Ye ebile tiragalo ya bone ya kgonono ya tshenyo ye lakanwego setišing se sa mohlagase morago ga gore ditiragalo tša go swana le tše di begwe ditišing tše dingwe tše tharo tša mohlagase dibekeng tše mmalwa tša go feta.
tgt_text: Oku kulandela ukubanjwa kwabo e-Dubai e-UAE emva kokuba uMbutho weHlabathi wamaPolisa oLwaphulo-mthetho (i-Interpol) uye yakhupha umgqaliselo wokuba babanjwe apho babonwe khona.

src_text: Dipalopalo tša moragorago tša bosenyi ke seipone sa gore re swanetše go dira tšohle bjalo ka setšhaba go dira gore mo re tšwago gona go bolokege.
tgt_text: Aba bafo bakwa-Gupta bayafunwa ngabakwantsasana eMzantsi Afrika ngokunxulumene nendima ekutyholwa ukuba bayidlala kumkhuba wokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane, kuquka ubuqhetseba nokuthutyeleziswa kwemali.

src_text: Seemo se sa makgonthe seo re lebaganego le sona se re gopotša gore go fediša bosenyi ke maikarabelo setšhaba le gore ka moka ga rena – go akaretšwa maphodisa, baetapele ba dipolotiki, setšhaba, malapa, boradikgwebo, bašomi le mekgatlo ye lego setšhabeng – ka moka re swanela ke go kgatha tema ya rena go lwantšha bosenyi..     Kabinete nale tshepho ya gore ditšhelete tše dingwe tšeo di beilwego ka thoko ke Kantoro ya Tona ya Maphodisa go šomišwa mo ditišing tša maphodisa tša go ba le palo ya godimo ya go begwa ga melato ya dipolao, ya go kata le ya bosenyi bjo bongwe bja dikgaruru di tla thuša go fetola seemo seo le go hlola setšhaba sa go bolokega bathong ka moka.
tgt_text: Luyaqhuba uthetha-thethwano phakathi kwee-arhente zogcino-mthetho zoMzantsi Afrika kunye nezase-UAE malunga nokubuyiselwa kwabo kweli lizwe.

src_text: Tsebišo ya Seemo sa COVID-.
tgt_text: Ukubanjwa kwabo kubonakalisa ukuba urhulumente uzimisele ngenene ukulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho norhwaphilizo ngaphandle koloyiko nokujonga ubuso bomntu.

src_text: Kabinete gopoditše motho mang le mang gore COVID-19 ga ya fela le gore kotsi ya diphetelo tše diswa tla nyologela godimo nakong ye ya sehla sa marega.
tgt_text: Ukubanjwa kwaba bantu kubonakalisa ukuba ziyasebenza iinkqubo namanyathelo okuqinisekisa ukuba abenzi bobubi bayaphendula ngezenzo zabo ezihambisa umzimba kwaye zikwabubungqina bokuba umthetho awuthengi buso.

src_text: Re swanetše go tšwelapele go latela magato ka moka tlhokomelo gore re ipoloke le go šireletša bao re phelago le bona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iligxibhe kabukhali ilinge lokuzama ukusengela phantsi uqoqosho lweli lizwe nokudelela ilizwe uqobo emva komonakalo ombi owenziwe kwikheyibhuli ekuYunithi 1 kwisiKhululo soPhehlo-mbane sika-Eskom, iMatla esiseMpumalanga.

src_text: Magato a akaretša go hlapa goba go sanithaesa matsogo kgafetšakgafetša, go apara dimaseke ge re le ka meagong, go šielana sekgala sa go bolokega, go bula mafastere gore go hlabele ke moya le go hlaba meento.
tgt_text: Eli ibilityeli lesine kusenziwa amalinge okonakalisa ngabom isikhululo sophehlo-mbane elilandela amanye amatyeli amathathu alo mkhuba kwezi veki zimbalwa zidlulileyo.

src_text: Samiti ya Kopano ya Afrika (AU).
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha-manani zolwaphulo-mthetho zibonakalisa ukuba kusekuninzi ekufuneka sikwenzile sisisizwe ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu bakuthi bakhuselekile.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše tsebagatšo, Dikano le maikgafo ao amogetšwego kua Samiting ya Go Se Tlwaelege ya AU ka Matšhošetši le Diphetho tša go thulana le Molaotheo ka mo Afrika yeo bego swaretšwe kua Malabo, Rephabliking ya Equatorial Guinea, ka Mokibelo, 28 Mopitlo..     Baetapele ba Afrika ba lekotše matšhošetši ao tšwelago pele, ba sekasekile magato bjale go rarolla seemo se le go ikgafa go matlafatša tšhireletšego ya mohlakanelwa ya mebušo ye lego maloko samiti ye yeo lebaganego le matšhošetši le dikgaruru tša boganka.
tgt_text: Oku kusikhumbuza ukuba idabi lokulwa amazinga aphezulu olwaphulo-mthetho lelesizwe kwaye nathi sonke – kuquka amapolisa, iinkokeli zezopolitiko, uluntu ngokubanzi, iintsapho, oosomashishini, abasebenzi kunye nemibutho yoluntu – kufuneka sidlale indima yethu ekulweni ulwaphulo-mthetho.

src_text: Bolwetši bja Mabora Dikgabo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inethemba elikhulu ukuba le mali ibekelwe bucala yi-Ofisi yoMphathiswa wezamaPolisa ilungiselela izikhululo zamapolisa ezinamanani aphezulu abantu ababuleleyo, abadlwenguleyo kunye nezinye izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho olunobundlobongela iza kunceda kakhulu ukulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho ize yenze zikhuseleke kumntu wonke iindawo esihlala kuzo..     Ezakutsha nge-COVID-.

src_text: Kabinete netefaleditše MaAfrika Borwa gore mafapha rena tša maphelo dutše komana go bea seemo leihlo le go thibela bolwetši bja Mabora Dikgabo, morago ga gore bolwetši bjo bo phulege dinageng tše mmalwa tšeo ka setlwaedi bolwetši bjo bo sego gona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikhumbuza wonke umntu ukuba i-COVID-19 ayikapheli kwaye amathuba okuba lande inani labantu abosulelwe yiyo aza kunyuka ngeli xesha lasebusika.

src_text: Le ge le gore ga gona diphetelo tšeo di begilwego go fihla gabjale goba tšeo di humanwego ka mo Afrika Borwa, makgotlataolo tša maphelo ka mo nageng tšwela pele go bea seemo leihlo ka hloafalo     Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: Masiqhubeleke ngokuthatha amanyathelo afanelekileyo okuzikhusela thina kunye nabanye abantu.

src_text: Ditherišano tša Setšhaba ka Magato go Swaragana le Bogwebi bjo bo Sego Molaong bja Dikgerekgere tša Tšhipi.
tgt_text: La manyathelo aquka ukuhlamba izandla rhoqo ngamanzi okanye ngesibulala-ntsholongwane, ukunxiba izifonyo xa ungaphakathi kwizakhiwo, ukungasondelelani, ukuvula iifestile ukuze kubethe umoya kunye nokugonya..     INgqungquthela yeMbumba ye-Afrika (i-AU).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore ditherišano tša setšhaba di swarwe ka ditšhišinyo tša go fediša go rekišwa ga dikgerekgere tša tšhipi tšeo di humanwego ka tsela ye sego molaong le ditšhipi tšeo di tološitšwego.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isibhambathiso kunye nezithembiso ezamkelwe kwiNgqungquthela eNkulu ye-AU engezoBunqolobi kunye noTshintsho Olungahambi ngokoMgaqo-siseko e-Afrika ebibanjelwe e-Malabo, e-Republic of Equitorial Guinea, ngoMgqibelo, umhla wama-28 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Bohodu bja dikgerekgere tša tšhipi le dikheibole tša koporo mo mananeokgoparareng mmušo bo šitiša go šoma gabotse ga ikonomi bjalo ka ge bo hlola gore dilo tše di rekišwago disenyegelo tša gona di ye godimo go feta tekano.
Tše dingwe tša ditšhitišo tše di akaretša kabo ya mohlagase le ditirelo tša ditimela ka baka la diporo tša ditimela tšeo di sentšwego.
tgt_text: Iinkokeli ze-Afrika zahlola izinto eziyingozi ezihleli zijinga, zaqwalasela amanyathelo athatyathwayo ukusabela kwezi zinto zaze zazibophelela ukuba ziza kuqinisekisa ukuba ukhuseleko lungqingqwa kumazwe angamalungu e-AU onganyelwe yingxaki yobunqolobi nabavukeli-mbuso.

src_text: Di hlola disenyegelo tša tlaleletšo tša dinamelwa banameding ka baka la dinamelwa tšeo di šwalalantšwego tša banamedi.
tgt_text: Isifo i-Monkeypox.

src_text: Dikheibole tšeo di sentšwego le tša go lokaloka tša mohlagase di hlola kotsi ya polokego setšhabeng, kudukudu baneng..     Kabinete file tlhahlo ya gore dtic swanetše go etapele ditherišano mo nakong ye šetšego ye kopana, le go humana digopolo go tšwa setšhabeng le go tšwa mafapheng maleba ka magato mohola ao ka phethagatšwago ke mmušo go fediša go senywa ga mananeokgoparara bohlokwa ikonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibaqinisekisile abemi boMzantsi Afrika ukuba amagosa ezempilo achophe ezithendeni ngeenjongo zokubeka phantsi kweliso nokuthintela i-Monkeypox, emva kokuba ithe yaqhambuka kumazwe amaninzi angaqhelanga ukuba nayo.

src_text: Morago ga tshepedišo ye, Kabinete tla bolela ka magato ao dumeletšwego     Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.
tgt_text: Nangona kungekho mntu sele ebonwe okanye efunyaniswe enayo ukuza kuthi ga ngoku apha eMzantsi Afrika, amagosa ezempilo kweli lizwe asibeke phantsi kweliso lokhozi esi sifo     Isigqibo seKhabhinethi.

src_text: Simposiamo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Tšhomišanommogo ya Theknolotši go Reniša Khutšo (PTPS) ya Ditšhabakopano (UN).
tgt_text: Indibano zoluntu zovakaliso-zimvo ngamanyathelo okulwa ukuthengiswa ngokungekho mthethweni kwezinto ezindala zesinyithi.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla swara PTPS ya Boselela kua Khanseleng ya Dinyakišišo tša Mahlale le tša Intasteri gola Pretoria go thoma ka Labobedi, 21 go fihla ka Labohlano, 24 Phupu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izivumile ukuba zibanjwe iindibano zoluntu zovakaliso-zimvo ngesiphakamiso sokubhangisa ukurhweba ngezinto ezindala zesinyithi nezisele zibotyoziwe ezingafunyanwanga ngendlela esemthethweni.

src_text: Go letetšwe gore go tle baemedi ba 300 go tšwa mebušong ya dinaga tše 50 tšeo di lego maloko yona.
tgt_text: Ukubiwa kwezinto zesinyithi ezindala kunye nekheyibhule zekopolo kwiziseko ezingundoqo zoluntu kuyaluphazamisa uqoqosho kuba kulutyabula imali eninzi.

src_text: Simposiamo ye kopantšha mmogo mašole ao nago le kgahlego, maphodisa le badudi go tšwa dinageng tšeo Mebušo ya tšona lego maloko UN go šomišana mmogo tirišong ya theknolotši ya sebjalebjale le ye gatetšego pele gotee le mareo ao šomišwago mererong ya sešole ye eteletšwego pele ke UN.
tgt_text: Olunye uphazamiseko olukwenzayo oku luquka ukuqhawuka kweentambo zombane kunye nokungahambi koololiwe ngenxa yokuba isiporo sonakalisiwe.

src_text: Simposiamo ye tla šomišwa bjalo ka sefala sa go abelana tshedimošo le sa go logišana maano mebušong ye lego maloko UN ebile amega masolong go reniša khutšo ka theknolotši ya moragorago mererong ya sešole ya go reniša moya wa khutšo..     Phenkgišano ya Bosetšhaba ya go Swarwa ka Morago ga Mengwaga ye Mebedi ya Wekšopo ya Bone ya Mabokgoni Afrika Borwa Maemo Bolefase (WSZA).
tgt_text: Oku kwenza abakhweli bahlawule imali eninzi ngenxa yokuba ezinye izithuthi zikawonke-wonke ziphazamiseka.

src_text: Phenkgišano ya Bosetšhaba ya go Swarwa ka Morago ga Mengwaga ye Mebedi ya WSZA swarelwa Sentharengkgoparara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Inkosi Albert Luthuli gola KwaZulu-Natal go thoma ka la 7 go fihla ka la 10 Phupu 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Ga go Boelwe Morago ka go Hlatloša Tšweletšo ya Bašomi ba Diatla ba Mengwagalekgolo ya bo21”..     Tiragalo ye šomišwa go hlohleletša mabokgoni go šoma ka diatla bjalo ka mošomo wa makgonthe wo motho ka ikgethelago ona bophelong gotee le go bulela dikgwebišano tšeo di tshephišago le intasteri ye.
tgt_text: Iintambo zombane ezonakalisiwe neziqhawuliweyo ziyingozi kakhulu ebantwini, ingakumbi ebantwaneni.

src_text: Tiragalo ye šomišwa gape go lekola maemo rena boithutelamošomo le tlhabollo ya go šoma ka diatla godimo ga tlhohleletšo ya go šušumetša go tšewa ga mešomo ya bophelo ka moka ya go šoma ka diatla bjalo ka mešomo yeo ka bago kgetho ya mathomo baithuting ba rena     Melaetša.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyalele i-DTIC ukuba ikhokele amaphulo okufakana imilomo noluntu ngokukhawuleza, ukuze ifumane izimvo zabo kunye nezamanye amacandelo afanelekileyo malunga namanyathelo urhulumente ekufuneka awathathe ukunqanda ukonakaliswa kwezi ziseko zingundoqo kuqoqosho lweli.

src_text: Mahloko Kabinete bile le Mopresidente Ramaphosa go lebiša mahloko Lapeng la Bogoši le setšhabeng sa Pušo ya amaMpondo morago ga go hlokofala ga Mohlomphegikgolo Kgoši Zanozuko Tyelovuyo Sigcau     Bao ba Thwetšwego MešomongBatho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona thuto tlo tiišeletšwa le go netefatšwa ka tsela ye maleba.
tgt_text: Emva koko, iKhabhinethi iza kubhengeza amanyathelo avunyiweyo ukuba aza kuthatyathwa     Umsitho ozayo.

src_text: Morena Jacob Ganny Mbele bjalo ka Molaodipharephare (DG) Kgorong ya Methopo ya Diminirale le Enetši..     Mme Pumeza Nwabisa Nodada bjalo ka Motlatšamolaodipharephare: Taolo ya Kagodithokgwa Kgorong ya Kagodithokgwa, Boreatlhapi le Tikologo.
tgt_text: INkomfa yeHlabathi yesiVumelwano seZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UN) sokuSebenzisana ngobuChwepheshe boGcino-xolo (i-PTPS).

src_text: Mme Susan Mafanedza Masapu bjalo ka Moeletšimogolwane wa Melao ya Mmušo wa Kgoro ya Toka le Tlhabollo ya Molaotheo..     Mme Doris Tshepe bjalo ka Mokomišinare wa Khomišene ya Diphenkgišano.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kusingatha i-PTPS yesi-6 e-Council for Scientific and Industrial Research ePitoli, ngoLwesibini, umhla wama-21 ukuya kutsho ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-24 kweyeSilimela.

src_text: Ngaka Alex Mahapa bjalo ka Moeletši wa Moswananoši wa Goyagoile go Tona ya Motšwaoswere ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo.
tgt_text: Kulindeleke ukuba lo msitho uzinyaswe ngabathunywa abangama-300 aphuma kumazwe angamalungu e-UN angama-..

src_text: Moadbokheiti Rams Ramashia bjalo ka Moeletši wa Moswananoši wa Lebakanyana go Tona ya Motšwaoswere ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo.
tgt_text: Le nkomfa iza kudibanisa bonke abanomdla kwezomkhosi, ubupolisa kunye nabantu abaphuma kuMazwe angamaLungu e-UN bazokubonisana ngeendlela zokusetyenziswa kobuchwepheshe bale mihla obukudidi oluphezulu kumaphulo ogcino-xolo akhokelwa yi-UN.

src_text: Phetogo ya Klaemete.
tgt_text: Ukutshintsha kweMozulu.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše ketelo ya go tla ka mo Afrika Borwa ka Morena Alok Sharma, Mopresidente wa Samiti ya bo-26 ya Phetogo ya Klaemete ya Ditšhabakopano (UN), go thoma ka la 19 go fihla ka la 21 Phupu 2022, gotee le phetleko ya gagwe ya gore Afrika Borwa laeditše boikgafo bja mošito godimo ga diphetogo tša go diriša mohlagase wa go hlweka..     Ka 2021, Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa bile le baetapele ba bangwe ba dinaga go tsebagatša tšhomišanommogo ye bohlokwa le mebušo ya Fora, Germany, United Kingdom le Amerika gotee le Kopano ya Yuropa, go thekga diphetogo tša go se tšee lehlakore tša ikonomi ya khabone ya maemo fase le setšhaba sa go tielela kgahlanong le diphetogo tša klaemete..     Afrika Borwa be šoma ga boima go itokišetša sefala sa diphetogo tša rena goya mohlagaseng wa go hlweka le go thoma go šomiša methopo ya mohlagase wa go hlweka go swana le haedrotšene ya tlhago, dilahlwa, mohlagase wa go fehlwa ka moya, mohlagase wa seetša sa letšatši le mohlagase wa go fehlwa ka meetse, magareng ga mehuta ye mengwe ya go mpshafatšega.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamkele utyelelo lukaMnu Alok Sharma, eMzantsi Afrika nongu Mongameli weNgqungquthela yeZizwe eziManyaneyo (i-UN) yama-26 yoTshintsho lweMozulu.

src_text: Mehutahuta ye tswakanego ya mohlagase hlola tekatekano magareng ga methopo ya mohlagase go netefatša mohlagase wa go botega wa go kgona go fihlelela dinyakwa tša mohlagase tša naga ye tšeo di golelago godimo.
tgt_text: Ukusuka ngomhla we-19 ukuya kowama-21 kweyeSilimela ngowama-2022, kananjalo lwamkelwe ngezandla ezishushu uvavanyo lwakhe oluziphumo zalo zithe uMzantsi Afrika ubonakalise ukuzinikela okungathandabuzekiyo kutshintsho lwamandla acocekileyo.

src_text: Go Hlaba Meento ya Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Ngonyaka wama-2021, uMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa wazimanye nezinye iinkokeli ekubhengezeni intsebenziswano eyaba yimbali kunye norhulumente waseFransi, eJamani, e-United Kingdom nowaseMelika, kwakunye neManyano yaseYurophu, ukuxhasa utshintsho olunobulungisa kuqoqosho lwekhabhoni ephantsi kunye noluntu olukwaziyo ukumelana nemozulu.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše phuhlamo ye kgolo ya diphetelo tša COVID-19 tšeo di gatišitšwego ka mo Afrika Borwa mo dibekeng tše mmalwa tša go feta ebile hlohleleditše batho ka moka bao ba nago le maswanedi go tšwelapele go entela, ka ge seo se thuša go efoga malwetši šoro, go amogelwa maokelong le go bolawa ke COVID-.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ubusebenza nzima ekulungiseleleni inguqu yokuvelisa amandla acocekileyo kunye nenyathelo lokucoca imithombo yamandla efana nehidrojeni ecocekileyo, i-biomass, amandla omoya, amandla elanga kunye nombane ophehlwa ngamanzi, nekuzezinye izinto ezinokuhlaziywa kabutsha ukuze kuveliswe amandla ombane.

Le ngxubevange yamandla ivumela ulungelelwaniso phakathi kwemithombo yamandla ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuba ilizwe lifumana amandla awoneleyo nangekho ethe-ethe nakwaziyo ukuhlangabezana neemfuno zamandla ezikhulayo zelizwe.

src_text: Palo ya go feta seripa ya batho ba bagolo ba MaAfrika Borwa go fihla gabjale ba amogeditšwe selekanyo sa moento wa COVID-19 se ka bago se tee.
tgt_text: Ukuthathwa kwesitofu sokugonyela intsholongwane ye-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Mmušo ikemišeditše go diriša dikadimo tša tswala ya fase tšeo di sa tšogo dumelelwa ke Panka ya Lefase go reka dilekanyo tša tlaleletšo tša moento wa COVID-19 le go netefatša gore setšhaba se šireletšegile ka fao go lekanego kgahlanong le diphetelo tše dingwe tše ka bago gona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukwehla okumandla kosulelo lwe-COVID-19 eMzantsi Afrika kwezi veki zimbalwa zidlulileyo kwaye ikhuthaze bonke abantu abafanelekileyo ukuba baqhubeleke nokugonya, kuba oku kuthintela ukugula okumandla, ukulaliswa esibhedlele kunye nokufa.

src_text: Kabinete lebeletše gape merero ya go amana le dikgatelopele tša go laola leuba la COVID-19, kudukudu ka kgatelopele ye fihleletšwego ya go boela sekeng ka botlalo ga ditiragalo tša setlwaedi tša ikonomi maphelong rena.
tgt_text: Isiqingatha sabo bonke abantu abadala baseMzantsi Afrika ukuza kuthi ga ngoku sele befumene ithamo elinye ubuncinane lokugonyela i-COVID-.

src_text: Tona ya Maphelo, Ngaka Joe Phaahla tla fa tshedimošo ka moka ka botlalo.
tgt_text: Urhulumente ujonge ukusebenzisa imali-mboleko enenzala ephantsi esandula kuvunywa yiBhanki yeHlabathi ukuze athenge izitofu zogonyo ze-COVID-19 kunye nokuqinisekisa ukuba isizwe sikhuseleke ngokwaneleyo kusulelo olungenzeka lubekhona.

src_text: Letšatši la Bosetšhaba la Baswa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwaqwalasele imiba enxulumene nophuhliso lolawulo lobhubhani we-COVID-19, ingakumbi kwinkqubela eyenziweyo ekubuyeleni ngokupheleleyo kwimisebenzi yesiqhelo yentlalo noqoqosho.

src_text: Kabinete lebogile MaAfrika Borwa ka moka ge ba tsenetše meketeko ya naga ye ya Letšatši la Bosetšhaba la Baswa ka Labone, 16 Phupu 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Go hlohleletša mekgwa ya go iphediša ya go tšea nako ye telele le tielelo ya baswa go fihlelela bokamoso bjo bo kaonafatšego.” Moya wa lethabo le go se boele morago wo laeditšwego ke baswa go ralala setšhaba ka moka ke lona lebakabaka la meketeko le tshepho ya bokamoso bjo bo kaonafetšego.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa wezeMpilo, uGq Joe Phaahla, uza kunika iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngalo mba.

src_text: Ge Kgwedi ya Bosetšhaba ya Baswa ya mafelelong re ntšheng ka ga tšhwene mo maitekelong rena go netefatša gore baswa ba kgona go ikhweletša mananeo mantši go ba thekga ao tlago ka mmušo le go ba kgontšha go kgatha tema ka mafolofolo ikonoming..     Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Setšhaba, bjalo ka mongmošomo wa go thwala batho ka bontši arabetše tlhotlo ye ka go kgontšha dialoga tša go se šome go hwetša maitemogelo ka Lenaneo la Dialoga la Boithutelamaitemogelo la Ditirelo tša Setšhaba le la Boithutelamošomo.
tgt_text: Usuku loLutsha lweSizwe.

src_text: Mmušo phethagatša gape le Sekhwama sa Mešomo Setšhabeng (SEF) ebile tsošološitše masolo tlhomo ya mešomo Ditirelo tša Bosetšhaba tša Baswa (NYS) ao ka bobedi ga ona tlo batametšago baswa ba go lekana 50 000 ka gare ga ditiragalo tša ikonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibulele bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrika ngokuzimanya kwabo kwizikhumbuzo zoSuku loLutsha lweSizwe, ebelibhiyozelwa ngoLwesine, umhla we-16 kweyeSilimela ngowama-2022 phantsi komxholo othi: “Ukukhuthaza ukuphila okuzinzileyo nokomelela kwabantu abatsha ukuze babe nengomso elingcono.”.

src_text: Masolo a ka se thuše fela ka go aba maitemogelo mošomo ao tsomegago kudu eupša tla thuša gape le ka go tsošološa mohola wa gore badudi ba kgathe tema ka mafolofolo.
tgt_text: Njengoko siyisonga iNyanga yoLutsha lweSizwe, masiqinise iinzame zethu zokuqinisekisa ukuba abantu abatsha bayafikelela kwiinkqubo ezininzi zenkxaso ezibonelelwa ngurhulumente kwaye siququzelele ukuthatha kwabo inxaxheba kuqoqosho.

src_text: SEF šomišana le mekgatlo ye sego ya mmušo (di-NGO) mola NYS ngwala fase maina baswa gore be bona ba khumanago mešomo mo ditirelong tša go hola batho setšhabeng go ralala naga ka bophara.
tgt_text: INkonzo kaRhulumente, njengoyena mqeshi mkhulu, isabele kulo mceli mngeni ngokunika ithuba  abafundi abaphumelele izidanga abangaphangeliyo lokufumana amava ngeNkqubo ye-Public Service Graduate Internship and Learnership Programme.

Urhulumente ukwaphumeza iNgxowa-mali yeNgqesho yoLuntu (i-SEF) kunye namanyathelo okudala amathuba emisebenzi eNkonzo yoLutsha yeSizwe (i-NYS) aza kutsalela abantu abatsha abangama-50 000 kuqoqosho ngalinye.

src_text: Dinamelwa.
tgt_text: La manyathelo akasayi kubonelela ngamava omsebenzi afuneka kakhulu nje kuphela kodwa azokwazi nokomeleza ixabiso nokuziva ungummi obalulekileyo elizweni.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše Leano la Magato la Dintlha tše 11 go swaragana le go thibiwa ga ditsela le go goketšwa ga batšwantle bjalo ka baotleladilori.
tgt_text: I-SEF isebenzisana nemibutho engekho phantsi kukarhulumente (ii-NGO) ngelixa i-NYS yona ibhalisa ulutsha kwiinkonzo ezinceda uluntu kwilizwe liphela.

src_text: Leano le, la go hlangwa ke Komiti ya Ditona tša ka Nageng (IMC) yeo Šoganago le Mešomo ya Legoro la Difatanaga tša go Rwala Merwalo le ya Ditsela ka moka le bakgathatema ba intasteri ya merwalo le ya ditsela, magareng ga tše dingwe, le go hlohleletša go phethagatšwa ga dinyakwa tša VISA le go obamela melao ya bašomi..     IMC hlametšwe go kalokana le palo ye nyologelago godimo ya go thibiwa ga ditsela le ya megwanto ka baotleladilori ba MaAfrika Borwa bao ba sa kgotsofalago.
tgt_text: Ezothutho.

src_text: Megwanto le go thibiwa ga ditsela ama gampe go sepela ga dinamelwa ka thelelo tšhoša babeeletši ba dinagadišele le gape go ama gampe dilo tše bohlokwahlokwa go swana le ikonomi le magatokamano kabo ya dilo tše bohlokwa tša go šomiša tšona ditsela tšeo di amegilego.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isiCwangciso sokuSebenza esizakumiselwa kwiinkalo ezili-11 ezizakujongana nokuvalwa kweendlela kunye nokuqeshwa kwabemi bamazwe angaphandle njengabaqhubi beelori.

src_text: Tlhaelelo ya Meetse Mmasepaleng wa Metsesetoropo wa Boemakepe bja Nelson Mandela (NMB).
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso, sathi saphuhliswa yiKomiti yabaPhathiswa beNdlela noThutho (i-IMC) ngentsebenziswano nabachaphazelekayo kushishino lwendlela nothutho, sikhuthaza phakathi kwezinye izinto ukunyanzeliswa kweemfuneko ze-visa kunye nokuthotyelwa kwemithetho yezabasebenzi.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše magato go tla ka Kgoro ya Meetse le Tlhwekišo (DWS) Mmasepaleng wa Metsesetoropo wa NMB gola Kapa Bodikela go efoga Letšatši la go Hloka Lerothi la Meetse ka ge profense ye lebagane le tlhaelelo ye šoro ya meetse yeo thomilego ka.
tgt_text: I-IMC yasekwa ukuze ijongane nokwanda kokuvalwa kweendlela kunye noqhanqalazo lwabaqhubi belori baseMzantsi Afrika abangonwabanga.

src_text: DWS šoma le profense go phethagatša magato nakwana magareng le nako ye telele go šogašogana le go fediša ditlamorago tše ka bago gona tša komelelo.
tgt_text: Uqhanqalazo kunye nokuvalwa kwendlela kuchaphazela kakubi ukuhambahamba kwabantu neemoto, kwale loyikisa abatyali-mali bamanye amazwe, eyona mpembelelo embi ngakumbi  ikuqoqosho kunye nokubonelela ngeenkonzo eziyimfuneko ezisebenzisa iindlela  ezichaphazelekayo.

src_text: Kabinete hlohleleditše gape badudi ba NMB go latela ditaelo tšeo ba di filwego tša go fokoletšwa meetse tšeo ba di filwego ke mebasepala ya fao go netefatša gore meetse ga fele.
tgt_text: Ukunqongophala kwamanzi kuMasipala oMbhaxa we-Nelson Mandela Bay (i-NMB).

src_text: Ka kakaretšo, tšhomišo ya meetse swanetše go fokotšwa ka dilithara tše 50 milione ka letšatši, go tloga maemong gona bjale dilithara tše 280 milione ka letšatši go theošetšwa fase go dilithara tše 230 milione ka letšatši.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamkele ungenelelo lweSebe lezaManzi noGutyulo (i-DWS) kuMasipala oMbhaxa we-NMB eMpuma Koloni ukunqanda iimini ezoma nko (Day Zero)  njengoko eli phondo lijongene nokunqongophala okumandla kwamanzi kususela ngonyaka wama-.

src_text: Bosenyi le bomenetša.
tgt_text: Ngoko ke i-DWS isebenzisana nephondo ukuphumeza amanyathelo exesha elifutshane, eliphakathi nelide ukulungisa nokuthomalalisa impembelelo esenokubakhona yembalela.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše go golegwa malobanyana mo ga mohlankedi wa Kgoro ya Merero ya Selegae wa go šomela kantorong ya Benoni mabapi le go gatiša pasporoto ya bofora go mofaladi wa go tšwa Bangladeshi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yabongoza abahlali base-NMB ukuba babambelele kwizithintelo zamanzi ezibekwe ngoomasipala basekhaya ngelo kuqinisekisa ukugcinwa kwamanzi.

src_text: Mohlankedi yo, Mme Sibongile Simelane filwe peile ya R5 000 kua Kgorotsheko ya Maseterata ya Benoni ka Labobedi, 21 Phupu.
tgt_text: Kukonke, ukusetyenziswa kwamanzi kufuneka kucuthwe ngezigidi zeelitha ezingama-50 ngosuku, ukusuka kwinqanaba langoku lezigidi zeelitha ezingama-280 ngosuku ukuya phantsi kwizigidi zeelitha ezingama-230 ngosuku.

src_text: Motšwantle yo wa Bangladeshi, Morena Fahim Kazi golegilwe le gare leka go tšwa ka mo nageng ka la 12 Mopitlo 2022 šomiša leina la gagwe la bofora la ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.
tgt_text: Ulwaphulo-mthetho norhwaphilizo.

src_text: Kgoro ya Merero ya Selegae (DHA) malobanyana mo bušeditše morago mmapadi wa Lithuania, Mohumagatšana Leva Andrejevaite, yo bego leka go šomiša bošaedi melao ya Afrika Borwa ya taolo ya bafaladi ge ihlamela maaka matala gore be nyaka go dira kgopelo ya asaelamo ka baka la ntwa ye kgatlampanago gola Ukraine.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukubanjwa kwakutsha nje kwegosa leMicimbi yezeKhaya elisebenza kwi-ofisi yase-Benoni elenzele ummi wase-Bangladeshi incwadana yokundwendwela yobuqhophololo.

src_text: Kabinete lebogiša mošomo wo dirwago ke Yuniti ya go Lwantšha Bosenyi ya DHA opela diatla le go hlohleletša MaAfrika Borwa go tšwelapele go bega ditiragalo tša mohuta wo tša bosenyi.
tgt_text: Igosa, uNksz Sibongile Simelane, unikwe ibheyile ye-R5 000 kwinkundla kaMantyi yase-Benoni ngoLwesibini umhla wama-21 kweyeSilimela ngo-.

src_text: Magato ao sego molaong MaAfrika Borwa ba go rekiša dipasa tša bona nale ditlamorago tše mpe kudu tša go fihla kgole godimo ga tšhireletšo ya naga ye le seemo sa ikonomi maphelong.
tgt_text: Yena ke Ummi wase-Bangladeshi, uMnumzana Fahim Kazi, wabanjwa ngethuba ezama ukubaleka alishiya ilizwe ngomhla we-12  kuCanzibe ngo-2022 ebaleka enegama elithi 'Lebogang Ndlovu'.

src_text: Mmušo tla tšwelapele go tšea magato go tiišetšwa letsogo kgahlanong le motho mang goba mang yo amegago ditiragalong tše sego molaong tša go nyatša melao ya rena ya bofaladi, ntle le poifo goba sepitša.
tgt_text: ISebe leMicimbi yezeKhaya (i-DHA) lisanda kubuyisela emva ekhaya umdlali we-Lithuanian, uNksz Ieva Andrejevaite, owayefuna ukusebenzisa kakubi ulawulo lweembacu lwaseMzantsi Afrika ngokuxela amampunge ebali lokufuna ukufaka isicelo se-asylum ngenxa "yemfazwe yase-Ukraine".

src_text: Kabinete amogetše gape sephetho sa go phara molato le go ahlolelwa ga morutiši wa Durban Mohumagatšana Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – yo ahloletšwego kotlo ya mengwaga ye meraro ya go bewa leihlo ke ba tshokollo ya bagolegwa le go golegwa tekano ya mengwaga ye mene, yeo fegilwego ka botlalo lebaka la mengwaga ye meraro kua Kgorotsheko ya Selete ya Umlazi gola KwaZulu-Natal ka baka la go gataka Pušoselegae: Molao wa Dikgetho tša Mebasepala, 2000 (Molao 27 wa 2000).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwa wuncomile umsebenzi owenziwe lisebe i-DHA kwicandelo lalo lwedesika elwa norhwaphilizo.

src_text: Bjalo ka morutiši sekolong seo se bego se šomišetšwa bjale ka setiši sa dikgetho nakong ya Dikgetho tša Mebasepala ka Diphalane 2021, Mohumagatšana Gabula ipone molato ka go lahlela ka dipaloto tša bofora tše 24 ka lepokisaneng la dikgetho, go akaretšwa tše 12 tša dipaloto tša Dikgetho tša Mebasepala le tše 12 tša dipaloto tša Dikgetho tša Wate.
tgt_text: Iqhwabela izandla kwaye ikhuthaza abemi boMzantsi Afrika ukuba baqhubeke nokuzixela izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ezinjalo.

src_text: Go pharwa molato ga gagwe le kahlolelo ye e filwego di tloga di laetša boikgafo bja Khomišene ya Dikgetho ya Afrika Borwa bja go tsena gare seemo seo ka bonako le go diriša magato taolo ya ditlamorago.
tgt_text: Izenzo ezingekho semthethweni zabemi boMzantsi Afrika abathengisa izazisi zabo zineziphumo ezimbi kakhulu kukhuseleko lwelizwe kunye nobuhle bentlalo noqoqosho.

src_text: Ye ke kgonthišišo ya go tiišetšwa letsogo ya dipeakanyo tša dikgetho, yeo go tloga kgale bego matlafetše nakong ya ge go be go tsebagatšwa Metšhene ya Sebjalebjale ya go Ngwadiša Bakgethi ya go kgona go thibela bakgethi go bouta gabedi.
tgt_text: Urhulumente uza kuqhubeka esebenza ngqwabalala ngakuye nabani na obandakanyeka kwizenzo ezingekho mthethweni ezijongela phantsi imithetho yethu yokufudukela kwelinye ilizwe, ngaphandle koloyiko okanye ukukhetha.

src_text: Kabinete netefaditše gore dikgetho ke motheo wa temokrasi ya gaborena le gore di swanetše go šireletšwa ka fao go ka kgonagalago..     Khonferense ya Ditona ya bo-12 (MC12) ya Setheo sa Dikgwebišano Magareng ga Dinaga tša Lefase (WTO).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukugwetywa kwa kutsha nje kukatitshala waseThekwini, uNksz Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – ogwetywe iminyaka emithathu phantsi kweliso loluleko kunye neminyaka emine ethothoza etrongweni, yaxhonywa yonke iminyaka emithathu, kwiNkundla yeNgingqi yaseMlazi KwaZulu-Natal – ngokutyeshela uMthetho woNyulo looMasipala kuRhulumente weNgingqi, wama-2000 (uMthetho wama-27 ka-2000).

src_text: Kabinete amogetše dipoelo tša WTO MC12 ye bego swaretšwe kua Geneva, Switzerland go thoma ka la 12 go fihla ka la 17 Phupu 2022, kudukudu sephetho sa gore dinaga tše nago le maloka di ka kgona go fekeetša dilaesense tša maswanedi tšhireletšosemolao ya nako ye rileng ya meento ya COVID-19 go fihla ka ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Njengomfundisi-ntsapho kwisikolo esasisetyenziswa njengesikhululo sokuvota ngexesha loNyulo lukaMasipala kweyeDwarha ngowama-2021, uNksz Gabuza ubuvumile ubuqhophololo owabenza kwiivoti ezingamashumi amabini anesine, eziquka i-12 zoNyulo looMasipala kunye ne-12 zoNyulo lweeWadi.

src_text: Sephetho sa ge eba go swanetše go oketšwa mekgwa ya go alafa le go phekola COVID-19 se diegišitšwe ka dikgwedi tše tshela.
tgt_text: Oku kugwetywa kunye nesigwebo kubonisa ngokucacileyo ukuzinikela kweKomishoni yoNyulo yaseMzantsi Afrika ukuba ingenelela kwangethuba kwaye iyakwazi nokuthatha amanyathelo anqala emva kweziphumo zophando.

src_text: Afrika Borwa be eteletše pele boipiletšo bja WTO bja go beelathoko maloka botlhami le boikgopolelo ao tlemaganego le meento ya COVID-19 ao tlo netefatšago gore go ba le khumanego ya go lekalekana ya meento le go kgontšha dinaga tša go ba le mabokgoni go itirela meento go dira bjalo.
tgt_text: Kwakhona oku kukwasisiqinisekiso sokuba qatha kweenkqubo zonyulo, ezithe zaqiniswa  ngokuziswa kweSixhobo soLawulo lwabavoti i-Voter Management Device esithintela ukuvota kabini.

src_text: Khonferense ye ikgafetše gape go latela tshepedišo ya go se ute selo le ya go akaretša bohle ya go hlama leswa mediro le mehola ya yona ka moka le go dumelelana go tsenela sekgoboko sa dikwanelo tša dikgwebišano tša go swaragana le magoro go etša maphelo, go thea magomo go diphokoletšo tša boreahlapi, kiletšo ya dikgwebišano ka mokgwa wa elektroniki gotee le tšhireletšego ya dijo     Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekisile ukuba unyulo lusisiseko sentando yesininzi yethu kwaye kufuneka lukhuselwe nangaziphi na izindlela.

src_text: Kgatelopele Lenaneong la go Fetogela Kgašong ya Titšithale (BDM).
tgt_text: INkomfa ye-12 yabaPhathiswa (i-MC12) yoMbutho woRhwebo weHlabathi (i-WTO).

src_text: Kabinete amogetše tshedimošetšo ka Lenaneo la BDM le go lemoga kgatelopele ye dirilwego ka go lokelwa ga mapokisana dithelebišene bjalo ka karolo ya go fulara kgašo ya dieriele go fetogela kgašong ya titšithale.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izamkele iziphumo ze-WTO MC12 ebibanjelwe e-Geneva, e-Switzerland ukusuka ngomhla we-12 ukuya kowe-17 kweyeSilimela ngowama-2022, ingakumbi isigqibo sokuba amazwe afanelekileyo angalisebenzisa igunya lawo lokurhoxisa  ilayisenisi eziwathintela ekuziveliseleni isitofu se-COVID-19 de kube ngowama-.

src_text: Kabinete gateletše gapegape nyakego ya ka pelapela ya go ruma BDM go kgona go bulela tsela maphoto ao nyakegago dikgokagano tša gohle tša motlalanaga, gotee le tshedimošo ye nngwe le theknolotši ya dikgokagano ya go amana le morero wo..     Tona ya Dikgokagano le Theknolotši ya Titšithale Khumbudzo Ntshavheni tla swara kopano ya tshedimošetšo ya babegaditaba gosasa (Labohlano, 24 Phupu) go fana ka tshedimošo ka botlalo.
tgt_text: Isigqibo esimalunga nokwandisa oku kunyango lwe-COVID-19 kunye noxilongo salibaziseka kangange sithuba seenyanga ezintandathu.

src_text: Pego ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ka Seemo sa Bosetšhaba sa Ditokelo tša Bana.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ubukhokela ikhwelo lokuba i-WTO iwarhoxise amalungelo obunini obubodwa abotshelelwe kwizitofu zokugonya ze-COVID-19 oku kuza kuqinisekisa ukufikelela ngokulinganayo kumayeza okugonya kunye nokuvumela amazwe anamandla okuvelisa izitofu ukuba akwenze oko.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ga Pego ya Bobedi ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya Bosetšhaba ya Ditokelo tša Bana.
tgt_text: Le nkomfa izibophelele kwinkqubo evulelekileyo nebandakanyayo yokuguqula yonke imisebenzi yayo kwaye ivumelene nomqulu wezivumelwano zorhwebo ezijongana namacandelo afana nezempilo, ukumisela imida kwinkxaso-mali yokuloba, ukumiselwa korhwebo nge-intanethi kunye nokuqinisekisa ubukho bokutya     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Pego ye tsebiša ka seemo sa ditaba ka phethagatšo ya Leano la Magato Bosetšhaba la bana go lebeletšwe nako ya magareng ga 2019-. .
tgt_text: Inkqubela-phambili kwiNkqubo yokuFudukela kuSasazo lobuxhaka-xhaka beDijithali (i-BDM).

src_text: Pego ye laetša diphenyo tšeo di gatišitšwego mengwageng ya magareng ga 2020- laetša gape le magoro ao santše lego tlhotlo, go akaretšwa le polokego ya bana le dithulano tšeo di tšwetšego pele magareng ga bahloki le bahumi go lebeletšwe bana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifumene uhlaziyo ngeNkqubo ye-BDM yaze yayiqaphela nenkqubela-phambili esele yenziweyo ngokufakela iibhokisi ezixhunywayo njengenxalenye yokufudukela kusasazo lwe-analogu ukuya kwidijithali.

src_text: Pego ye laetša ka fao leuba la COVID-19 le amilego bana ka yona mengwaga ye boletšwego..     Magato go namola seemo ao phethagatšwago ke mmušo nepile go lemoša batho ka moka ka ditokelo tša bana, go ya le ka fao go hlalošitšwego ka gare ga Molaotheo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yagxininisa ukungxamiseka kokuba kuqukunjelwe i-BDM yokukhulula inkqubo efunekayo kuthungelwano losasazo, kunye nezinye iinjongo ezinxulumene nobuchwephesha bonxibelelwano.

src_text: Magato a thekga gape le ditlamego tša naga ye godimo ga Dikwano tša UN ka Ditokelo tša Bana (UNCRC) le Tumelelano ya Afrika ka Ditokelo le Boiketlo bja Bana (ACRWC).
tgt_text: UMphathiswa wezoNxibelelwano nobuChwepheshe beDijithali uKhumbudzo Ntshavheni uza kunika iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngomso (uLwesihlanu, umhla wama-24 kweyeSilimela)..     INgxelo yoNyaka yeSimo seSizwe saMalungelo oMntwana.

src_text: Afrika Borwa ke ye nngwe ya naga ya go saenela kwano go bobedi UNCRC le ACRWC..     Pego ye hlamilwe ka go rerišana pele le dikgoro tša mmušo le palo ye bonagalago ya bakgathatema ba maleba maemong bosetšhaba le profense.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba ipapashwe iNgxelo yoNyaka yesibini engeSimo seSizwe kumaLungelo abaNtwana.

src_text: Pego ye feletšego ka botlalo tla phatlalatšwa websaeteng ya Kgoro ya Tlhabollo ya Leago mo go: www.dsd.gov.za.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ibonelela ngohlaziyo ngokufezekiswa kwesiCwangciso seSizwe  saBantwana kwisithuba esiphakathi kweminyaka yama-2019-..

src_text: Pego ye Kopantšwego ya Kgafetšakgafetša ya Afrika Borwa ya lekga la boraro go fihla go la boselela yeo hlagišeditšwego UNCRC.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo iqaqambisa impumelelo ebhalwe phantsi yexesha eliphakathi kweminyaka yama-2020-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go hlagišetšwa UNCRC Pego ya Kgafetšakgafetša ya boraro go fihla go ya boselela.
tgt_text: Ikwaqaqambisa iinkalo ezisathe gqolo zingumceli mngeni, kubandakanywa ukhuseleko lwabantwana kunye nokuqhubekeka kokungalingani phakathi kwabahlwempu nezinhanha ngokubhekiselele ebantwaneni.

src_text: Pego ye latela Pego ya bobedi ya Kgafetšakgafetša yeo hlagišeditšwego UNCRC ka..     Pego ye hlamilwe ka go tsamaišana le Kgatišo 44 ya UNCRC, ebile akaretša mebono le ditšhišinyo tšeo di dirilwego go tšwa pegong ya mafelelo.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ikwabonisa indlela ubhubhani we-COVID-19 ochaphazele ngayo abantwana ngeli xesha.

src_text: UNCRC rometše mebono le ditšhišinyo tša yona tša naga ye ka..     Go hlangwa ga pego ye go dirilwe ka go rerišana pele le dikgoro ka moka tšeo di amegago le bakgathatema ka moka go ralala le naga.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela aphunyezwa ngurhulumente ajolise ekufezekiseni amalungelo abantwana, njengoko kucacisiwe kuMgaqo-siseko weRiphablikhi yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-.

src_text: Pego ye feletšego ka botlalo tla dirwa phatlalatša ge šetše hlagišeditšwe UNCRC.
tgt_text: Lama nyathelo akwaxhasa izibophelelo zelizwe kwiiNgqungquthela ze-UN malunga namaLungelo oMntwana (i-UNCRC) kunye noMqulu wase-Afrika wamaLungelo kunye neNtlalontle yoMntwana (i-ACRWC).

src_text: Pego ya Bosetšhaba phethagatšong ya Lenaneothero le Leswa la Metsesetoropo.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika watyikitya  kwi-UNCRC kunye ne-ACRWC.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go hlagišwa ga pego ya bosetšhaba ya mathomo ya Afrika Borwa ka phethagatšo ya Lenaneothero le Leswa la Metsesetoropo go Lenaneo la UN la Madulo Batho (UN-Habitat).
tgt_text: Ingxelo yaqulunqwa ngokubonisana namasebe karhulumente kunye neqela labathathi-nxaxheba abafanelekileyo kwinqanaba lesizwe nelephondo.

src_text: UN-Habitat amogetše Lenaneothero la yona le Leswa la Metsesetoropo kua Khonfereseng ya yona ka Dintlo le Tlhabollo ye Swarelelago ya Metsesetoropo ka Diphalane.
tgt_text: Ingxelo epheleleyo iza kufakwa kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe loPhuhliso loLuntu: www.dsd.gov.za.

src_text: Mebušo ye lego maloko lenaneo le go be bo letetšwe gore romele dipego ka boithaopo tša gore mošomo tlela kae.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yeXeshana eDityanisiweyo yoMzantsi Afrika yesithathu ukuya kweyesithandathu kwi-UNCRC.

src_text: Afrika Borwa thekgile go amogelwa ga Lenaneothero le Leswa la Metsesetoropo le go le phethagatša ka morago ga gore le amogelwe ka go šomiša Tlhako ya naga ye ya Mohlakanelwa ya Tlhabollo ya Metsesetoropo (IUDF).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukunikezelwa kweNgxelo yeXeshana lesithathu ukuya kwelesithandathu kwi-UNCRC.

src_text: Nepo ya IUDF ke go hlahla go hlabollwa ga madulo metsesetoropo go akaretša batho ka moka go tielela le go phelega..     Pego ye ya kgatelopele ya mošomo hlamilwe ka go rerišana pele le didiko tša mmušo tša bosetšhaba, tša profense le tša selegae gotee le di-NGO tše maleba.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ilandela iNgxelo yexeshana yesibini eyayithiwe thaca kwi-UNCRC ngowama-..     Ingxelo iqulunqwe ngokungqinelana neSiqendu 44 se-UNCRC, kwaye ikwabandakanya imigqaliselo kunye nezindululo ezenziwe kwingxelo yokugqibela.

src_text: Leanopeakanyo la Mohlakanelwa la Tlhabollo ya Baswa (IYDS).
tgt_text: I-UNCRC yayithumele imigqaliselo kunye neengcebiso zayo kweli lizwe ngo-..     Olu qulunqo lwenziwe ngodliwano-ndlebe nawo onke amasebe afanelekileyo nabachaphazelekayo kwilizwe liphela.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phethagatšwa ga IYDS.
tgt_text: Ingxelo epheleleyo iza kwaziswa eluntwini emva kokuba yondlelwe kwi-UNCRC.

src_text: Leanopeakanyo le le kgontšha Pholisi ya Bosetšhaba ya Baswa ya 2020 go fihla ka.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yeSizwe emalunga nokuphunyezwa kweNkqubo eNtsha yoPhuhliso lweDolophu.

src_text: Yona hlatholla magato, diprotšeke le mananeo ao tlo dirwago ke bakgathatema ba go fapafapana go tšwa dihlophaneng tša baswa swaragana gape le ka go fokotša go ipušeletša gantši ga magato mmušo le go fa tlhahlo ya ka fao mekgatlo ye lego setšhabeng le lefapha la praebete ka thekgago baswa gore ba ka ikhweletša bjang menyetla ya mešomo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa kwengxelo yokuqala yesizwe yoMzantsi Afrika emalunga nokuPhunyezwa kweNkqubo eNtsha yoPhuhliso lweDolophu kwiNkqubo yokuHlaliswa koLuntu ye-UN (i-UN-Habitat).

src_text: Ge go be go hlangwa leanopeakanyo le, mafapha go fapafapana setšhaba amegile go lona go fa dikgopolo le go ntšha sa bona sa mafahleng.
tgt_text: I-UN-Habitat yamkele iNkqubo eNtsha yoPhuhliso lweDolophu kwiNkomfa yayo yeZindlu kunye noPhuhliso oluZinzileyo lweDolophu kweyeDwarha  ngonyaka wama-.

src_text: Sengwalwa sa Makgoraditsela ka Pabalelo le Tšhomišano ye Swarelelago ya Diphedi tša go Fapafapana tša Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Amazwe angamalungu kwakulindeleke ukuba angenise iingxelo zenkqubela-phambili ngokuzithandela.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše seakanywa sa Mokgoraditsela ka Pabalelo le Tšhomišo ye Swarelelago ya Diphedi tša go Fapafapana tša Afrika Borwa gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uxhase ukwamkelwa kweNkqubo eNtsha yoPhuhliso lweDolophu waza emva koko wayizalisekisa ngeNkqubo-sikhokelo yelizwe eDityanisiweyo yoPhuhliso lweDolophu (i-IUDF).

src_text: Diphedi tša go fapafapana tša Afrika Borwa di fana ka motheo wo bohlokwa wa go kgontšha kgolo ya ikonomi le tlhabollo, ebile wona motheo wo tloga le bohlokwa kudu go lebeletšwe mekgwa yeo batho ba iphedišago ka yona..     Sengwalwa se sa makgoraditsela ke sona se kgontšhago ditšhišinyo tšeo di dirilwego ke Sehlopha sa Maemo Godimodimo sa Ditsebi tšeo di thwetšwego ka 2019 go fetleka dipholisi tša rena tša bjale, melao le ditlwaedi ka merero ya go amana kudu le diphedi tše tša mohuta wa moswananoši..     Pego ye šišintše gore go hlangwe pholisi ye akaretšago tšohle ka pabalelo le tšhomišo ye swareleago ya diphedi tša go fapafapana tša naga ye.
tgt_text: I-IUDF ijolise ekukhokeleni uphuhliso lweendawo zokuhlala ezisezidolophini ezibandakanyayo, ezikwaziyo ukuzimela nekuhlalekayo kuzo..     Ingxelo yenkqubela-phambili yaqulunqwa ngokubonisana norhulumente wesizwe, wephondo nowengingqi, kunye neeNGO ezifanelekileyo.

src_text: Pholisi ye tla phethagatšwa go ralala didiko ka moka tša mmušo.
tgt_text: ISicwangciso esiHlangeneyo soPhuhliso loLutsha (i-IYDS).

src_text: Pabalelo tloga le bohlokwa lesolong la naga ye la go akgofiša kgolo ya ikonomi le tlhomo ya mešomo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyamkele i-IYDS ukuba iphunyezwe.

src_text: Leanopeakanyo la Nama ya Diphoofolo tša Lešoka.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga siphumeza uMgaqo-nkqubo woLutsha weSizwe wowama-2020-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ga seakanywa sa Leanopeakanyo la Nama ya Diphoofolo tša Lešoka gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona.
tgt_text: Ichaza amanyathelo, iiprojekthi kunye neenkqubo eziza kwenziwa ngabathathi-nxaxheba abohlukeneyo abavela kumaqumrhu olutsha.

src_text: Leanopeakanyo le le šeditše go botsefatša le go fetoša gabotse intasteri ya nama ya diphoofolo tša lešoka.
tgt_text: Ikwajongene nokuncitshiswa kokuphindwa kongenelelo lukarhulumente kwaye ikhokele indlela uluntu kunye necandelo labucala abanokuxhasa ngayo abantu abatsha ekufikeleleni kumathuba.

src_text: Le šetšane gape le go kgatha tema tšhireletšegong ya dijo ka mokgwa wo swarelelago.
tgt_text: Ukuqulunqwa kwesi sicwangciso kubandakanye amagalelo ahlukeneyo avela kumacandelo ngamacandelo oluntu.

src_text: Intasteri ya nama ya diphoofolo tša lešoka ka boati ke intasteri ya go se lefišwe metšhelo ya go šoma thokwana le noši.
tgt_text: IPhepha leNgcaciso eYilwayo yoLondolozo kunye noSetyenziso oluZinzileyo lweZityalo eZiphilayo zaseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Leanopeakanyo le le šišintšwego le fana ka leano la phethagatšo leo le tla botsefatšago le go matlafatša intasteri ye bjalo ka bobedi moabi wa tšhireletšego ya dijo le lefapha la kgolo ya ikonomi leo le tla thušago go hloma menyetla ya mešomo     Melaokakanywa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iluvumile uyilo lwePhepha leNgcaciso yoMgaqo-nkqubo ngoLondolozo kunye noSetyenziso oluZinzileyo lweZityalo eZiphilayo zaseMzantsi Afrika ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Molaokakanywaphetošwa ka Kakaretšo wa 2022 wa Merero ya Setšo.
tgt_text: Iintlobo-ntlobo zezityalo nezilwanyana zaseMzantsi Afrika zibonelela ngesiseko esibalulekileyo sokukhula koqoqosho nophuhliso, kwaye zikwa balulekile nakubomi babantu.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go hlagišwa Palamenteng ga Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2022 wa Merero ya Setšo gore Palamente go sekaseke goya pele.
tgt_text: Eli Phepha leNgcaciso yoMgaqo-nkqubo lenza ukuba zisebenze izindululo ezenziwe liGqiza leeNgcali elikwiNqanaba eliPhezulu elalonyulwe ngowama-2019 ukuba lihlole imigaqo-nkqubo yethu yeli xesha, imithetho kunye nezenzo kwimiba enxulumene neentlobo zezilwanyana ezidumileyo.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di šetšane le go fetleka Molao wa Setšo le wa Boetapele bja maKhoi-San, 2019 (Molao 3 wa 2019), wo tsentšwego tirišong ka la 1 Moranang.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo icebise ngokuqulunqwa komgaqo-nkqubo obanzi wolondolozo nokusetyenziswa ngokuzinzileyo kwezityalo nezilwanyana zelizwe.

src_text: Molaokakanywaphethošwa wa 2022 wa Tšhireletšo ya Temokrasi ya Molaotheo Kgahlanong le Ditiragalo tša Matšhošetši le tše dingwe tša go amana le tšona.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uza kuphunyezwa kuwo onke amanqanaba karhulumente.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go hlagišwa Palamenteng ga Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2022 ka Tšhireletšo ya Temokrasi ya Molaotheo Kgahlanong le Matšhošetši le tše dingwe tša go amana le ona gore Palamente go sekaseke goyapele.
tgt_text: Ulondolozo lubalulekile kwiphulo lelizwe lokukhawulezisa ukukhula koqoqosho nokudala imisebenzi.

src_text: Ge šetše amogetšwe, Molaokakanywa wo tla fetoša Molao wa bjale wa Tšhireletšo ya Temokrasi ya Molaotheo Kgahlanong le Matšhošetši le Ditiragalo tša go Amana le ona, 2004 (Molao 33 wa 2004).
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-qhinga esimalunga nenyama yenyamakazi.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo fetile pele ditherišanong tšeo di tseneletšego tša setšhaba morago ga gore dumelelwe ke Kabinete ka Mopitlo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa  kwesiCwangciso-qhinga esisayilwayo seNyama yenyamakazi ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di šetšane le go bea madulong didirišwa tšeo di tšweleditšwego ka nageng ye tša go lwantšha matšhošetši gotee le magato lefaseng ka bophara ao hlomilwego.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sijonge ukuvumela ngokusesikweni kunye nokuguqula ishishini lenyama yenyamakazi.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di šogašogane gape le ditemana tšeo go tšeerwego sephetho ke Kgorotsheko ya Molaotheo sa gore ga di gate ka mošito tee le Molaotheo.
tgt_text: Sikwafuna ukufaka isandla ekuqinisekeni kokuba khona kokutya ngendlela ezinzileyo.

src_text: Bjalo ka ye nngwe ya naga ye lego leloko la Khansele ya UN ya Tšhireletšego, Afrika Borwa tlamegile goya ka mohola wa yona go batametša kgauswi melao ya boditšhabatšhaba yeo šetšanego le go maatlafatša magato le go lwantšha matšhošetši lefaseng ka bophara     Ditiragalo tše di Tlago.
tgt_text: Ishishini lenyama yenyamakazi ubukhulu becala lishishini elingekho sikweni elisebenza ngendlela engafaniyo.

src_text: Samiti ya bo-14 ya Brazil, Russia, India, China le Afrika Borwa (BRICS).
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sicetywayo sibonelela ngesicwangciso somiliselo esiza kumisela ngokusesikweni kwaye someleze eli candelo njengababoneleli bokutya kunye necandelo lohlumo loqoqosho elinokunceda ekudaleni amathuba emisebenzi     Umthetho osayilwayo.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla eta pele go kgatha tema ga Afrika Borwa Samiting ya bo-14 ya go swarwa ka dikgokagano tša bidio ya Baetapele ba BRICS yeo swerwego ke Rephabliki ya Bohle ya China go thoma ka Labone, 23 go fihla ka Labohlano, 24 Phupu.
tgt_text: UMthetho osaYilwayo oLungisiweyo weMicimbi yezeMveli wowama-.
IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa koMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weMicimbi yezeMveli  wowama-2022 ePalamente ukuze uqhubeke nokuqhutywa.

src_text: Maloko rena BRICS ba tšwelapele go hola naga ye.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo zifuna ukuhlaziya uMthetho wobuNkokheli beMveli nobu-Khoi-San, wowama-2019 (uMthetho wesi-3 wama-2019), oqale ukusebenza ngomhla woku-1 kuTshazimpuzi ngowama-.

src_text: Ngwageng wa go feta, diromelwantle tša go feta 17% tša Afrika Borwa di be di nepišitšwe dinageng tše dingwe tša BRICS, le gona palomoka ya go feta 29% ya ditšwantle tša rena di be di tšwa go tšona dinaga tše.
tgt_text: Umthetho osaYilwayo Wokukhuselwa kweNtando yesininzi yoMgaqo-siseko ngokuchasene nabanqolobi kunye neMisebenzi eNxulumene nabo wama-..     IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente koMthetho osaYilwayo wokuKhuselwa kweNtando yesininzi yoMgaqo-siseko ngokuchasene nabanqolobi kunye neMisebenzi eNxulumeneyo nabo wama-2022 ukuba iqhutywelwe phambili.

src_text: Boleng bja theko ya kgwebišano ye bo tšwelapele go golela godimo, ka palomoka ya dikgwebišano tša Afrika Borwa le dinaga tše dingwe tša BRICS batamela R702 bilione ka 2021, morago ga gore golele godimo go tloga go R487 bilione ka.
tgt_text: Wakuba wamkelwe, lo Mthetho uYilwayo uza kuhlomela uMthetho okhoyo ngoku woKhuseleko lweNtando yesininzi yoMgaqo-siseko ekuchasene nabanqolobi neMisebenzi eNxulumeneyo nabo, wama-2004 (uMthetho wama-33 wama-2004).
Emveni  kokuba uvunyiwe lo mthetho usayilwayo yiKhabhinethi kuCanzibe wama-2021, uye waba kwinkqubo yokubonisana noluntu ngokubanzi.

src_text: Tšhomišanommogo gare ga dinaga tše lego maloko BRICS magorong go fapafapana go swana le maphelo le dikgwebišanong tše kaonafetšego godišitše intasteri ya ka mo nageng, le go hola dinaga ka moka tše lego maloko BRICS.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo zifuna ukulungelelanisa iindlela zokusebenza zeli lizwe zokulwa nobunqolobi kunye nemilinganiselo yehlabathi esele ibekiwe.

src_text: Dipeeletšo tša rena diprotšekeng tša tlhabollo ya mananeokgoparara le matsapa go fokotša go raragana ga magatotshepedišo mmušo ge go dirwa kgwebo di nepile go oketša diromelwantle go bagwebišani ba rena ba BRICS.
tgt_text: Kwakhona kuphinde kwajongwana  namagatya ayethe athathwa njenga magatya angekho kumgaqo-siseko yiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko.

src_text: Sekolo sa Marega sa Tshepedišo ya Ikonomi Mmušong.
tgt_text: Nanjenge lizwe elityikitye kwiBhunga loKhuseleko le-UN, uMzantsi Afrika ubophelelekile ukuba ube nemithetho yamazwe ngamazwe ezama ukomeleza amanyathelo okulwa nobunqolobi behlabathi     Imisitho Ezayo.

src_text: Sekolotlhahlo sa Bosetšhaba sa Mmušo (NSG) se tla be se swere Lenaneo la sona la Boraro la Balaodiphethiši ba tša Dipolotiki gola Johannesburg go thoma ka la 27 Phupu go fihla ka la 1 Mosegamanye.
tgt_text: INkomfa ye-14 yase-Brazil, i-Russia, i-India, i-China noMzantsi Afrika (i-BRICS).

src_text: Thuto ye go yona go tla tla Ditona go tšwa Côte d'Ivoire; Borwa bja Sudan le Afrika Borwa gotee le Balaodipharephare ba go tšwa Lesotho, Zambia, DRC, Tanzania le Ghana.
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa uza kukhokela uMzantsi Afrika ekuthatheni inxaxheba kwiNkomfa ye-14 yeeNkokheli ze-BRICS ebanjwe yiRiphablikhi yase-China ukusuka ngoLwesine, umhla wama-23 ukuya kuLwesihlanu, umhla wama-24 kweyeSilimela ngowama-..     Ubulungu bethu be-BRICS busaqhubeka bunceda ilizwe.

src_text: Dimeyara tša Afrika Borwa, gotee le maloko dikomiti tša meyara le makgotlaphethiši le bona ba tla ba gona..     Go letetšwe gore baetapelephethiši ba sepolotiki go tšwa dinageng tša go fapafapana ba ngwathelane dikgopolo le tšeo ba ithutilego go tšwa go tšona maemong go fapafapana ditiragalo ao ba itemogetšego ona mešomong ya bona ya tšatši ka tšatši.
tgt_text: Kulo nyaka uphelileyo ngaphezulu kwe-17% yempahla ethunyelwa ngaphandle yaseMzantsi Afrika ithunyelwe kwamanye amazwe e-BRICS, kwaye ngaphezulu kwama-29% empahla engene kweli lizwe isuka kula mazwe.

src_text: NSG hlamile lenaneo la ngwaga ka ngwaga go maloko lekgotlakhuduthamaga ka 2020, bjalo ka karolo ya thekgo ya lona ya boikgafo bja mmušo bja go hlola mmušo wo kgonago.
tgt_text: Ixabiso lolu rhwebo liyaqhubeleka nokukhula, urhwebo loMzantsi Afrika lulonke namanye amazwe e-BRICS lufikelele kwiibhiliyoni zeerandi ezingama-R702 ngowama-2021, lusuka kwiibhiliyoni zeerandi ezingama- R487 zonyaka wama-.

src_text: Lenaneo le, magareng ga tše dingwe, le šetšane le go tlabela lekgotlakhuduthamaga ka tsebo mo didikong tše tharo tša mmušo ka boetapele bjo bjo kaonafetšego le mabokgoni go bea leihlo mošomo wo dirilwego gore go kgonagale go lekolaleswa ditlhotlo tša pušo tšeo di šitišago go akaretšwa ga bohle le kgolo yeo swarelelago ya ikonomi.
tgt_text: Ukusebenzisana phakathi kwamalungu e-BRICS kwiinkalo ezahlukeneyo ezifana nezempilo kunye norhwebo olwandisiweyo kukhulise ishishini lethu lasekhaya, kwaye kwanceda onke amalungu e-BRICS.

src_text: Letšatši la Boditšhabatšhaba la Nelson Mandela.
tgt_text: Utyalo-mali lwethu kwiiprojekthi zophuhliso lweziseko ezingundoqo kunye neenzame zokunciphisa imiqathango esetyenziswayo xa sisenza ushishino lujolise ekwandiseni ukuthunyelwa kwempahla kumazwe angaphandle angamahlakani ethu e-BRICS.

src_text: Letšatši la Boditšhabatšhaba la Nelson Mandela la lenyaga ka Mošupologo, 18 Mosegamanye le tla ketekelwa ka fase ga morero wa lefase ka bophara wo latelago: “Dira se se kgonago, ka seo nago le sona, kae goba kae mo lego gona”.
tgt_text: ISikolo esiqhutywa ngexesha laseBusika soLawulo loQoqosho.

src_text: Bjo ke boipiletšo bjo bo kwalakwaditšwego gore batho ba thekge le go kgatha tema lesolong le ka go logišana maano magato ao swarelelago nako ye telele go ba le ditlamorago tša go tšea telele.
tgt_text: ISikolo sikaRhulumente seSizwe (i-NSG) siza kubamba iNkqubo yaso yesithathu yaseBusika yoLawulo lwezoQoqosho yaBaphathi bezoPolitiko eRhawutini ukusuka ngomhla wama-27 kweyeSilimela ukuya kowoku-1 kweyeKhala kulo nyaka wama-.

src_text: Ye nngwe ya magato mohuta wo ke Dipoledišano tša Baswa tša Nelson Mandela le Lenaneo la Boetapele bja Potego leo le lebeletšego kudu merero ye diragalago gona bjale ya go ama baswa ka mo Afrika Borwa le go potologa lefase ka bophara.
tgt_text: Iza kube izinyaswe ngabaPhathiswa abavela e-Côte d'Ivoire; i-South Sudan noMzantsi Afrika; kunye nabaLawuli-Jikelele abavela e-Lesotho, e-Zambia, e-Democratic Republic of Congo, e-Tanzania nase-Ghana.

src_text: Sehla sa Metšhelo.
tgt_text: Oosodolophu boMzantsi Afrika, kwakunye namalungu eekomiti zosodolophu namabhunga alawulayo, nabo baza kuba yinxalenye yesi sikolo..     Abaphathi bezopolitiko abavela kumazwe ahlukeneyo kulindeleke ukuba babelane ngezimvo kunye nezifundo kwiimeko ezahlukeneyo abazifumanayo kwimisebenzi yabo yemihla ngemihla.

src_text: Sehla sa go faela metšhelo ya 2022 se tla bulwa go thoma ka la 1 Mosegamanye go fihla ka la 24 Diphalane.
tgt_text: I-NSG iyile inkqubo yonyaka yamalungu esigqeba ngo-2020, njengenxalenye yenkxaso yayo ekuzinikeleni  kukarhulumente ekwakheni urhulumente okwaziyo ukusebenza.

src_text: Balefametšhelo ba hlohleletšwa go faela bohlatse bja bona bja tefo ya metšhelo mo go eFiling (www.sarsefiling.co.za) goba mo go MobiApp, elego sedirišwa sa Ditirelo tša Metšhelo tša Afrika Borwa (SARS)..     Ngwaga wo SARS tla tšwelapele ka go sekaseka balefametšhelo ka tee ka tee ka mokgwa wa go itiriša ka noši lego mokgwa wa go lefiša metšhelo ya letseno wo tlabetšwego pele ga nako go thuša go nolofatša tshepedišo ye ya go romela bohlatse bja tefo ya metšhelo.
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezinye izinto, ijonge ukuxhobisa abalawuli abakumanqanaba amathathu karhulumente ngobunkokeli nobuchule bokubeka iliso ukuze bakwazi ukuphonononga  imingeni yolawulo ethintela ubandakanyo kunye nohlumo kwezoqoqosho oluzinzileyo.

src_text: Ka 2021 balefametšhelo ba go feta dimilione tše tharo ba sekasekilwe ka ona mokgwa wo wa go itiriša ka noši.
tgt_text: USuku luka-Nelson Mandela lweHlabathi.

src_text: Thomelo ya bonako le ye nepagetšego ya bohlatse bja metšhelo ga netefatše fela gore balefametšhelo ba dula ba latela molao eupša thuša mmušo go abela MaAfrika Borwa ditirelo tšeo ba di hlokago kudu     Melaetša.
tgt_text: Kulo unyaka uSuku luka-Nelson Mandela lweHlabathi  oluzakube lungoMvulo, umhla we-18 kweyeKhala ngowama-2022 luza kubhiyozelwa phantsi komxholo wehlabathi jikelele othi: “Yenza onako, ukwenza ngoko onako, naphi na apho ukhoyo”.

src_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebišitše ditebogišo tša yona le go lakaletša bao ba latelago mahlogonolo: Moahlodi Owen Lloyd Rogers morago ga gore thwalwe malobanyana mo bjalo ka Moahlodi wa Kgorotsheko ya Molaotheo ya Afrika Borwa.Kabinete bile le Mopresidente Ramaphosa go lakaletša Mopresidente wa peleng Thabo Mbeki Letšatši le Lethabo la Matswalo Mengwaga ye 80 leo le ketekilego ka la 18 Phupu.
tgt_text: Likhwelo elicacileyo lokuba abantu baxhase kwaye bathathe inxaxheba kwiphulo ngokufaka igalelo kungenelelo oluzinzileyo olunefuthe elizakuhlala lihleli.

src_text: Morena Mbeki ke wo mongwe wa go bonelapele bokamoso bjo bjo gadimago bja šebešebe bja MaAfrika Borwa ka moka     Bao ba Thwetšwego MešomongBatho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona thuto tlo tiišetšwa le go netefatšwa ka tsela ye maleba.
tgt_text: Olunye ungenelelo oluzinzileyo yiNkqubo yaminyaka le yeNgxoxo yoLutsha kunye neNkqubo yobuNkokheli bokuziphatha egxile kwimiba engumxholo ephathelene nolutsha eMzantsi Afrika nakwihlabathi liphela.

src_text: Balaodi bao sego ba Lekgotlaphethiši ba Lekgotlataolo la Afrika Borwa la Diphofo     Ntate Ernest Khosa     Mme Bulelwa Koyana     Ntate Surendra Sooklal; led.
tgt_text: Ixesha leRhafu.

src_text: Mme Rejoice Edith Phewa.
tgt_text: Ixesha lokufakwa kwerhafu yama-2022 liya kuvulwa ukususela ngomhla woku-1 kweyeKhala ukuya kowama-24 kweyeDwarha.

src_text: Maloko Kantoro ya Kutullo ya Dikadimo tša Magae le Kutullo ya Dipeelo     Mme Kenosi Pearl Louisa Selane (Modulasetulo)     Mme Catharina Maria Van der Sandt     Ntate Errol Vincent Magerman     Moadbokheiti Mandla Dludlu     Morena Matsobane Gabriel Mello     Mme Palesa Mawasha     Mme Penelope Anne Beck-Paxton     Mme Sphiwe Dorris Mayinga     Mme Tshifhiwa Victor Mphigalale; lej.
tgt_text: Abahlawuli berhafu bayakhuthazwa ukuba bafake imbuyekezo yabo yerhafu apha ku-eFiling (www.sarsefiling.co.za) okanye  kwi-MobiApp yeNkonzo yeRhafu yoMzantsi Afrika (i-SARS).

src_text: Tsebišo ka Seemo sa Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Ezintsha malunga neSifo seNtsholongwane ye-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Kabinete lebogišitše batho ka moka mo Afrika Borwa ge ba tšeere sephetho sa go hlaba meento le go latela ditshepedišo ka moka tša COVID-19  tšeo pheletšo ya tšona kgontšhitšego naga ye go efoga palo ye hlatlogelago godimo ya diphetelo tše diswa ka nako ya leuba la bohlano la bolwetši bjo..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyababulela bonke abantu eMzantsi Afrika abathe bakhetha ukuzigonya nokuthobela imiqathango ye-COVID-19 into leyo ebangele ukuba eli lizwe likwazi ukunqanda ukunyuka kwamanani abantu abasolulelwa okokuqala yi-COVID-19 ngethuba lomsinga wesihlanu walo bhubhane.

src_text: Le ge go le bjalo, ga se ra swanela go iketla kudu ka ge COVID-19 santše sale gona.
tgt_text: Noko kunjalo, kufuneka singayekeleli umxakatho njengoko i-COVID-19 isagquba.

src_text: Le ge le gore malobanyana mo naga fedišitše dinyakwa tša kgapeletšo tša go apara dimaseke mafelong bohle, batho ba go ba le malwetši mangwe le bao ba sa ntšego ba lwala ba hlohleletšwa go tšwelapele go apara dimaseke.
tgt_text: Nangona eli lizwe likuphelisile ukunxitywa ngokunyanzelekileyo kwesifonyo esidlangalaleni, abantu abanezifo ezinganyangekiyo kunye nabo bagulayo bayakhuthazwa ukuba baqhubeleke nokunxiba izifonyo.

src_text: Re swanetše go tšwelapele go hlapa matsogo rena goba go sanithaesa, le gape go šielana sekgala le go netefatša gore go hlabela moya ka tsela ye maleba..  Meento santše le mokgwa wa go itšhireletša malwetšing wo hlatsetšwego ka sesaentshe kgahlanong le COVID-19 ebile Kabinete hlohleletša batho ka moka bao ba sa kago ba hlaba meento go ya go hlaba meento ya bona ya go tsošeletša mafelong kgauswi le bona go hlaba meento ntle le tefo..  Mabora dikgabo.
tgt_text: Futhi kufuneka siqhubeleke nokuhlamba izandla okanye nokuzifefa ngesibulala-ntsholongwane, futhi singasondelelani zize neendawo esikuzo zibethe umoya..     Ugonyo lixhadi esinalo elikuphela kwalo eliqinisekisiweyo zinzululwazi lokulwa i-COVID-19 kwaye iKhabhinethi ikhuthaza bonke abantu abangagonywanga ukuba baye kugonya ngokukhawuleza baze bona abo sele begonyiwe baye kufumana ichiza elisimahla lokomeleza amajoni omzimba kumaziko akufutshane okugonya.

src_text: Kabinete sedimošitšwe ka seemo sa moragorago seo se gatetšego pele mabapi le go phatlalala ga Mabora Dikgabo ka mo nageng morago ga kgonthišišo ye lokolotšwego ya moragorago ya gore go na le motho wa bobedi yo nago le bolwetši bjo ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Isifo i-Monkeypox.

src_text: Batho bao ba fetetšwego ba ipeetše thoko ka magaeng bona ebile lesolo la go lota mehlala ya batho bao ba ka bego ba kgokagane le bona le gare le kgatlampana go ba humana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inikwe ingxelo malunga nezintsha ngokunwenwa kwesifo se-Monkeypox kweli lizwe emva kokufunyanwa komntu wesibini onesi sifo kweli lizwe.
Aba bantu bafunywenwe banesi sifo kungokunje bazivalele bodwa kumawabo kwaye kusalandelelwa kubo bonke abantu abadibene nabo ukukhangela ukuba ingaba bakhona na abanye abantu abosulelwe sesi sifo.

src_text: Kgoro ya Maphelo le Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Malwetši ao Fetelanago se šomišana mmogo le Mokgatlo wa Lefase wa tša Maphelo go lekola kotsi ya diphetelo tša ka mo nageng ka go sepedišana le Melao ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Maphelo..   Baerase ye ya Mabora Dikgabo ga phatlalale bonolo ebile phetelo ya gona gantši diragala morago ga go kgomana go swana le go atlana, go kgwathakgwathana goba go swaraswara ditho tša mmele tša go ba le dišo tša motho wa go swarwa ke mabora dikgabo.
tgt_text: ISebe lezeMpilo kunye neZiko leSizwe leziFo ezoSulelayo (i-NICD) basebenzisana noMbutho wezeMpilo weHlabathi (i-WHO) ukujonga amathuba okunwenwa kwesi sifo kweli njengoko isitsho iMigaqo yezeMpilo yeHlabathi.

src_text: Batho bao ba se nago dika tša mabora dikgabo ga go kgonagale gore ba fetetše ba bangwe ka baerase ye..  Kabinete eleditše batho bao ba itemogelago dika tša letadi, dika tša go tlwaelega tša go swana le tša mokhohlane, le menyabidi ya mmala wo mohubitšwana go bega ditiragalo tše dikliniking tša maphelo tša kgauswi le bona gore bolwetši bjo bo humanwe ka bonako le go phekolwa..  Masetlapelo Thabeneng ya East London.
tgt_text: Intsholongwane ye-monkeypox ayosuleli lula, yosulela xa abantu bethe basondelelana kakhulu besenza izinto ezifana nokuphuzana, ukucofa-cofana okanye ukubamba-bambana amalungu omzimba anamaqhakuva esi sifo.

src_text: Masetlapelo go tšhabiša namana tša mmele kua Thabeneng ya Enyobeni gola East London Profenseng ya Kapa Bohlabela ka la 26 Phupu 2022 ao tšeerego maphelo batšwamahlalaging ba 21 tšhošitše kudu batho ka moka ka nageng.
tgt_text: Abantu abangenazimpawu ze-monkeypox abayisasazi le ntsholongwane..     IKhabhinethi icebisa abantu ababonakalisa iimpawu zomkhuhlane ezithi zilandelwe ngamaqhakuva angathi ngamadyunguza ukuba baye kwiziko lezempilo elikufutshane ukuze baxilongwe baze banyangwe.

src_text: Go tloga go le boima kudu go gopola ka tlalelo ya malapa bao ba lobilego bana ba bona ka mokgwa wo wo sehlogo..  Kabinete lebišitše melaetša ya yona ya mahloko go malapa ao lobilego bao ba phelago le bona le go leboga motho mang le mang ka thekgo ya bona ya moya wa botho go malapa ao llelago metswalle ya bona mo nakong ye ye boima..  Go hlobaetša gore bana ba bannyane ba mengwaga ya go lekana 13 ba ile ba dumelelwa go tsena lefelong leo le go gamola madila.
tgt_text: Inyhikityha enyenzeke kwibhari yaseMonti.

src_text: Re dira boipiletšo bathong ka moka setšhabeng go kgatha tema ya bona go dira gore bana ba dule ba bolokegile ka dinako tšohle..  Bana ba mengwaga ya ka fase ga ye 18 ga ba dumelelwe go tsena ka dipareng, ka dithebeneng, le ka mabenkeleng go rekiša madila.
tgt_text: Inyhikityha embi eyenzeke e-Enyobeni eMonti kwiphondo laseMpuma Koloni ngeCawe, umhla wama-26 kweyeSilimela 2022 apho kusweleke abantu abatsha abangama-21, ilishiye eli lizwe lidandathekile.

src_text: Bagwebi ba madila bao go ka humanwago ba gataka ye mengwe ya melao ye ba swanetše go pharwa ka bosenyi le go tšeelwa dilaesense tša bona tša go rekiša madila..  Dipoelo go tšwa Samiting ya Baetapele ba Seboka sa Dinaga tše Šupa (G7).
tgt_text: Ayinakulinganiswa intlungu azibona ekuyo la makhaya ashiywe ngabantwana bawo kabuhlungu kangaka..     IKhabhinethi ithi akuhlanga lungehliyo kwiintsapho eziphantsi kwelifu elimnyama kwaye ibulela wonke umntu othe wanikezela ngoncedo lwezentlalontle kwezi ntsapho zisentlungwini.

src_text: Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa kgathile tema Samiting ya Baetapele ba Seboka sa Dinaga tše Šupa (G7) yeo bego swaretšwe kua Bavaria, Germany ka Mošupologo, 27 Phupu.
tgt_text: Iyaxhalabisa into yokuba iimveku ezineminyaka eli-13 zivunyelwe ukuba zingene kule ndawo yentselo zize zivunyelwe nokuba zisele utywala.

src_text: Mopresidente – yo kgathilego tema dikopanong tša mošomo fao go tšona go ahlaahlilwego merero ya klaemete, mohlagase, maphelo le tšhireletšego ya dijo lefaseng ka bophara – be memilwe ke moswarakopano ye, Mokhanseliri Olaf Scholz..  G7 ke foramo ya sepolotiki ya magareng ga didiko tša mmušo ya go hlangwa ke Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom le Amerika  Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: Sicela uluntu ukuba nalo luncedise ludlale indima yalo ngokuthi luqinisekise ukuba abantwana bakhuselekile ngalo lonke ixesha..     Abantwana abaneminyaka engaphantsi kwe-18 abavumelekanga ukuba bangene kwiithaveni, izimokolo, iipotsoyi zotywala nasezibharini.

src_text: Seakanywa sa Melao ya Lefapha la Semolao (Seakanywa sa LSC).
tgt_text: Oosomashishini botywala abafunyaniswe besophula nawuphi na kule mithetho baza kubekwa ityala zize iilayisenisi zabo zotywala zithathwe.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletšwe go phatlalatšwa ga Seakanywa sa LSC gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona.
tgt_text: Iziphumo zeNgqungquthela yeeNkokeli zamaZwe aTyebileyo asi-7 (i-G7).

src_text: Dinepo tša melao ye ke go kgontšha diphetogo ka lefapheng la semolao go fihlelela tekatekano ya batho goya le ka dipalopalo tša ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: UMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa uthabathe inxaxheba kwiNgqungquthela yeeNkokheli ze-G7 ebibanjelwe e-Bavaria, e-Germany, ngomhla wama-27 kweyeSilimela.

src_text: Melao ye tla netefatša gape le gore go ba le setheo seo se tla tšweletšago baabaditirelo bao ba hlahlilwego gabotse le ba bokgoni ditirelong tša semolao.
tgt_text: UMongameli – othathe inxaxheba kwiintlanganiso ebezigwadla imiba enxulumene nemozulu, ezamandla, ezempilo, amaphulo okuqinisekiswa ukuba kukho ukutya okwaneleyo kwihlabathi kunye nolingwano ngokwesini – ebemenywe yiNgqonyela u-Olaf Scholz, ebinguye ebesingathe le Ngqungquthela.
