src_text: Go hlangwa ga Seakanywa se sa LSC go lekotšwe ke Khansele ya Phethagatšo ya Semolao bago setheo sa mmušo seo se hlamilwego goya ka Karolo 4 ya Molao wa Phethagatšo ya Semolao, 2014 (Molao 28 wa 2014) le go hlahlwa ke Molao wa Matlafatšo ya Ikonomi ya Bathobaso yeo Nabilego (B-BBEE), 2013 (Molao 46 wa 2013).
tgt_text: I-G7 liqumrhu lezopolitiko loorhulumene abahlukeneyo eliquka i-Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom kunye ne-United States     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Molao wa B-BBEE wa 2013 bolela ka gore Tona ya Dikgwebišano, Diintasteri le Diphenkgišano tla lokolla ditlhathollo tša phethagatšo ye maleba matlafatšong ya ikonomi ya bathobaso mo mafapheng go ikgetha.
tgt_text: ImiGaqo eYilwayo yeCandelo lezoMthetho (i-LSC eYilwayo).

src_text: Maloko profešene ya semolao ka motsotso wo ga ba na melao ya lefapha le ya go ba hlahla go kalokana le go fetafetana le go se lekalekane profešeneng ya semolao.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba ipapashwe i-LSC eYilwayo ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Seakanywa sa LSC se tlo phatlalatšwa ka gare ga Kuranta ya Mmušo mo matšatšing 60 go dumelela setšhaba go fa ditshwayotshwayo tša sona..  Dipego tša Kgatelopele ya Mošomo tša go Lokollwa Gabedi mo Ngwageng.
tgt_text: Iinjongo zale migaqo kukukhokela amaphulo okwenza iinguqu kwicandelo lezomthetho ukuze zonke iintlanga zeli lizwe zikwazi ukuthatha inxaxheba kulo ngokulinganayo.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše dipego tša kgatelopele ya mošomo tša go lokollwa gabedi mo ngwageng tša go thoma ka Diphalane 2021 go fihla ka Hlakola.
tgt_text: Le migaqo iza kuqinisekisa nokuba kuswekwa iqumrhu eliza kuvelisa iingcali zezomthetho eziqeqeshwe zacokiswa futhi nezinezakhono ezigqibeleleyo.

src_text: Dipego tše di bopa karolo ya Tlhako ye Logetšwego Maano ya Paka ya Magareng (MTSF) ya 2019-.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yokuqulunqa le-LSC iYilwayo ibikhokelwa liBhunga leCandelo lezoMthetho, eliliqumrhu elisemthethweni elisekwe ngokweCandelo 4 loMthetho weCandelo lezoMthetho, wowama-2014 (uMthetho uNombl 28 wowama-2014) likhokelwa nguMthetho woPhuhliso oluBanzi lwabaMnyama ngezoQoqosho (i-B-BBEE), wowama-2013 (uMthetho uNombl 46 wowama-2013).

src_text: MTSF ya 2019-2024 ke leano la phethagatšo le tlhako ya go lekola mošomo ya go fihlelela Leanotlhabollo la Bosetšhaba: dinyakwa tše beilwego pele tša Ponelopele ya 2030 go basepediši ba lekga la boselela la mmušo.
tgt_text: UMthetho we-B-BBEE wowama-2013 ugunyazisa uMphathiswa wezoRhwebo, uShishino noKhuphiswano ukuba akhuphe imigaqo yokuziphatha ngokufanelekileyo ngokumayelana nokuphuhliswa kwabamnyama ngezoqoqosho kumacandelo athile.

src_text: Dipego tše di be di šetšane le ditlapele tše šupa tša mmušo lego (1) Diphetogo tša ikonomi le tlhomo ya mešomo; (2) Thuto, mabokgoni le tša maphelo; (3) Go kopantšha mmogo meputso ya leago ka ditirelo tša go botega le tše hlwahlwa tša motheo; (4) Go momaganywa ga mafelo, madulo batho le pušoselegae; (5) Phedišano setšhabeng le setšhaba sa go bolokega; (6) Mmušo wa bokgoni, wa potego le wo gatelago pele; le (7) Afrika le lefase le kaonafetšego, le magato go amana le go rarolla seemo basepediši ba mmušo ba lekga la boselela..  Kabinete amogetše magoro mošomo wo gatetšego pele godimo ga dinepo tšeo di theilwego tša paka ye re lego ka gare ga yona.
tgt_text: Amalungu ecandelo lezomthetho kungokunje awanayo imigaqo yokuziphatha yecandelo ezakuwakhokhela kumalinge okulungisa nokungalingani nokungaxhamli ngokulinganayo kwicandelo lezomthetho.

src_text: Kabinete lemogile gape le magoro ao nyakago magato gore go tle go fedišwe go nanya ga seemo seo se amilwego gampe ke leuba la COVID-.
tgt_text: I-LSC eYilwayo iza kupapashwa kwiGazethi kaRhulumente iintsuku ezingama-60 ukwenzela ukuba uluntu luhlomle..     Iingxelo zonyaka-mbini zenkqubo yomsebenzi.
IKhabhinethi izivumile iingxelo zikanyaka-mbini zenkqubo yomsebenzi zesithuba esisuka kwinyanga yeDwarha yowama-2021 ukuya kweyoKwindla wowama-.

src_text: Ditona di tlo swara ditshedimošetšo tša babegaditaba mo dibekeng tše tlago go hlatholla dipego tša bona ka go latelana ga tšona le go hlalošiša magoro ao go ona mošomo swanetšego go tiišeletšwa letsogo  Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.
tgt_text: Ezi ngxelo ziyinxalenye yesiCwangciso-sikhokelo esiQiqisiweyo saPhakathi koNyaka (i-MTSF) sowama-2019-.

src_text: Khonferense ya Bahlomi ba Diinstasteri ba Bathobaso le ya Baromela ka Ntle ga Naga (BIEC).
tgt_text: I-MTSF yowama-2024 sisicwangciso sokuphumeza kunye nesikhokelo sokuhlola ukuze kufezekiswe izinto ezikhokeliswe phambili zalo mbuso uthathe iintambo zolawulo ngowama-2018 zesiCwanciso soPhuhliso seSizwe (i-NDP): uMbono wama-..     Ezi ngxelo zigxininisa kwimiba ephambili esixhenxe karhulumente, eyile (1) iiNguqu kwezoQoqosho nokudalwa kwemisebenzi; (2) ezeMfundo, izakhono nezempilo; (3) Ukuhlawulwa kwezibonelelo-mali zentlalo ngokuthi kusetyenziswa iinkonzo ezisisiseko ezisemgangathweni nezithembekileyo; (4) Ukuhlaliswa kwabantu abahlukeneyo endaweni enye, ukuhlaliswa koluntu kunye norhulumente wengingqi; (5) Ukuhlalisana ngoxolo kweentlanga ezahlukeneyo nokhuseleko loluntu; (6) umbuso onezakhono, othembekileyo nokhokelisa phambili uphuhliso; kunye (7) ne-Afrika kunye nehlabathi elingcono, kunye namanye amanyathelo okungenelela alo mbuso wathatha imikhala yolawulo ngowama-..     IKhabhinethi iyayibulela inkqubela eyenziwe kwezo ndawo zithile ngokweenjongo ebezibekiwe zeli xesha kubhekiswa kulo.

src_text: Khonferense ya Pulamadibogo ya BIEC tla swarelwa Sentharengkgoparara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Sandton gola Johannesburg ka Laboraro, 20 Mosegamanye.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivile nangendawo ezifuna ukuba kungenelelwe ukuze kulungiswe ezi zinto zibangele ulibaziseko ebeziphazanyiswe ngubhubhane we-COVID-..     AbaPhathiswa baza kubamba iindibano noonondaba ukuba banikwe iinkcukacha ezigcweleyo ngeengxelo zabo bacacise nezo ndawo zifuna ukuba kungenelelwe     Umsitho ozayo.
INkomfa yooSomashishini Abamnyama abaRhweba namaZwe angaPhandle (i-BIEC).

src_text: Khonferense ye latela tsebagatšo ya mathomong ngwaga wo ya Tšhomišanommogo ya Diromelwantle tša Bahlomi ba Diintasteri ba Bathobaso ka mmušo, yeo thekgago bahlomi ba diintasteri ba bathobaso go kgona go tsenelela mebarakeng ye meswa, le go kgona go fihlelela thekgo ya ditšhelete ya diromelwantle le mekgwa ya go bapaletša ba bangwe  Melaetša.
tgt_text: I-BIEC yokuqala iza kubanjelwa e-Sandton International Convention Centre eRhawutini ngoLwesithathu, umhla wama-20 kweyeKhala.

src_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebiša ditebogišo tša yona le go lakaletša bao ba latelago mahlogonolo: Springboks, ka phenyo ya yona ya go thabiša kudu ya motsotso wa mafelelo kgahlanong le Wales nakong ya phenkgišano ya mathomo godimo ga diteko tše tharo tša dipapadi Lepatlelong la Loftus Versveld gola Pretoria ka Mokibelo, 2 Mosegamanye.

Banyana Banyana, ka phenyo ya yona ya go nweša dino tše pedi go ye tee papading ya pulamadibogo ya Mogopo wa Basadi wa Ditšhaba tša Afrika kgahlanong le Nigeria yeo bego bapalelwa gola Morocco, ka Mošupologo, 4 Mosegamanye  Bao ba Thwetšwego MešomongBatho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona thuto tlo tiišetšwa le go netefatšwa ka tsela ye maleba.
tgt_text: Le nkomfa iza emva kokusekwa ngokusesikweni ngurhulumente ekuqaleni kulo nyaka kweQumrhu looSomashishini Abamnyama abaRhweba Namazwe Angaphandle, elixhasa oosomashishini abamnyama ukuze bakwazi ukukhangela amazwe amatsha abanokurhweba nawo, bakwazi nokufumana inkxaso-mali kunye neendlela zokuzithengisa     Umyalezo.

src_text: Ngaka Nyameko Barney Pityana bjalo ka Modulasetulo wa Khomišene ya Bosetšhaba ya Lotto..     Moadbokheiti Rory Voller bjalo ka Mokomišinare wa Khomišene ya Dikhamphani le ya Tsebo ya Kgopolo.
tgt_text: Amazwi okuvuyisanaIKhabhinethi ithumele amazwi okuvuyisana kunye neminqweno emihle:kwi-Springboks, ngokuphumelela abethe i-Wales ngomzuzu wokugqibela kumdlalo ubutakisa iintlantsi wokuqala wemidlalo yovavanyo emithathu e-Loftus Verveld ePitoli ngoMgqibelo, umhla wesi-2 kweyeKhala.

src_text: Mohlagase.
tgt_text: Energy.

src_text: Kabinete amogela ditsenogare tšeo di tsebišitšwego ke mmušo go šogana le mathata mohlagase ka nageng.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the interventions introduced by government to address the country’s energy crisis.

src_text: Magato bohlokwa ao tšerwego kgora tsela ya go fokotša go kgaotšwa ga mohlagase, le go fetoša lekala la mohlagase le go fihlelela tšhireletšo ya mohlagase ya nako ye telele.
tgt_text: The far-reaching measures pave the way to reduce load-shedding, transform the electricity sector and achieve long-term energy security.

src_text: Mo go thekgeng kabo ya mohlagase le go thuša naga ya rena ka kabo ya mohlagase yeo imelwago, re nyaka go fokotša tšhomišo ya mohlagase nageng ya rena ka dimekawate tše 600 mo dikgweding tše tharo tše di latelago.
tgt_text: In supporting the energy grid and helping our country through its constrained electricity supply, we need to reduce our nation’s energy consumption by 600 megawatts over the next three months..

src_text: Malapa ka kgatha tema ya wona mo go bolokeng mohlagase ka go tima didirišwa tšeo di sego bohlokwa le tšeo di šomišago mohlagase wo montši mo dinakong tšeo tšhomišo lego godimo.
tgt_text: Households can play their part in conserving energy by switching off all non-essential lighting and high-energy appliances during peak demand times.

src_text: Dikgwebo di hlohleletšwa go šomiša theknolotši ya tšweletšo ya mohlagase ya mohola gape ye ntši le go kgatha tema mo mananeong go fokotša tšhomišo ye ntši ya mohlagase..     Operation Vulindlela.
tgt_text: Businesses are encouraged to adopt more energy-efficient production technology and participate in initiatives to reduce electricity demand..  Operation Vulindlela.

src_text: Kabinete amogela tšwelopele yeo dirilwego ka fase ga Operation Vulindlela go fediša dititelego tše di lebanego le mohlagase, dikgokagano tša megala, meetse le lekala la boeti go tsošološa ekonomi.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the progress made under Operation Vulindlela to clear bottlenecks across the energy, telecommunications, and water and tourism sectors to revive the economy.

src_text: Dimpshafatšo tša meago tše senyane go tše 26 di feditšwe, mola go na le tšwelopele ya dimpshafatšo tše.
tgt_text: Nine out of the 26 structural reforms have been achieved, with 11 reforms making good progress.

src_text: Dikatlego di akaretša go thoma ga dilaesense go tšweletšo ye tiilego, go fetošetša ga Taolo ya Maemakepe Setšhaba Transnet, tokollo ya mabokgoni bohlokwa ao lekotšwego lefsa le phethagatšo ya lenaneo la e-Visa mo dinageng tše 14, go akaretša mebaraka ya boeti ye mefsa ye megolo go swana le China, India, Kenya le Nigeria..     Dikgaruru le Dipolao tšeo di Hlolwago ke Bong (GBVF).
tgt_text: Successes include increasing the licensing threshold for embedded generation, the corporatisation of the Transnet National Ports Authority, release of the revised critical skills list and the implementation of the e-Visa system in 14 countries, including major new tourist markets such as China, India, Kenya and Nigeria..  Gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF).

src_text: Kabinete tšweleditše pefelo mo go katweng go go šoro ga basadi ba seswai mo Krugersdorp ka Gauteng.
tgt_text: Cabinet expressed outrage at the recent brutal rape of eight women in Krugersdorp in Gauteng.

src_text: Ditiro tše tše dimpe le tlhorišo kgahlanong le basadi di nyatša mokgwa wa rena wa leago.
tgt_text: These vile acts and abuse against women undermine our social fabric.

src_text: Kabinete retile gape Tirelo ya Maphodisa Afrika Borwa ka go swara babelaelwa ba mmalwa malebana le bosenyi bjo bošoro..     Kabinete ipiletša go ditšhaba go šoma le maphodisa le makala mangwe phethagatšo ya molao ka go abelana ka tshedimošo goba go bega mešongwana ya go belaetša.
tgt_text: Cabinet further commended the South African Police Service for their swift arrest of number of suspects in connection with the heinous crime..

src_text: Ge re šoma mmogo, re ka dira gore ditšhaba tša rena di bolokege go basadi le bana.
tgt_text: Cabinet appealed to communities to work with law-enforcement agencies by sharing any information or reporting suspicious activities.

src_text: Moafrika Borwa yo mongwe le yo mongwe na le mošomo wa go ba kgahlanong le basenyi ba dikgaruru ka karolong ya molao.
tgt_text: Working together, we can make our communities safer for women and children..  Every South African has duty to act against perpetrators of violence within the ambit of the law.

src_text: Bega ditiragalo ka moka tša GBV setišing sa kgauswi sa maphodisa goba leletša nomoro ya Crime Stop: 08600 10111, Senthara ya Taolo ya Setšhaba: 0800 428 428 goba Mogala wa go Emiša Dikgaruru tša Bong: 0800.
tgt_text: Report all GBVF-related incidents to local police station or call the toll-free Crime Stop number: 0860 01 0111, the National GBVF Command Centre: 0800 428 428 or Stop Gender Violence Helpline: 0800 150.  .

src_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi.
tgt_text: Women’s Month.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi ya ngwaga le ngwaga ka Phato hlompha basadi bao ba kgathilego tema ntweng ya tokologo le basadi ka moka mo setšhabeng.
tgt_text: The annual Women’s Month in August pays tribute to women who participated in the liberation struggle and all women in our society..

src_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi ya ngwaga wo ketekwa ka fase ga morero: “Ditokelo tša Basadi tša Ekonomi ya Leago: Go Aga Lefsa Bokaone go Matlafala ga Basadi moo go Kaonafetšego”..     Basadi ba go feta 20 000 bao ba gwantetšego Union Buildings ka Pretoria ka la 9 Phato 1956 ba kgathile tema go kgonthiša gore tekatekano ya bong le matlafatšo di dule di le bohlokwa ka temokrasing ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: This year’s Women Month is being celebrated under the theme: “Women’s Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment: Building Back Better for Women’s Improved Resilience”..

src_text: Dikgato tša bona tša bogale di hlohleleditše basadi ka kakaretšo go tšea maemo bona ao ba swanetšego ka Palamenteng, mmušong le setšhabeng, gomme re dira dikaonafatšo tše ga nnyane ga nnyane go tloga mola re hwetšago tokologo ka.
tgt_text: The over 20 000 women who marched to the Union Buildings in Pretoria on 9 August 1956 contributed to ensuring that gender equality and empowerment remains key priority in democratic South Africa.

src_text: Segopotšo sa Marikana.
tgt_text: Their brave actions inspired women in general to take their rightful place in Parliament, government and civil society, and we are constantly building on these advances since gaining freedom in.

src_text: Ka Labobedi, 16 Phato 2022, mmušo kopane le naga ka moka go gopola masetlapelo ao diragetšego ka Marikana Leboa Bodikela ka.
Bohloko bjoo bo kwelwego ke bašomi, malapa bona le naga ka bophara bo tla dula bo le gona mo historing ya rena.
tgt_text: Marikana commemoration.

src_text: Lenaneo la Mpshafatšo la Marikana le phethagaditšwe go aga lefsa le go hlola tikologo ya go dumelela go kaonafatša maphelo setšhaba sa Marikana.
tgt_text: On Tuesday, 16 August 2022, government joined the rest of the country in remembering the tragedy that unfolded at Marikana in North West in.

src_text: Ngwaga wa go feta mmušo lefile R176 milione go lliša malapa batšwasehlabelo gomme melato ye sa šetšego ye lego dikgorotshekong go letetšwe gore phethwe mafelelong .
tgt_text: The pain felt by the workers, their families and the nation at large would forever be entrenched in our history..

src_text: Dintlo tše di mpshafaditšwego goba tšeo di agilwego lefsa di filwe bahlologadi ba Marikana gomme tše dingwe di tla phethwa ngwaga wo.
tgt_text: The Marikana Renewal Programme has been implemented to rebuild and create an enabling environment to improve the lives of the Marikana community.

src_text: Protšeke ya dintlo ya R700 milione dira gore go bonwe bašomi ba moepong ba fiwa dintlo tša seriti.
tgt_text: Last year government paid R176 million in compensation to the families of the victims and the remaining cases under litigation are expected to be finalised by the end of August number of renovated or newly acquired houses have been handed to the Marikana widows and others will be completed this year R700-million housing project will see mineworkers being provided with decent housing.

src_text: Go filwe infrastraktšha ya leago ye bohlokwa go kaonafatša maemo go phela ditšhaba tša moepong.
tgt_text: Critical social infrastructure is being provided to improve the living conditions of mining communities.

src_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya ka Gauteng ka Mmotlolo wa Tlhabollo ya Dilete (DDM).

Go latela katlego ya Izimbizo tša Mopresidente tše tharo tšeo di swerwego ka Leboa Bodikela, Freistata le Mpumalanga ka tsela yeo, Mmasepala wa Selete wa Sedibeng ka Gauteng swere karolo ya bone ka Labohlano, 12 Phato..     Ka fase ga morero: “Akaretša batho ka moka”, Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa etile pele sehlopha sa bahlenkedi ba maemo godimo go tšwa go mebušo ya bosetšhaba, ya profense le ya selegae.
tgt_text: District Development Model (DDM) Presidential Imbizo in Gauteng.

src_text: Maafrika Borwa ka mekgatlo le makala bona ba beakantšwe gore ba šome mmogo kgahlanong le magato ao golago bohloki le mathata ao hlotšego maemo ao hlotlago ekonomi.
tgt_text: Following the success of the previous three DDM Presidential Izimbizo hosted in North West, Free State and Mpumalanga respectively, the Sedibeng District Municipality in Gauteng hosted the fourth instalment on Friday, 12 August..

src_text: Selete sa Sedibeng se na le tšwelopele mo phethagatšong ya Vaal River Special Economic Zone (SEZ), yeo lego bohlokwa go kaonafatšeng selete, profense le naga.
tgt_text: Under the theme: “Leave no one behind”, President Cyril Ramaphosa led the delegation of senior officials from the national, provincial and local governments.

src_text: Vaal River SEZ beakanya go swara makala bohlokwa a latelago: Vaal River Smart City; Hapo ya Tlhabollo ya Green Hydrogen; hapo ya khabisi; agro-logistiki, aerotropolisi; aetrome, sefofane sa merwalo le lekala la tšweletšo ya tšhipi ye matlafaditšwego.
tgt_text: South Africans in their various formations and sectors were mobilised to act together against rising levels of poverty and destitution caused by the challenging economic conditions..

src_text: Samiti ya Lekala la Leago ya Mopresidente.
tgt_text: The Sedibeng District has made progress in operationalising the Vaal River Special Economic Zone (SEZ), which holds potential for the reindustrialisation of the region, province and country.

src_text: Samiti ya Lekala la Leago ya Mopresidente yeo swerwego ka Ekurhuleni, Gauteng go tloga ka la 4 go fihla ka la 5 Phato 2022 ka fase ga morero “Go godiša Tirišano ya Leago go kgontšha go Kgatha Tema go Ekonomi ya Leago mo Ditšhabeng” kopantše bakgathatema go tšwa dileteng go šoma le mmušo go šogana le ditlhohlo tša ekonomi ya leago le go beakanya methopo ya ditšhaba tša leago, gare ga dinepo tše dingwe..     Samiti lebeletše dipego tša dipoledišano go tšwa go diprofense tše 9 ka ditlhohlo tša tšona, tšeo di akaretšago thekgo ya ditšhelete, ditaba tša taolo, phetogo ya lekala la leago ka kgopolo ya go godiša tirišano ya go šogana le ditlhohlo tšeo di lebanego le bohloki, go se lekalekane le tlhokego ya mešomo.
tgt_text: The Vaal River SEZ plans to host the following critical sectors: The new Vaal River Smart City; Green Hydrogen Innovation Hub; cannabis hub; agro-logistics; aerotropolis; aerodrome; air freight and the revitalised steel manufacturing sector.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletša go mekgatlo ya selegae le badudi go kgatha tema ya bona ka mafolofolo go kgonthiša gore re aga bokamoso bjo bokaone, bjalo ka ge go beakantšwe go Leano la Tlhabollo la Setšhaba: Pono ya     Diphetho tša Kabinete.
Leanolegolo la Diintasteri tša Boithomelo le Setšo.
tgt_text: Presidential Social Sector Summit.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore leanolegolo la Diintasteri tša Boithomelo le Setšo le phethagatšwe.
tgt_text: The Presidential Social Sector Summit held in Ekurhuleni, Gauteng from 4 to 5 August 2022 under the theme: “Fostering Social Cohesion to Enable Socio-Economic Participation in Communities”, brought together stakeholders from different constituencies to work with government to address socio-economic challenges and mobilise resources for civil society, among other objectives..

src_text: Leanolegolo le nepiša bokgabo bja pono; tiroatla le moakanyetšo; bobegaditaba bja go bonwa le go kwa le bja kgokaganyo, ditirelo tša moakanyetšo le tša bokgabo; phethagatšo le keteko, go akaretša mmino, phatlalatšo le bobegaditaba bja kgatišo.
tgt_text: The summit considered dialogue reports from the nine provinces on their challenges, which included access to funding, regulatory issues, transformation of the social sector with view to fostering state-civil society partnership to address challenges related to poverty, inequality and unemployment..

src_text: Leanolegolo le tla tsena ka bogare mo makaleng go aga lekala la kaonafatšo ya boithomelo leo le tla lemogwago lefaseng ka moka le go phadišana mo lefelong.
tgt_text: Cabinet called on civil-society organisations and citizens to play their active part in ensuring that we build better tomorrow, as envisioned in the National Development Plan: Vision  Cabinet Decisions.

src_text: Le tla šoma intastering ya boithomelo ya Afrika Borwa la kgona go fihlelela mebaraka ya gae le ya boditšhabatšhaba..     Tlhako ye Mpshafaditšwego ya Ditšhelete tša Dikadimo go Mebasepala ka moka le Ditšhelete tša Merero ya Ditšhoganetšo.
tgt_text: Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše dimpshafatšo go Tlhako ye Mpshafaditšwego ya Ditšhelete tša Dikadimo go Mebasepala ka moka le Ditšhelete tša Merero ya Ditšhoganetšo.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan for implementation.

src_text: Dimpshafatšo di go karolo ya kadimo ya tlhako ye.
tgt_text: The masterplan focuses on visual arts; crafts and design; audio-visual and interactive media; design and creative services; performance and celebration, including music, publishing and printed media..

src_text: Gare ga dimpshafatšo tšeo di akantšwego go thoma paka ya go adima ya nako ye telele go sepelelana le nako ya mohola ya tše dingwe tša dithoto tšeo di thekgilwego ka ditšhelete.
tgt_text: The masterplan will intervene in these sectors towards building transformed creative innovative sector that will be globally recognised and competitive in the space.

src_text: Dimpshafatšo di hlakiša mohola wa diinstitušene tša ditšhelete tša tlhabollo mo sekgobeng sa kadimo sa mebasepala.
tgt_text: It will work towards the South African creative industry being able to access the local and international markets..

src_text: Karolo ya 230 ya Molaotheo wa Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa ya 1996 matlafatša mebasepala go kgoboketša dikadimo tša matlotlo bona goba ditshenyagelo tša gonabjale.
tgt_text: Updated Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencies.

src_text: Tlhako ya kgale dumeletšwe ke Kabinete ka 2000 go hlahla Kgaolo ya 6 le 13 ya Molao wa Ditšhelete wa Mebasepala, wa 2003 (Molao wa 2003).
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the amendments to the current Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencies.

src_text: Dimpshafatšo tše di dumeletšwego di nyaka go hlohleletša baadimiši ba bantši mo mebasepaleng go hlokomela melao ya motheo yeo hlohleletšago go adima ga mebasepala..     Tšhupamabaka ye Lokolotšwego Pele ga Nako ya Phatlalatšo ya Dipalopalo tša Bosenyi tšeo di Begilwego tša Kotara ya Ngwaga wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.
tgt_text: The amendments are mainly on the borrowing section of this framework.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Tšhupamabaka ye lokolotšwego Pele ga Nako ya Phatlalatšo ya Dipalopalo tša Bosenyi tšeo di Begilwego tša Kotara ya Ngwaga wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.
tgt_text: Amongst the amendments   proposed introducing longer-term borrowing period to match the useful lifespan of some of the assets being financed.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go lokollwa ga dipalopalo tša bosenyi tša kotara.
tgt_text: The amendments also clarify the role of development finance institutions in the lending space of the municipalities.

src_text: Se be le go fetoša tokollo ya ngwaga yeo dirilwego ya dipalopalo tša bosenyi tša naga.
tgt_text: Section 230 of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 empowers municipalities to raise loans for their capital or current expenditure.

src_text: Dinako tšeo di beilwego tšeo ka tšona go tla lokollwago tšhupamabaka ye ya dipalopalo tša bosenyi tla ba ka Phato 2022 mo go tla lokollwago tša kotara ya pele gomme ye nngwe be ka Dibatsela 2022 mo go tla lokollwago tša kotara ya bobedi.
tgt_text: The original framework was approved by Cabinet in 2000 to guide Chapter 6 and 13 of the Municipal Finance Act, 2003 (Act 56 of 2003).

src_text: Dipalopalo tša bosenyi tša kotara ya boraro le kotara ya bone di tla lokollwa ka Dibokwane le Mopitlo 2023 ka go latelana .
tgt_text: The approved amendments seek to incentivise more lenders in the municipality markets but continue to maintain the core principles underlying municipal borrowing..  Pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly recorded crime statistics for 2022/23 financial year.

src_text: Go fedišwa ga Seemo sa Masetlapelo Setšhaba (NSoD).
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the proposed pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2022/23 financial year.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go fedišwa ga Seemo sa Masetlapelo Setšhaba (NSoD) seo se tsebišitšwego go latela mafula ka Kapa Bohlabela le KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the quarterly crime stats release.

src_text: NSoD se fedišitšwe ka la 18 Phato 2022 go latela katološo ya sona ka 18 Phupu.
tgt_text: This was to change the previous annual release of the crime stats for the country.

src_text: Katološo lebeletše tlhokego ya go tšwela pele go matlafatša magato tšhireletšo ao lego gona ao thomilego ke dibopego tša mmušo go fokotša le go šogana le maemo boso šoro mo diprofenseng tšeo di amegilego.
tgt_text: The proposed pre-release calendar crime statistics is August 2022 for quarter one and November 2022 for quarter two.

src_text: Kabinete dumetše gore maemo gonabjale ga sa nyaka magato go se tlwaelege ka ge dibopego tša mmušo, lekala la praebete le ditšhaba tša segae di tla tšwela pele go kgonthiša gore go ba le kimollo ye tšwelago pele, mpshafatšo le kagolefsa     Melaokakanywa.
tgt_text: Crime statistics for quarter three and quarter four will be released in February and May 2023 respectively..  Lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD).

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Ngwadišo ya Mangwalo Bodulo wa.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD) that was declared following the devastating floods in the Eastern Cape and KwaZulu-Natal..

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Ngwadišo ya Mangwalo Bodulo wa 2020 Palameneteng gore lebelelwe gape.
tgt_text: The NSoD lapsed on 18 August 2022 following its extension on 18 July.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Molaokakanywa ka Phupu 2020 gore lebelelwe gape ke setšhaba.
tgt_text: The extension considered the need to continue augmenting the existing contingency measures undertaken by organs of state to mitigate and address the impact of severe weather in the affected provinces..

src_text: Dimpshafatšo tše di šišintšwego di tla huetša gore go lemogwe nako ya naga yeo šireleditšwego ka semolao ka go Karolo ya 25(6) ya Molaotheo wa Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka.
tgt_text: Cabinet agreed that current circumstances no longer warrant the extraordinary measures as organs of state, the private sector and civil society will continue to ensure ongoing relief, recovery and reconstruction  Bills.

src_text: Molaokakanywa dumelela go kgoboketšwa ga dipalopalo go ya ka morafe, bong, naga, bodudi bja beng ba ditokelo tša naga ka Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Peakanayo ye tla kgontšha gore go be le dipego tša tlhakišo ya naga le dinyakišišo tšeo di nepagetšego ka moso malebana le phetošo ya go ba mong wa naga.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of 2020 to Parliament for further processing.
Cabinet approved the Bill in June 2020 for further public consultation.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wa Mokgatlo wa Infrastraktšha wa Mothopo wa Meetse wa Setšhaba (NWRIA) wa 2022 .
tgt_text: The proposed amendments will give effect to the realisation of the land tenure that is legally secured in Section 25(6) of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ga Molaokakanywa wa NWRIA wa 2022 gore setšhaba se swayeswaye ka mo nakong ya matšatši   Molaokakanywa akanywa go beakanywa ga NWRIA gore tšeye maikarabelo go beakanya, go thekga ka ditšhelete le go kaonafatša infrastraktšha ya naga tla ba gape le maikarabelo go hlokomela infrastraktšha ya gonabjale ya meetse.
tgt_text: The Bill provides for the collection of the statistics in terms of race, gender, nationality and citizenship of the holders of land rights in South Africa.

src_text: Mokgatlo ke wa go kgonthiša go abja ga meetse ga go swarelela, ga go kwagala go sepelelana le maikarabelo molaotheo go fihlelela meetse le go šireletša tikologo ye botse.
tgt_text: This provision will enable more accurate land audit reports and surveys in the future regarding the transformation of land ownership..  National Water Resource Infrastructure Agency (NWRIA) Bill of.

src_text: Mokgatlo tla beakanywa bjalo ka Lekala la Setšhaba ka fase ga Lenaneo la 2 la Molao wa Taolo ya Ditšhelete tša Setšhaba, wa 1999 (Molao wa 1 wa 1999).
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the publishing of the NWRIA Bill of 2022 for public comment for period of ninety (90) days.

src_text: Mokgatlo tla tšea mešomo yeo šetšego dirwa ke Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority.
tgt_text: The Bill proposes the setting up of an NWRIA to be responsible for the planning, financing and development of the water infrastructure for the country.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Maatla le Mešomo ya Ditšhelete tša Mmasepala .
tgt_text: It will also be responsible for the maintenance of the current water infrastructure.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Maatla le Mešomo ya Ditšhelete tša Mmasepala wa.
tgt_text: The agency is to ensure sustainable, equitable and reliable supply of water in line with constitutional obligations of access to water and secure healthy environment.

src_text: Molaokakanywa mpshafatša Molao wa Maatla le Mešomo ya Ditšhalete tša Mmasepala, wa 2007 (Molao wa 12 wa 2007).
tgt_text: The agency will be set up as Public Entity under the Schedule 2 of the Public Finance Management Act, 1999 (Act 1 of 1999).

src_text: Dimpshafatšo di laola maatla mebasepala mo go kgoboketšeng ditshenyagelo tša tlhabollo malebana le dikgopelo tša tlhabollo ya naga tšeo di išitšwego mebasepaleng.
tgt_text: The agency will take on the functions that are currently performed by the Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..  Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Dimpshafatšo tše di tla kgonthiša gore mebasepala diriša ditshenyagelo tše ka go lekana, go sa khutiše selo le gabotse.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Molaokakanywa ka 2020 gore setšhaba se swayeswaye..     Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafditšwego wa Ditaba tša Ditšhelete wa 2022 .
tgt_text: The Bill amends the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Act, 2007 (Act 12 of 2007).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Ditaba tša Ditšhelete, wa.
tgt_text: The amendments regulate the powers of municipalities in levying development charges in respect of land development applications submitted to municipalities.

src_text: Molaokakanywa akanya mpshafatšo go Melao ye šupa lego (1) Molao wa Diinstitušene tše di Amanago le Sekhwama sa Diphenšene, wa 1963 (Molao wa 41 wa 1963); (2) Molao wa Diphenšene tša Mašole, wa 1976 (Molao wa 84 wa 1976); (3) Molao wa Diphenšene tša Bašomi ba Mmušo wa 1996; (4) Molao wa Ditšhelete le Khomišene ya Ditšhelete, wa 1997 (Molao wa 99 wa 1997); (5) Molao wa Panka ya Tlhabollo ya Naga le Temo, wa 2002 (Molao wa 15 wa 2002); (6) Molao wa Profešene ya Tlhakišo wa 2005 (Molao wa 26 wa 2005) le (7) Molao wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Profešene wa 2021 (Molao wa 5 wa 2021).
tgt_text: These amendments will ensure municipalities apply these charges fairly, transparently and effectively.

src_text: Dimpshafatšo tše di šišintšwego di akaretša, ka fase ga Molao wa Diphenšene tša Mašole wa 1996, kakaretšo ya balekane ba bophelo ka moka go dikholego go tloga morago go la 27 Phato.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the Bill in 2020 for public consultation..  Financial Matters Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Molao wo mpshafaditšwego wa diphenšene tla kgontšha balekane go lemoga dikgahlego tša bona tša diphenšene ka bjako ge ba hlalana.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Financial Matters Amendments Bill,.

src_text: Go tlaleletša go hlaloša mošomo wa Tona ya Matlotlo le go hlakiša, dimpshafatšo di fetoša gape maatla komiti ya phethagatšo moo motlhakiši amogelago molato.
tgt_text: The Bill proposes the amendment to seven Acts, namely (1) Associated Institutions Pension Fund Act, 1963 (Act 41 of 1963); (2) Military Pension Act,1976 (Act 84 of 1976); (3) Government Employees Pension Law of 1996; (4) Financial and Fiscal Commission Act,1997 (Act 99 of 1997); (5) Land and Agricultural Development Bank Act, 2002 (Act 15 of 2002); (6) Audit Profession Act 2005 (Act 26 of 2005) and  the (7) Auditing Profession Amendment Act 2021 (Act 5 of 2021).

src_text: Molaokakanywa phatlaladitšwe gore setšhaba se swayeswaye ka Dibokwane.
tgt_text: The proposed amendments include, under the Military Pension Act of 1996, the inclusion of life partners to the benefits retrospectively from 27 April.
The pension laws amendments will enable spouses to realise their pension interest immediately on dissolution of the marriage.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Melao ya Kakaretšo (Molaokakanywa wo lego Kgahlanong le go Sepetša Tšhelete ka Tsela yeo Sego Molaong le go Lwantšha go Adimiša Tšhelete ka Tswala ya Godimo) wa.
tgt_text: In addition to clarifying the role of the Minister of Finance and on the auditing, the amendments also adjust the powers of the enforcement committee where an auditor admits guilt.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Melao ya Kakaretšo (Molaokakanywa wo lego Kgahlanong le go Sepetša Tšhelete ka Tsela yeo Sego Molaong le go Lwantšha go Adimiša Tšhelete ka Tswala ya Godimo) wa 2022 Palamaneteng gore lekolwe gape.
tgt_text: The Bill was published for public comment in February.

src_text: Molaokakanywa ke Molaokakanywa wa dikgoboketšo woo mpshafatšago Melao ya gonabjale lego  Molao wa Senthara ya Bohlale bja Ditšhelete, wa 2001 (Molao wa 38 wa 2001); (ii) Molao wa Mokgatlo wo se Nago Poelo, wa 1997 (Molao wa 71 wa 1997); (iii) Molao wa Taolo ya Traste ya Dithoto, wa 1988, (Molao wa 57 wa 1988); (iv) Molao wa Dikhamphani, wa 2008 (Molao wa 71 wa 2008) le  Molao wa Melawana ya Lekala la Ditšhelete, wa 2017 (Molao wa 9 wa 2017).
Dimpshafatšo di arabela diphošo tšeo di hweditšwego nakong ya tshekatsheko ya balekane ya naga yeo dirilwego ke Sehlopatšhomo sa Magato Ditšhelete (FATF).

src_text: Pego ya tekolo yeo kopanetšwego file maele 40 ao ka thušago gore Afrika Borwa sepelelane le magato boditšhabatšhaba go lwantšha go sepetša tšhelete ka mokgwa wo sego molaong le go lwantšha go adimiša tšhelete ka tswala ya godimo..     Go hweditšwe gore Afrika Borwa hlaelela dikarolong tše.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.

src_text: Molaokakanywa šogana le dikarolo tše dingwe tšeo di utollotšwego.
tgt_text: The Bill is an omnibus Bill that amends the current Acts namely  Financial Intelligence Centre Act, 2001 (Act 38 of 2001); (ii) Nonprofit Organisation Act, 1997 (Act 71 of 1997); (iii) Trust Property Control Act, 1988 (Act 57 of 1988); (iv) Companies Act, 2008 (Act 71 of 2008) and  Financial Sector Regulations Act, 2017( Act 9 of 2017).

src_text: Afrika Borwa dutše le leloko la FATF go tloga ka.
tgt_text: The amendments respond to the deficiencies identified during the peer review of the country conducted by the Financial Action Task Force (FATF).

The mutual evaluation report made 40 recommendations that would assist in getting South Africa to be aligned with international measures of combating money laundering and financing of terrorism..  South Africa was found to be lacking in 20 areas.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Diokobatši le go Rekišwa ga Diokobatši wa.
tgt_text: This Bill addresses about 14 of the areas identified.

tgt_text: South Africa has been member of FATF since.

src_text: Molao wa Diokobatši le go Rekišwa ga Diokobatši, wa 1992 (Molao wa 140 wa 1992) re ke bosenyi go dira le go aba seokobatši se sengwe le se sengwe seo se akareditšwego ka fase ga Lenaneo la 1 le Lenaneo la 2 la Molao.

Dimpshafatšo di šogana le go se nepagale ga Karolo ya 63, yeo go hweditšwego gore ga sepelelane le molaotheo malebana le ge Tona filwe ditokelo tša go mpshafatša mananeo ntle le go akaretša ditshepetšo tša palamente.

src_text: Ka 2020, Kgorotsheko ya Molaotheo tsebišitše gore Karolo ya 63 ya Molao wa Diokobatši le go Rekišwa ga Diokobatši wa 1992 ga go sepelelane le molaotheo gomme gwa emišwa nakwana go se be molao ga gona go fihla ka la 17 Manthole 2022 go fa Palamente nako ya go lokiša     Tiragalo  Tlago.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Drugs and Drug Trafficking Amendment Bill of 2022 for further processing.

src_text: Papadi ya Sebjana sa Lefase ya Rugby ya.
tgt_text: The Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act, 1992 (Act 140 of 1992) criminalises the manufacturing and supply of any substance included under the Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 of the Act..

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla ba monggae wa Sebjana sa Lefase sa Rugby sa 2022 ka Motsekapa gare ga la 9 le la 11 Lewedi.
tgt_text: The amendments address the invalidity of Section 63, which was found to be unconstitutional in respect of the Minister being provided with the rights to amend the schedules without the involvement of the legislative process.

src_text: Tiragalo ya papadi swarwa la mathomo ka kontinenteng ya Afrika gomme go tla bonwa dihlopha tša banna ba 24 le basadi ba 16 go tšwa lefaseng ka moka ba phadišana     Melaetša.
tgt_text: In 2020, the Constitutional Court declared Section 63 of the Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act of 1992 unconstitutional and suspended the invalidity to 17 December 2022 to provide for Parliament to correct the defect  Upcoming Event.

src_text: Ditebogišo        Kabinete lebogiša le go lakaletša tše dibotse: Banyana Banyana, ka go dira histori le go thopela Afrika Borwa Africa Cup of Nations ya Basadi (WAFCON), mo makgaolakgang WAFCON 2022 yeo bego swerwe ka Rabat, Morocco ka Mokibelo, 23 Mosegamanye.
tgt_text: Rugby World Cup Sevens.

src_text: Ka nako ye tee, ba fihleletše dinyakwa tša go phadišanela Sefoka sa Lefase sa FIFA go swarwa mmogo ke Australia le New Zealand go tloga ka la 20 Mosegamanye go fihla ka la 23 Phato.
tgt_text: South Africa will host the Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022 in Cape Town between 9 and 11 September.

src_text: Team South Africa, ka go thopa dimetale tše 27 mo dikarolong tša go fapana mo Dipapading tša Commonwealth tšeo di swerwego Birmingham, England go tloga ka la 28 Mosegamanye go fihla ka la 8 Phato.
tgt_text: The showcase event is held for the first time on the African continent and will see 24 men’s and 16 women’s teams from across the world competing  Messages.

src_text: Sehlopha sa Basadi sa Springbok, ge ba thopile kgahlanong le Spain mo phadišanong ya mathomo ya tše pedi ya diteko tša Mohlwaela wa Marega tša Basadi mo Emirates Airline Park go la Johannesburg.Mohumagadi Ndavi Nokeri (23), go thopa sefoka sa Mohumagadi Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: CongratulationsCabinet extended its congratulations and well-wishes to: Banyana Banyana, for making history and winning South Africa’s first ever Women's Africa Cup of Nations (WAFCON), at the 2022 WAFCON finals held in Rabat, Morocco on Saturday, 23 July.

src_text: Mohumagadi Ashleigh Buhai, ka go thopa 2022 AIG Women’s Open gomme ya ba mosadi wa boraro ka Afrika Borwa go thopa sefoka sa gauta se segolo.
tgt_text: At the same time, they qualified for next year’s FIFA women’s World Cup to be jointly hosted by Australia and New Zealand from 20 July to 20 August.

src_text: Palomoka ya batho bao ba thwetšwego eme go 15, 6 milione mo kotareng ya bobedi ya 2022, gomme palo ya batho bao ba sa šomego oketšegile ka batho ba 132 000 gomme ya fihla dimilione tše seswai mo kotareng ya bobedi ya 2022 ge go bapetšwa le kotara ya go feta.

src_text: Dipoelo tše tša go kgahliša gape tša go kwagala di bontšha gore maitapišo ao kopanetšwego mmušo le badirišani ba wona ba leago go godiša ekonomi le go hlola mešomo yeo hlokegago thoma go tšweletša dipoelo tše dibotse.

src_text: Kabinete kwešiša matshwenyego maAfrika Borwa ge ba palelwa ke go phela gabotse ka lebaka la bophelo bja go bitša tšhelete ye ntši le palo ya godimo ya go hloka mošomo.
tgt_text: Ezi nzuzo zincinci kodwa zincomekayo zibonisa ukuba iinzame ezidityanelweyo zikarhulumente kunye namahlakani akhe kwezentlalo okukhulisa uqoqosho nokudala imisebenzi efuneka ngamandla ziyaqalisa ukuvelisa iziqhamo.

src_text: Bjalo ka mmušo wo hlokomelago batho ba wona, re dula re tiile le go ikgafa go šoma mmogo le badirišani ba rena ba leago go aga bokamoso bjo bokaone bja yo mongwe le yo mongwe.
tgt_text: Obu bubungqina bokuba xa sinosebenzisana sisonke sisebenzise amandla ethu ahlangeneyo, singayoyisa imingeni ejongene noqoqosho lwethu.

src_text: Mmušo dula ikgafile go thekga dikgwebo tša gae ka go reka dithoto le go šomiša ditirelo tša tšona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyawuqonda umsindo wabemi boMzantsi Afrika njengoko besokola ukuqhubeka nobomi babo ngenxa yeendleko zokuphila kunye nentswela-ngqesho ephezulu.

src_text: Infrastraktšha ya Setšhaba.
tgt_text: Njengorhulumente okhathalayo, sizimisele ukusebenzisana namahlakani ethu kwezentlalo ukwakha ingomso elingcono lomntu wonke.

src_text: Kabinete kgala ka bogala go senywa ga infrastraktšha ke badudi ba Tongaat ka KwaZulu-Natal nakong ya megwanto ya go nyaka meetse.
tgt_text: Urhulumente usazimisele ukuxhasa amashishini asekuhlaleni ngokuthenga iimpahla kunye neenkonzo zalapha ekhaya.

src_text: Kabinete ipeletša gore batho ba iše matswalo fase gape ba be le kgotlelelo ka ge mošomo tšwela pele go lokiša Tongaat Water Treatment Works..  Kabinete kwešiša matshwenyego badudi bao ba swanelago ke go šomiša ditanka tša meetse nako ye telele go tloga mola go bago le mafula pejana mo ngwageng wo.
tgt_text: Iziseko zophuhliso zoluntu.

src_text: Le ge go le bjalo, dikgaruru le tlhakahlakano ga se tharollo, gomme go senywa ga infrastraktšha ya setšhaba go kweša setšhaba seo se dulago moo bohloko.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikugxekile ukutshatyalaliswa kweziseko zophuhliso ngabahlali base-Tongaat KwaZulu-Natal ngexesha loqhankqalazo befuna amanzi.

src_text: Molao wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Mananeo Mebasepala ya Mmušo wa Selegae wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlabe ikhwelo lokuzola kunye nomonde njengoko uqhuba umsebenzi wokubuyisela iMisebenzi yokuCocwa kwaManzi ase-Tongaat.

src_text: Kabinete amogela go saenelwa go ba molao ga Molao wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Mananeo Mebasepala ya Mmušo wa Selegae, wa 2022 (Molao wa 3 wa 2022) ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyawuqonda umsindo wabahlali ekuye kwafuneka ukuba basebenzise iitanki zamanzi ukusukela oko kwabakho izikhukula ebutsheni balo nyaka.

src_text: Maikemišetšo molao ke go kaonafatša bokgoni le maemo maitshwaro mmušo wa selegae.
tgt_text: Nangona kunjalo, ubundlobongela kunye neziphithiphithi azisosisombululo, kwaye ukutshatyalaliswa kweziseko zophuhliso kulimaza kuphela uluntu.

src_text: Mmušo bopa karolo ya maitapišo go dira gore Tirelo ya Setšhaba be ya profešene le go kgonthiša go swarelela ga kabo ya ditirelo go batho, bjalo ka tokelo ya motheo yeo šireleditšwego ka go Molaotheo wa Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa..  Molao hlaloša ditshepetšo tšeo di swanetšwego go latelwa mo go thwaleng ga bahlankedi ba mmasepala maemong godimo.
tgt_text: UMthetho oLungisiweyo kwiiNkqubo zikaMasipala kuRhulumente wamaKhaya wama-.

src_text: Bjale ga sa dumela gore bahlenkedibagolo ba mmušo ba sware gape maemo godimo mo mekgatlong ya dipolotiki.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwamkele uMthetho oYilwayo weeNkqubo zooMasipala kuRhulumente wamaKhaya, wama-2022 (uMthetho 3 wama-2022) otyikityiweyo nguMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Se sengwe gape ke gore ge molao wo tsene tirišong, diposo tša bolaodi bja mmasepala tšeo di se tlatšwago di swanetše go kwalakwatšwa nageng ka bophara go goka batho ba bantši bao ba nago le maswanedi.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho ujolise ekuphuculeni amandla kunye nemigangatho yeendlela zokuziphatha zikarhulumente wamakhaya.

src_text: Kabinete tshepa gore diphetogo tše di tla kgonthiša gore bao ba thwetšwego goba ba kgethilwego mo maemong ba tla kgona go phethagatša ditshepišo tša bona gore re fihlelele bophelo bjo bobotse go batho ka moka.
tgt_text: Lo mthetho uyinxalenye yamalinge karhulumente okwenza iNkonzo kaRhulumente yenziwe ngobuchule kwaye iqinisekise ukubonelela ngeenkonzo okuzinzileyo ebantwini, njengelungelo elisisiseko eliqulathwe kuMgaqo-siseko weRiphablikhi yoMzantsi Afrika we-..

src_text: Bosenyi.

src_text: Kabinete retile bahlenkedi ba metšhelo ba Tirelo ya Metšhelo ya Afrika Borwa ka go thopa seokobatši sa crystal meth seo ge se rekiša ka bago R236 milione mo Boemafofaneng bja Boditšhabatšhaba bja OR Tambo ka Lamorena, 28 Phato.
tgt_text: Ngoku uthintela amagosa aphezulu karhulumente ekubeni abe nezikhundla zopolitiko kumaqela ezopolitiko.

src_text: Pego ya Khansele ya Thuto ya Godimo (CHE) ya Nyakišišo ya Megolo ya Batlatšabakhanseliri ba Diyunibesithi le Baolaodibagolophethiši ka Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekile ukuba olu tshintsho luza kuqinisekisa ukuba abo banyuliweyo okanye abanyulwe kwezi zikhundla baya kukwazi ukuphumeza izithembiso zabo ukuze wonke umntu azuze ubomi obungcono.

src_text: Kabinete tsebišitšwe ka dipoelo tša nyakišišo ya CHE yeo dumeletšwego ka 2020 ke Tona ya Thuto ya Godimo, Saense le Kaonafatšo, Ngaka Blade Nzimande, go lekola magato megolo le mekgwa ya go phela ya bahlenkediphethiši ba yunibesithi mo nakong ya mengwaga ye 15 go tloga ka 2005 go fihla ka..  Dinyakišišo be le tša go utolla go swarelela, kgonagalo le kaonafatšo ya diyunibesithi goba lekala la thuto ya godimo ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Ulwaphulo-mthetho.

src_text: Pego ye akaretša dikutollo tša motheo gammogo le maele tukišo ao akantšwego.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi income amagosa eNkonzo yeRhafu yoMzantsi Afrika ngokuthimba i-785 kg ye-crystal meth enexabiso lasesitratweni lezigidi ezingama-R236 kwisikhululo seenqwelomoya i-OR Tambo International ngeCawe, umhla wama-28 kweyeThupha wama-.

src_text: Maele akanya, gare ga tše dingwe, tshepetšo ya ditefo ya go se khutiše selo yeo matlafaditšego.
tgt_text: Ukubhaqwa kweziyobisi kuya kuthumela isilumkiso esicacileyo kumaqela abophuli-mthetho ukuba amazibuko ethu okungena kunye nawokuphuma akhuselwe kakuhle kwaye amagosa ethu asebenza nzima ukuphelisa naluphi na ulwaphulo-mthetho     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Go beakanya mokgatlo wa taolo wa ka ntle wa go ikema go lebelela tshepetšo ya go tšea sephetho sa megolo akanya gape go matlafatša mananeo tekolo ya phethagatšo mo diinstitušeneng.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yeBhunga leMfundo ePhakamileyo (i-CHE) ngoMvuzo weeSekela-Tshansela zeeYunivesithi kunye naBaphathi abaPhezulu abaLawulayo eMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Dinyakišišo di lebeletše gape bogolo bja go fapana bja diinstitušene gape dirile gape papetšo ya boditšhabatšhaba.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inikwe amagqabantshintshi ngeziphumo zophando lwe-CHE olwagunyaziswa ngowama-2020 nguMphathiswa wezeMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi kunye noKusungulwa Kwezinto Ezintsha, uGq Blade Nzimande, ukuze kuphononongwe amanqanaba emivuzo kunye neendlela zabaphathi beeyunivesithi kwisithuba seminyaka eli-15 ukusuka ngowama-2005 ukuya kutsho kowama-..     Uphando ibikukumisela uzinzo, ukusebenza kunye nophuhliso lweeyunivesithi okanye icandelo lemfundo ephakamileyo kweli lizwe.

src_text: Go letetšwe gore Tona ya Thuto ya Godimo, Saense le Kaonafatšo boledišane ka pego ye le boetapele bja yunibesithi bjalo ka magato go matlafatša diinstitušene tše tša thuto.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ichaza iziphumo eziphambili kunye nezindululo zokulungisa.

src_text: Pego tla re ka morago ya phatlalatšwa wepsaeteng ya Kgoro ya Thuto ya Godimo le Tlhahlo: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: Izindululo ziphakamisa, phakathi kwezinye izinto, inkqubo yomvuzo eqinisiweyo kunye nephandle.

src_text: Phetošo ye Potlakišitšwego ya Bokgoni bja Dinyakišišo le Go ruta mo Lekaleng la Thuto ya Godimo.
tgt_text: Ukusekwa kwesigqeba sokujonga sangaphandle kwaye nesizimeleyo ukojonga inkqubo yokwenziwa kwezigqibo zemivuzo.

src_text: Kabinete thekgile maele dinyakišišo tše pedi tšeo di dirilwego go eletša ka magato ao swanetšwego go tšewa go potlakiša go bokgoni bja phetošo ya dinyakišišo le go ruta mo diinstitušeneng tša thuto ya godimo.
tgt_text: Zikwaphakamisa nokuqiniswa kweenkqubo zovavanyo lomsebenzi kumaziko.

src_text: Pego ya mathomo dirilwe ke Sehlophatšhomo sa Ditona seo se nyakišišago mapheko ao thibelago kalatšo, go swarelela le tšwelopele ya dirutegi tša maAfrika Borwa bathobaso.
tgt_text: Uphononongo lukwathathele ingqalelo ubungakanani bala maziko kwaye lwenza nokulinganisa lujonga kumazwe ngamazwe.

src_text: Pego ya bobedi – yeo dirilwego ke Kgoro ya Saense le Kaonafatšo le Setheo sa Dinyakišišo sa Setšhaba – Mokgatlo wa Diyunibesithi wa Afrika Borwa, mokgatlo wo mogolo wa go emela diyunibesithi tše 26 ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa weMfundo ePhakamileyo, iNzululwazi noKusungulwa Kwezinto Ezintsha kulindeleke ukuba axoxe ngale ngxelo neenkokeli zeyunivesithi njengenyathelo lokomeleza la maziko emfundo.

src_text: Dipego tše ka moka di akanya mekgwa ya go tsena gare go potlakiša phetogo mo dikarolong tše dikgolo tše hlano lego tatelano ya dialogadigolwane; go kgatha tema ga bašomi; setšo le tirišo ya institušene; pholisi le mekgwa, le methopo ye mennyane.
tgt_text: Ingxelo iya kuthi emva koko ipapashwe kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo noQeqesho: www.dhet.gov.za..     INguqu eKhawulezayo yoPhando kunye neSakhono sokuFundisa kwiCandelo leMfundo ePhakamileyo.

src_text: Tumelelano ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka ga Methopo ya Leabela la Dimela tša Dijo le Temo (Tumelelano).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izixhasile izindululo zamaphononongo amabini awayegunyaziswe ukuba acebise ngamanyathelo aza kuthathwa ukuze kukhawuleziswe inguqu yophando kunye nesakhono sokufundisa kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Tumelelano ya Palamente gore hwetšagale.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yokuqala yenziwe liQela laBaphathiswa eliSebenzayo elaphanda ngemiqobo ethintela ukuqeshwa, ukugcinwa kunye nokuqhubela phambili kwezifundiswa ezimnyama zaseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Se se tla kgontšha Afrika Borwa go ba karolo ya mekgatlo ya Tumelelano, yeo hlahlago maloko dinaga go šireletša le go kgonthiša tšhomišo ya go swarelela ya methopo ya leabela la dimela tša dijo le temo.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yesibini – egunyaziswe liSebe lezeNzululwazi noKusungulwa Kwezinto Ezintsha kunye neSiseko soPhando lweSizwe – yenziwe yi-Universities South Africa, iqumrhu elimele iiyunivesithi zoluntu ezingama-26 kweli lizwe.

src_text: Go fihlelela Tumelelano ye go tla matlafatša boikgafo bja naga mo go bolokeng le go swareleleng tšhomišo ya methopo ya leabela la dimela, le go fa thekgo go ditšhaba tša magaeng.
tgt_text: Zombini ezi ngxelo zinikeze ngamacebo ongenelelo ukuze kukhawuleziswe inguqu kwimimandla emihlanu ebanzi, esebefumene isidanga sokuqala; ukuthatha inxaxheba kwabasebenzi; inkcubeko kunye nokusebenza kweziko; umgaqo-nkqubo nesicwangciso, kunye nezibonelelo ezingqongopheleyo..     ISivumelwano saMazwe ngaMazwe ngeMithombo Yemfuza yeZityalo zoKutya kunye nezoLimo (iSivumelwano).

src_text: Tlhako ya Phetogo ye Botse ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa kweSivumelwano ePalamente.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore Tlhako ya Phetogo ye Botse ya Afrika Borwa phethagatšwe.
tgt_text: Oku kuya kwenza ukuba uMzantsi Afrika ube yinxalenye yamaqela esi Sivumelwano, nesikhokela amazwe angamalungu ekulondolozeni kunye nasekuqinisekiseni usetyenziso oluzinzileyo lwemithombo yemfuza yezityalo ekutyeni nakwezolimo.

src_text: Tlhako tšweletša pono ya go abelana ya Afrika Borwa ya go kwagala, ya klaemete ye maatla hlaloša melao le dikarolo tša pholisi go fihlelela se.
tgt_text: Ukungena kwesi siVumelwano kuya komeleza ukuzibophelela kwelizwe ngokubhekiselele kulondolozo kunye nokusetyenziswa ngokuzinzileyo kwemithombo yemfuza yezityalo, kwaye sinike inkxaso kuluntu lwasemaphandleni.

src_text: Tlhako ya phetogo tla huetša mang le mang ka Afrika Borwa, gomme ya fa sebaka sa go šogana le go se lekalekane ga kgale le go hlola ekonomi ye holago batho ka moka.
tgt_text: ISicwangciso-nkqubo seNguqu eluLungileyo soMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Khomišene ya Klaemete ya Mopresidente dirile mokgwa wa poledišano wo mogolo le badirišani ba leago gomme ya amogela thekgo ye kgolo ya tlhako.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume iSicwangciso-nkqubo seNguqu eluLungileyo ukuba iphunyezwe.

src_text: Kabinete kgonthišitše gore phetogo go tloga go ekonomi ye se nago khapone ka 2050 swanetše go thekga maikemišetšo tlhabollo ya setšhaba, go akaretša mešomo ye mekaone go batho ka moka, kakaretšo ya leago le go fedišwa ga bohloki.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-nkqubo sibonisa umbono okwabelwana ngawo woMzantsi Afrika olinganayo, nokwaziyo ukumelana nemozulu.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletša go badirišani ka moka ba leago go thekga le go amogela tlhako ye.
tgt_text: Sichaza imigaqo kunye neendawo kumgaqo-nkqubo zokuphumeza oku.

src_text: Leano la phethagatšo leo le tletšego la tlhako le tla dirwa, gomme le tla kopanywa le peakanyo ya mmušo le lenaneo la tekanyetšo.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo senguqu siza kuchaphazela wonke umntu waseMzantsi Afrika, sinike ithuba lokulungisa ukungalingani okwenziwa yimbali kwaye sidale uqoqosho oluxhamlisa wonke umntu.

src_text: Karata ya Laesense ya go Otlela ye Mpsha ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKomishoni kaMongameli yeMozulu iqhube inkqubo yothethathethwano ebanzi kunye namahlakani ezentlalo yaze yafumana inkxaso ebanzi ngesi sicwangciso-nkqubo.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore Karata ya Laesense ya go Otlela ya gonabjale tšeelwe legato ke ye mpsha ya go ba le dibopego tša go bolokega kudu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekisile ukuba inguqu eya kuqoqosho olungenayo ikhabhoni ngowama-2050 kufuneka ixhase iminqweno yophuhliso lwesizwe, kuqukwe imisebenzi endilisekileyo kumntu wonke, ubandakanyo lwentlalo kunye nokupheliswa kwentlupheko.

src_text: Karata ye šomišwago gonabjale thomile go šomišwa go tloga ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlabe ikhwelo kuwo onke amahlakani ezentlalo ukuba axhase aze amkele esi sicwangciso-nkqubo.

src_text: Theknolotši fetogile gomme go bitša tšhelete ye ntši go hlokomela dikarata tše.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso esineenkcukacha zokuphumeza esi sicwangciso-nkqubo siya kuphuhliswa, kwaye sidityaniswe kwinkqubo yocwangciso kunye neyohlahlo lwabiwo-mali karhulumente.

src_text: Karata ye mpsha ye tla šomišwago tla dira gore laesense ya naga ya rena ya go otlela sepelelane le Theknolotši ya Boditšhaba ya go Obamela Tshedimošo ya Boitsebišo bja Motho mo Laesenseng ya go Otlela (ISO18013).
tgt_text: Ikhadi elitsha leLayisenisi yokuQhuba yoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Pholisi ya Lenaneo la Mešomo ya Setšhaba ye Katološitšwego (EPWP).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume ukutshintshwa kweKhadi leLayisensi yokuQhuba elikhoyo ngoku lize lifakwe kwelinye elineempawu ezikhuselekileyo.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ka kuranteng ya setšhaba Pholisi ya EPWP ye akantšwego gore setšhaba se swayeswaye.
tgt_text: Le nkqubo yangoku oko yayisebenza ukusukela ngo-.

src_text: EPWP ke ye nngwe ya mananeo motheo mmušo ao maikemišetšo lego go fa kimollo go bohloki le letseno ka go hlola dibaka tša mešomo ya nakwana, kudu go bafsa le basadi.
tgt_text: Ubuchwephesha ukusukela ngoko sebatshintsha kwaye kuya kuxabisa kakhulu ukugcina iziseko zophuhliso ezikhoyo .

src_text: Pholisi ye mpsha ye akantšwego tla matlafatša lenaneo gomme ya hlaloša dikarolo tša go swana le megolo, mmotlolo wa thekgo ya ditšhelete le tšhireletšo ya leago, ya nyalantšha EPWP le ditirišo tša mešomo tše diswa tla godiša ditirišano gare ga mmušo le lekala la praebete mo go kgonthišeng gore EPWP kgatha tema kudu mo go hloleng mešomo ya seriti le go fokotša bohloki.
tgt_text: Ikhadi elitsha elicetywayo liya kwenza ilayisenisi yokuqhuba yeli lizwe ihambelane ne-International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving License (i-ISO18013).

src_text: Pholisi tla godiša gape kaonafatšo mo go phethagatšeng ga mananeo mešomo ya setšhaba go phatlalala le naga.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo weNkqubo eYandisiweyo yeMisebenzi kaRhulumente (i-EPWP).

src_text: Dimpshafatšo tša Mohlwaela wa Khoine ya Desimale ya Bone ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa kwiphephandaba likarhulumente loMgaqo-nkqubo oyilwayo we-EPWP ukuze uluntu lubonisane ngawo.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše sebopego, moakanyetšo le kgoboketšo ya Mohlwaela wa Khoine ya Desimale ya Bone ya Afrika Borwa dumeletše lenaneo la go šielana la ngwaga le ngwaga la tšhomišo ya dipolelo tša semmušo mo go mohlwaela wa khoine ya desimale ya bone.
tgt_text: I-EPWP yenye yeenkqubo eziphambili zikarhulumente ezijolise ekuboneleleni ukuthomalalisa intlupheko kunye nokuzisa ingeniso ngokudala amathuba emisebenzi ethutyana, ingakumbi kulutsha kunye nabasetyhini.

src_text: Lentšu “Afrika Borwa” le tla tsenywa ka lehlakoreng le lengwe la dikhoine gomme la gatišwa ka dipolelo ka moka tša semmušo.
tgt_text: Uyilo lomgaqo-nkqubo omtsha luza komeleza le nkqubo kwaye lunike ingcaciso kwimiba efana nemivuzo, imodeli yenkxaso-mali kunye nokhuseleko loluntu, kwaye lulungelelanise i-EPWP neendlela zokusebenza zale mihla.

src_text: Dipolelo tše tharo di tla šomišwa go khoine ya R5; dipolelo tše pedi go dikhoine tša R2; 50c, 20c le 10c gomme R1 tla ba ka polelo tee.
tgt_text: Luza kukhuthaza intsebenziswano phakathi kukarhulumente kunye necandelo labucala ukuqinisekisa ukuba i-EPWP inegalelo elikhulu ekudalweni kwemisebenzi endilisekileyo kunye nokuphelisa intlupheko.

src_text: Dipolelo tše ka moka di tla šomišwa ka go šielana mo mengwageng ye.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uza kukhuthaza ukusungulwa kwezinto ezintsha ekuphunyezweni kweenkqubo zemisebenzi yoluntu kwilizwe liphela.

src_text: Pholisi ya 2022 ye Kopantšwego ya Taolo ya Boleng bja Meetse ye Akanywago.
tgt_text: Izilungiso kuLuhlu lweSine kwiMali eziNkozo zaseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ka kuranteng ya mmušo ga Pholisi ya IWQM ye Akanywago gore setšhaba se swayeswaye.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwamkele umyinge, uyilo kunye noqulunqo lonyaka wama-2023 lweSine kwiMali eziNkozo zoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Pholisi ye akantšwego tla ema legato la Pholisi ya WQM ya kgale ya 1991 le mokgwa wa yona wo beakantšwego ka..  Pholisi hlaloša sehlopha sa melao yeo dirago motheo wa taolo ya boleng bja meetse sepelelana le melao ka moka ye lebanego le meetse le maikgafo ka moka lefase naga go maemo le pabalelo ya meetse bjalo ka mothopo wo hlokegago.
tgt_text: Ivume inkqubo ejikelezayo qho ngonyaka yokusetyenziswa kweelwimi ezisemthethweni kuluhlu lwesine lweemali ezinkozo.

src_text: Pholisi ya Mehuta ya Boipoeletšo bja Radio ya Moloko wa go Latela ye Akanywago.
tgt_text: Igama elithi “uMzantsi Afrika” liya kufakwa kwelinye icala kwimali eyinkozo ze libhalwe ngazo zonke iilwimi ezisemthethweni.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše go phatlalatšwa ga Pholisi ya Mehuta ya Boipoeletšo bja Radio ya Moloko wa go Latela ye Akanywago gore setšhaba se swayeswaye.
tgt_text: Iilwimi ezintathu ziya kusetyenziswa kwi-R5; iilwimi ezimbini kwi-R2; i-50c, i-20c, i-10c kunye ne-R1 ziya kuba ngolwimi olunye.

src_text: Boipoeletšo bja Radio ke mothopo wa tlhago wo monnyane woo lego bohlokwa go kgolo ya ekonomi ya titšitale ya Afrika Borwa le infrastraktšha ya kgokagano.
tgt_text: Zonke ezi lwimi ziya kusetyenziswa ngendlela ejikeleziswayo rhoqo ngonyaka kule minyaka ili-10 izayo.

src_text: Pholisi ye akantšwego ikemišeditše go thekga go abelwa ga mehuta ya  dilaesense tša go fihlelela megala ya go thetha ya go se šute, dilaesense tša kgašo, tša mananeokgoparara dikgokagano tša difofane le tša dikepe; tša dinyakišišo le tlhabollo; tša mananeokgoparara go šomišwa ke setšhaba, le diintasteri tše dingwe tša maleba.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo oYilwayo oDityanisiweyo woLawulo loMgangatho waManzi (i-IWQM) wowama-.

src_text: Pholisi nyaka gape go godiša tekatekano le kabo ya go kwagala go kgatha tema mo phetošong ya lekala le phihlelelo ya kgokagano ya titšitale le mo go dikarolo tša kgole tša naga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa kwiphephandaba likarhulumente koMgaqo-nkqubo oYilwayo we-IWQM ukuze uluntu lubonisane.

src_text: Kgopelo ya Afrika Borwa ya Khansele ya Mokgatlo wa Kgokagano ya Boditšhabatšhaba (ITU) le Boto ya Melawana ya Radio.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucetywayo uya kuthatha indawo yoMgaqo-nkqubo we-WQM ophelelwe lixesha wama-1991 kunye nesicwangciso-qhinga sawo esamiselwa ngo-..

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše kgopelo ya Morena Mandla Samuel Mchunu go Boto ya Melawana ya Radio ya ITU (Selete sa .
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uchaza uluhlu lwemigaqo eya kuba sisiseko solawulo lomgangatho wamanzi.

src_text: Morena Mchunu gonabjale ke leloko la boto akanyeditšwe go kgethwa gape mo Khanseleng ya ITU go kotara ya 2023 go fihla ka..  Dikgetho di tla swarwa nakong ya Khonferense ya Baemedi ba ITU yeo tla swarwago Bucharest, Romania go tloga ka la 26 Lewedi go fihla ka la 14 Diphalane.
tgt_text: Uzobonelela ngolungelelwaniso kuyo yonke imithetho efanelekileyo enxulumene namanzi kunye nezibophelelo zelizwe ekuboneleleni nasekulondolozweni kwamanzi njengomthombo onqabileyo.

src_text: Afrika Borwa dula ikgafile go dinepo le maikemišetšo ITU go kgokaganya karoganyo ya titšitale le go kgokaganya batho ka moka ba lefase  Ditiragalo tše di Tlago.
tgt_text: Uyilo loMgaqo-nkqubo weSizukulwana esiLandelayo seTeknoloji yezoNxibelelwano eSebenza ngaMaza oMoya.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Bohwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa koyilo loMgaqo-nkqubo weSizukulwana esiLandelayo soMgaqo-nkqubo seTeknoloji yezoNxibelelwano eSebenza ngaMaza oMoya ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Bohwa ya Lewedi ngwaga wo tla ketekwa ka fase ga morero: “Go keteka Bohwa bja Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Setšo wa Afrika Borwa”.
tgt_text: Iteknoloji yezonxibelelwano esebenza ngamaza omoya sisixhobo sendalo esibalulekileyo kuhlumo loqoqosho lwedijithali yoMzantsi Afrika kunye nakwisiseko sonxibelelwano.

src_text: Kabinete hlohleletša maAfrika Borwa ka moka go šomiša Kgwedi ya Bohwa go keteka bohwa bja rena bja setšo bja go huma le phapano yeo nago le maatla go kopanya setšhaba.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucetywayo ujonge ukuxhasa ulwabiwo lwamaza omoya kunye nokukhutshwa kweelayisenisi ezisisigxina zeselula; zosasazo; zenqwelomoya nezaselwandle; zophando nophuhliso; zokufikelela koluntu, kunye nezamanye amashishini afanelekileyo.

src_text: Ka moka re swanetše go ikgafa go šoma mmogo go fediša dikarologanyo le go hloka toka ga nako ya go feta le go godiša temogo ya go ikgantšha ka go ba maAfrika Borwa  Melaetša.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ukwajonge ukukhuthaza ulingano kunye nolwabiwo olungenamkhethe ukuze lwenze igalelo kwinguqu yeli candelo kunye nakufikeleleka kuqhagamshelwano lwedijithali nakwiindawo ezikude zelizwe.

src_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebogiša le go lakaletša tše dibotse go:Bathopasefoka ka moka, bathopa dimetale le baphadišani bao ba kgathilego tema mo Lebelong la Comrades, leo le tsebegago bjalo ka “Lebelo la Batho la go Phala ka Moka, ka Lamorena, 28 Phato.
tgt_text: Umgqatswa woMzantsi Afrika weManyano yoNxibelelwano lweZizwe ngeZizwe (i-ITU) kunye neBhodi yoLawulo kaNomathotholo .

src_text: Lebelo la banna le thopilwe ke Tete Dijane (Diiri tše 5, metsotso ye 30, metsotswana ye 38) go tšwa Mahikeng ka Leboa Bodikela mola mokitimi wa Russia Alexandra Morozova thopile lebelo la basadi (Diiri tše 6, metsotso ye 17, metsotswana ye 47).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi imamkele umgqatswa woMzantsi Afrika uMnu Mandla Samuel Mchunu kwiBhodi yeMimiselo kaNomathotholo (kwiNgingqi  ye-ITU.

src_text: MahlokoKabinete romela melaetša ya mahloko go:Mama Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), molwelatokologo wa kgale yoo bego le moamogedi wa Sefoka sa Setšhaba sa Luthile ka 2004 ka “go kgatha tema ga gagwe mo go lweleng tokologo ya ditokelo tša bašomi le temogo go go se kgetholle ka mmala, ka bong, le Afrika Borwa ye lokologilego ya toka”.Bahlenkedi ba Ditirelo tša Maphodisa Afrika Borwa (SAPS) ba bahlano bao bego le banamedi ba sefofane sa SAPS seo se welego Boemafofaneng bja Rand, Germiston ka Labobedi, 30 Phato.
tgt_text: UMnu Mchunu ulilungu lebhodi esebenzayo ngoku.

src_text: SAPS nyakišiša seo se hlotšego go wa ga sona.
tgt_text: Kwaye kucetywa ukuba aphinde onyulwe kwiBhunga ye-ITU kwixesha lowama-2023 ukuya kowama-..     Unyulo luya kuqhubeka ngexesha leNkomfa yoNozakuzaku ye-ITU eya kubanjelwa e-Bucharest, e-Romania ukusuka ngomhla wama-26 kweyoMsintsi ukuya kowe-14 kweyeDwarha.

src_text: Kabinete lakaletša mofofiši yoo gobetšego kudu gore fole ka pela  Bao ba Thwetšwego Mešomong.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika usazibophelele kwiinjongo ze-ITU zokuvala ukwahlukana kwedijithali kunye nokudibanisa bonke abantu behlabathi     Imisitho ezayo.

src_text: Batho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona dithuto tla tiišetšwa le go netefatšwa ka maleba  Mohumagadi Gugulethu Abigail Thimane bjalo ka Motlatšamolaodimogophethiši (DDG):Tekolo ya Lekala la Mmušo le Tlhabollo ya Bokgoni ka go Kgoro ya Peakanyo, Tekodišišo le Tshekatsheko ya Phethagatšo ya Mošomo  Mohumagadi Kwena Komape bjalo ka DDG: Tlhabollo ya Ekonomi, Kgwebo le Papatšo ka go Kgoro ya Temo, Peakanyoleswa ya Naga le Tlhabollo ya Dinagamagae  Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole bjalo ka DDG: Senthara ya Taolo ya Masetlapelo Setšhaba mo Kgorong ya Pušotirišano.
tgt_text: INyanga yaMafa.

src_text: Mohlagase.
tgt_text: Amandla ombane.

src_text: Tona ya Dikgwebo tša Mmušo Pravin Gordhana begetše kabinete ka bokgoni bja Eskom bja go fokotša go kgaotšwa ga mohlagase ga nako le nako gape filwe pego ya seo se šetšwego se dirilwe go tšwa Komiting ya Semmušo ya Komiti ya Mathata Mohlagase ya Setšhaba.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inikwe ingxelo emfutshane nguMphathiswa wamaShishini kaRhulumente u-Pravin Gordhan malunga namandla ka-Eskom okunciphisa ukucinywa kombane okwethutyana kwaye ikwafumene nengxelo yenkqubela-phambili evela kwiKomiti yobuGcisa yeKomiti yeSizwe yeNgxaki yezaMandla.

src_text: Go tla dirwa ditsebišo tše dingwe go latela go phethwa ga dipoledišano tša go tsenelela tša dipego tše.

Kabinete tšweleditše manyami ka tšhitišo le mathata ao hlolwago ke go kgaolwa ga mohlagase go dikgwebo le magae, kudu di direga ka nako yeo mmušo swaraganego le ditsenogare tšeo di tsebišitšwego ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Mosegamanye.
tgt_text: Ezinye izibhengezo ziza kwenziwa emva kokuqukunjelwa kweengxoxo ezinzulu zezi ngxelo.

src_text: Peeletšo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise ukudana ngokuphazamiseka kunye nengxaki ebangelwe kukucima kombane koosomashishini nakumakhaya, ingakumbi okwenzeka ngeli xesha urhulumente eqalisa ukusebenza kwizithembiso ezazenziwe  nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa kweyeKhala yowama-.

src_text: Kabinete amogela go thakgolwa ga Lefelo le lefsa la Tšweletšo la Sandvik Khomanani ka Kempton Park, leo bego le karolo ya peeletšo ya R350 milione yeo tshepišitšwego mo Khonferenseng ya bone ya Dipeeletšo ya Afrika Borwa (SAIC) yeo bego swerwe Senthareng ya Dikopano ya Sandton ka Johannesburg ka la 24 Hlakola..  Mothopo wo mofsa wa dikwere metara tše 62 000 kopanya ditshepetšo tšeo di thomilwego pele mo mafelong go fapana mahlano gomme di akaretša bašomi bao ka bago ba.

Ke ye nngwe ya methopo ye megolo go feta ka moka ya Sandvik gape ya maemo godimo lefaseng ka moka, gomme na le bokgoni bja go tšweletša metšhene ya go laiša ya ka fase ga mabu ya go ba le ditšweletšwa tša Afrika Borwa tša 60%.
tgt_text: Utyalo-mali.

src_text: Kabinete amogela gape ketelo ya tekolo ya Mopresidente Ramaphosa ka KwaZulu-Natal nakong ya thakgolo ya mothopo wa tšweletšo wa Hesto Harnesses ka Stanger, KwaDukuza ka la 13 Lewedi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusungulwa kwe-Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing Site e-Kempton Park, eyinxalenye yotyalo-mali oluzizigidi ezingama-350 zeerandi obeluthenjiswe kwiNkomfa yesine yoTyalo-mali yaseMzantsi Afrika (i-SAIC) ebibanjelwe kwiZiko leNgqungquthela laseSandton eRhawutini ngomhla wama-24 kweyoKwindla yowama-..     Eli ziko litsha elizizikwere zeemitha ezingama-62 000 lidibanisa imisebenzi ebiqhutywa ngaphambili kwiindawo ezintlanu ezahlukeneyo kwaye lingangena abasebenzi abamalunga nama-.

src_text: Mothopo wo ke wo mongwe wa diprotšeke tša dipeeletšo tša tšhelete tše hlano tšeo di dirago karolo ya boikgafo bja  4 bilione bja Metair Investments Limited go thekga katološo le go dira Ford Ranger ye mpsha ya gae.
tgt_text: Lelinye lawona maziko e-Sandvik amakhulu  kwihlabathi jikelele nanobuxhaka-xhaka bale mihla kwaye lizawuvelisa iiloli zokulayisha emigodini.

src_text: Mopresidente tsenetše gape go bulwa ga mpshafatšo le katološo ya protšeke ya Sappi Saiccor Mill ye bitšago R7,7 bilione ka Umkomaas, yeo maikemišetšo yona lego go godiša bokgoni le katlego ya lefase ya khamphani mola ka go le lengwe hlola dibaka tša mošomo tša nako ye kopana le nako ye telele.
tgt_text: Umyinge ongaphezulu kwama-60% wezi ntsimbi ziza kusetyenziswa xa kusenziwa ezi loli uza kuveliswa apha eMzantsi Afrika..     IKhabhinethi ilwamkele utyelelo lukaMongameli Ramaphosa lokuya kuhlola KwaZulu-Natal ngethuba kusungulwa komzi-mveliso wakwa-Hesto Harnesses e-Stanger, KwaDukuza ngomhla we-13 kweyoMsintsi yowama-.

src_text: Dipeeletšo tše di dira karolo ya maikano ao dirilwego ke boraintasteri mo SAIC.
tgt_text: Eli ziko lelinye leeprojekthi ezintlanu zotyalo-mali oluyinkunzi eliyinxalenye yebhiliyonii eyi-.

src_text: Peeletšo ye nngwe le ye nngwe ye mpsha ka nageng ya rena thuša go kagolefsa le kaonafatšo ya ekonomi ya rena, gomme tšwela pele go akaretša Afrika Borwa bjalo ka nepo ya peeletšo ya kgetho.
tgt_text: 4 yeerandi eyathenjiswa ngabakwa-Metair Investments Limited kumalinge okuxhasa umsebenzi wokwandiswa kunye nokuveliswa apha ekhaya kwe-Ford Ranger etsha.

src_text: Tlhabollo ya infrastraktšha.
tgt_text: UMongameli ukwazimase ukuvulwa kweprojekthi yokuphucula nokwandisa i-Sappi Saiccor Mill exabisa iibhiliyoni eziyi-7,7 zeerandi e-Umkomaas, ejolise ekwandiseni nasekuphuculeni le nkampani itsho ikwazi ukukhuphisana kumgangatho wehlabathi  ngelixa ikwadala imisebenzi ezizingxungxo kunye nesisigxina.

src_text: Kabinete amogela go bulwa ga karolo ye mpsha ya Tsela ya Manyokenyoke ya Musina ka Limpopo yeo tla dirago gore go be bonolo go batho go sepela ka Musina, gomme ya dumelela gape mešongwana ya kgwebo le ekonomi gare ga Afrika Borwa le dinaga tša Ditšhaba tša Tlhabollo tša Borwa bja Afrika.
tgt_text: Olu tyalo-mali luyinxalenye yezithembiso ezenziwe ngoosomashishini kwi-SAIC.

src_text: Protšeke ya R640 milione hlotše mešomo ye 275 ya go ya go ile ya batho ba gae gomme ya aba dibaka go ditšhaba tša gae le dikgwebo tše dinnyane le tše dikgolo gammogo le dikgwebopotlana (di-SMME).
tgt_text: Lonke utyalo-mali olutsha elizweni lethu lunceda ekwakhiweni ngokutsha nasekuvuseleleni uqoqosho lwethu, kwaye luyaqhubeka nokungqina ukuba uMzantsi Afrika ulilizwe elunamathuba amaninzi otyalo-mali.

src_text: Go agwa ga Tsela ya Manyokenyoke ya Musina ke karolo ya lenaneo la infrastraktšha ya mmušo, ka ERRP, yeo nyakago go hlola kgolo ya kakaretšo le dibaka tša mešomo go phatlalala le makala le ditšhaba.
tgt_text: Uphuhliso lweziseko zophuhliso.

src_text: Masetlapelo Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuvulwa kwecandelo elitsha le-Musina Ring Road e-Limpopo eliza kwenza kube lula ukuba abantu bahamba-hambe eMusina, likwavumele ukwandiswa kwemisebenzi yorhwebo neyoqoqosho phakathi koMzantsi Afrika kunye namazwe oMbutho woPhuhliso lwaMazantsi e-Afrika (i-SADC).

src_text: Kabinete rometše melaetša ya mahloko go malapa bao ba lahlegetšwego ke maphelo bona ka morago ga tirigalo ya masetlapelo ya go palega le go tšhologa ga leraga mo moepong wa selegae wo tlogetšwego sa šome ka Jagersfontein ka Freistata mo maseng Lamorena, 11 Lewedi.
tgt_text: Le projekthi yezigidi ezingama-640 zeerandi idale imisebenzi esisigxina engama-275 yabahlali bale ngingqi yaze yabonelela ngamathuba kuluntu lwasekuhlaleni nakumashishini amancinane, aphakathi namancinane kakhulu (ii-SMME)..     Ukwakhiwa kwe-Musina Ring Road yinxalenye yenkqubo karhulumente yeziseko zophuhliso, ngokusebenzisa i-ERRP, ejonge ukudala uhlumo oluza kuxhanyulwa ngumntu wonke kunye namathuba engqesho kumacandelo ahlukeneyo nakuluntu.

src_text: Masetlapelo tlogetše gape infrastraktšha ya selegae, dithoto tša batho tša go swana le dikoloi le magae mmalwa senyegile kudu.
tgt_text: Intlekele yaseJagersfontein.

src_text: Nakong ya ketelo ya gagwe mo lefelong la masetlapelo ka Mošupologo, 12 Lewedi 2022, Mopresidente Ramaphosa lebogile maitapišo go phološa le go hwetša batho le dithoto ao dirilwego mo lefelong la masetlapelo ikanne gape gore mmušo tla fa thekgo yeo hlokegago go badudi bao ba amegilego ba Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: 1  IKhabhinethi ithi mazilale ngenxeba iintsapho zabo bathe basutywa kukufa emva kokugqabhuka kwedama lodaka lomgodi owavalwayo  wase-Jagersfontein e-Freystata lakhupha udaka olwenze umonakalo omkhulu ngentseni yangeCawa, umhla we-11 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-.

src_text: Kabinete hlohleletšwa ke gore beng ba moepo ba re ba ikemišeditše go aba thušo ye hlokegago le thekgo go mmušo ge ka kgopelwa ke Khansele ya Diminirale ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Le ntlekele iphinde yashiya izakhiwo zendawo, izinto zabantu ezifana nezithuthi kunye nezindlu ezininzi zonakaliswe kakhulu.. 2   Ngethuba lotyelelo lwakhe kummandla wentlekele ngoMvulo, umhla we-12 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-2022, uMongameli Ramaphosa uvakalise umbulelo ngeenzame zohlangulo nezovuselelo kulo mmandla.

src_text: Intasteri ya meepo dula le mothekgi yo bohlokwa wa ekonomi ka go thwala thwii goba go se thwale thwii, megolo ya kišontle, le peeletšo ya thwii ya dinaga tša ka ntle, gomme kgatha tema ye bohlokwa mo go kaonafatšeng maphelo ditšhaba tša meepong.
tgt_text: Ukwathembise ukuba urhulumente uzakubonelela ngenkxaso efanelekileyo kubahlali abachaphazelekayo baseJagersfontein.

src_text: Mmušo le mekgatlo ye mengwe yeo sego ya mmušo ba tsene ka bogare ka bjako ka go fa batho bao ba amegilego madulo nakwana tšhoganetšo, thobamatswalo ya kgatelelo ya monagano le letšhogo le dilo tšeo di hlokegago go swana le mapai, materase le diphuthelwana tša dijo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikhuthazekile kukuba abanini balo mgodi bathe bakulungele ukunika uncedo lobugcisa nenkxaso kurhulumente ukuba banokucelwa benze njalo liBhunga lezeZimbiwa laseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Kabo ya meetse le mohlagase mo lefelong bušeditšwe sekeng.
tgt_text: 3 Ishishini lezemigodi lisahleli linegalelo elibalulekileyo kuqoqosho ngokuqeshwa ngokuthe ngqo nangokungathanga ngqo, iingeniso evela kurhwebo namazwe angaphandle, kunye notyalo-mali oluthe ngqo lwangaphandle, kwaye lidlala indima ebalulekileyo ekuphuculeni ubomi babantu kwiindawo ezinemigodi.

src_text: Go letetšwe gore dientšenere di dire tekolo ya dibopego tša dintlo, ge lefelo la masetlapelo le hlwekišitšwe.
tgt_text: 4 Urhulumente kunye neminye imibutho engekho phantsi kukarhulumente baye bangenelela ngokungxamisekileyo ngokubonelela ngeendawo zokuhlala ezingxamisekileyo, ululeko lwengqondo nangezibonelelo ezingundoqo ezifana neengubo, oomatrasi kunye nokutya.

src_text: Kabinete leboga ditirelo tša tšhoganetšo, mekgatlo ya setšhaba ya segae le maloko setšhaba ka tema yeo ba kgathilego ye kgolo le thušo yeo ba filego batšwasehlabelo.
tgt_text: Ubonelelo lwamanzi nombane kulo mmandla sele lubuyele esiqhelweni.

src_text: Ekonomi.

Kabinete tšweleditše maemo ekonomi ka nageng ka morago ga ge dipalolopalo tša kgauswanyane tša Kgoro ya Dipalopalo ya Afrika Borwa (Stats SA) di bontšha gore palomoka ya tšweletšo ya gae (GDP) ya kotara ya bobedi ya 2022 fokotšegile ka 0,7%.
tgt_text: 5 Nje ukuba indawo yentlekele icociwe, amagcisa alindeleke ukuba enze uhlolo lweendonga zezindlu.

src_text: Dilo tšeo di hueditšego phokotšego ye di akareditše kgaotšo ya mohlagase, ntwa ya Russia le Ukraine, le maemo go phela go bitša tšhelete ye ntši le inflešene.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibulele iinkonzo zikaxakeka, imibutho yoluntu kunye namalungu oluntu ngeminikelo yesisa noncedo lwabo.

src_text: Ditsenogare tšeo di dirilwego ke Leano la Kaonafatšo le Kagolefsa ya Ekonomi (ERRP) di fokoditše kudu naga go dikhuetšo tša boditšhabatšhaba, gape tša šireletša mešomo le letseno.
tgt_text: Uqoqosho.

src_text: Ditsenogare tše maatla tša ekonomi tša mmušo di thoma go tšweletša dipoelo tše dibotse, bjale ka ge go hlatsetšwe ka go dipoelo tša Dinyakišišo tša Bašomi tša Kotara ye nngwe le ye nngwe tša Stats SA, tšeo di bontšhitšego gore go bile le mešomo ye 648 000 mo kotareng ya mathomo le ya bobedi tša  Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ixoxe ngobume boqoqosho beli lizwe emva kokuba amanani akutshanje eZiko leeNkcukacha-manani loMzantsi Afrika (i-Stats SA) abonise ukuba ingeniso yemveliso yelizwe (i-GDP) yekota yesibini yowama-2022 yehle ngo-0,7%.

src_text: Tlhako ya Tlhahlobo le Tekolo (M&E) ya Pholisi ya Bafsa ya Setšhaba (NYP).
tgt_text: Izinto eziphembelele oku kwehla ziquka ukucinywa kombane, ungquzulwano lwaseRashiya ne-Ukraine, kunye neendleko eziphezulu zokuphila kunye nokunyuka kwamaxabiso.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhako ya M&E yeo tla kgontšhago tlhahlobo le kelo ya khuetšo ya dintlha tša bohlokwa tša NYP ya 2020-.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela enziwe siSicwangciso soKwakha ngokutsha kunye noVuselelo loQoqosho (i-ERRP) ubukhulu becala sithintele ilizwe kubunzima amashishini ajamelane nabo kwihlabathi, kwaye sakhusela imisebenzi kunye neendlela zokuphila.

src_text: Tlhako fa ditaetši tša legato la godimo tše hlano tšeo di sepelelanago le dintlha tša bohlokwa tša NYP.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela ezoqoqosho aluqilima karhulumente aqalisa ukuvelisa iziqhamo, njengoko kungqinwe kwiziphumo zakutshanje ze-Stats SA zeKota zoVavanyo lwaBasebenzi, ezibonise ukuba kudalwe imisebenzi engaphezulu kwama-648 000 phakathi kwekota yokuqala neyesibini yowama-     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Ditaetši di dirilwe le bakgathatema ba maleba bao ba nago le kgahlego mo tlhabollong le matlafatšong ya bafsa ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo soBeko-liso noVavanyo (i-M&E) soMgaqo-nkqubo woLutsha lweSizwe (i-NYP).

src_text: Tshedimošo tla kgoboketšwa ka go aroganywa ka dikarolo go ya ka mengwaga, bong, bogolofadi, sehlopha sa merafe le tikologo ya thutafase ya ditsenogare tše.
