tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume isicwangciso-nkqubo se-M&E esiza kunceda ukubeka iliso okusebenzayo kunye novavanyo lweempembelelo zeentsika ze-NYP yowama-2020 ukuya kowama-.

src_text: Dikgato tše tša go dira ditlhahlobo di tla dirwa ka mafelong ka moka mmušo, ka ditheong ka moka le lekaleng la praebete.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo sibonelela ngezalathisi ezintlanu ezikwinqanaba eliphezulu ezihambelana neentsika ze-NYP.

src_text: Dipego tša tšona di tla dirwa kotareng ye nngwe le ye nngwe gomme tša phatlalatšwa gabedi ka ngwaga.
tgt_text: Ezi zalathisi zaqulunqwa kubanjiswene namahlakaniafanelekileyo anomdla kuphuhliso nasekuxhotyisweni kolutsha kweli lizwe.

src_text: Tlhako ya Pholisi ya Peakanyo ye Kopantšwego.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha eziza kuqokelelwa ziza kujonga iminyaka yobudala, isini, ukukhubazeka, uhlanga ngokwebala kunye nendawo yokuhlala ngokwemimmandla yala mangenelelo..     Ukubeka iliso kuza kwenziwa kuwo onke amanqanaba karhulumente, kumaqumrhu nakumacandelo abucala.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Tlhako ya Pholisi ya Peakanyo ye Kopantšwego ya mmušo, yeo nyakago go šogana le mafokodi peakanyo ya pholisi ao utollotšwego mo lenaneong la peakanyo la gonabjale.
tgt_text: Iingxelo ziza kwenziwa ngekota kwaye zipapashwe kabini ngonyaka..     Isicwangciso-nkqubo soMgaqo-nkqubo woCwangciso oluDityanisiweyo.

src_text: Ditsenogare tšeo di šišintšwego di tla re gare ga tše dingwe tša šogana le tlhokego ya tlhopo ya peakanyo mo dikarolong tše tharo tša mmušo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isivumile Isicwangciso-nkqubo soMgaqo-nkqubo woCwangciso oluDityanisiweyo kurhulumente, esijonge ukulungisa izikhewu eziboniweyo zocwangciso lomgaqo-nkqubo kwinkqubo yocwangciso yangoku.

src_text: Ditsenogare di tla tsebiša mokgwa wa tlhahlobo wo theilwego go bohlatse.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela acetywayo phakathi kwezinye izinto aza kujongana nokunqongophala kolungelelwaniso locwangciso phakathi kwamanqanaba amathathu karhulumente.

src_text: Tlhako ya pholisi tsebišitše gape kakanyo ye bonolo ka peakanyo ya nako ye telele go ya magareng le peakanyo ya nako ye kopana go phatlalala le mmušo tla šomela go thoma dimpshafatšo tša melao go kaonafatša kopano le kakanyo mo peakanyong le tlhahlobong ya mmušo.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela azo kuqalisa indlela yokubeka iliso esekelwe kubungqina.

src_text: Tumelelo ya Tumelelano ya go Thongwa ga Mokgatlo wa Dihlare tša Seafrika (AMA).
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo somgaqo-nkqubo sikwazisa ukuqikelelwa lula ngocwangciso lwexesha elide ukuya kwixesha eliphakathi kunye nelexesha elifutshane kurhulumente wonke.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go saenwa ga Tumelelano ya go Thongwa ga AMA le go išwa ga yona Palamenteng go ka dumelelwa.
tgt_text: Siza kusebenzela ukwazisa uhlaziyo lwemithetho ukuze kuphuculwe ukuhambelana nokuqikelelwa kucwangciso kunye nokubekwa kweliso kukarhulumente..     Ukuvunywa kweSivumelwano sokuSekwa kwe-Arhente yaMayeza ase-Afrika (i-AMA).

src_text: Se se tla phetha tumelelano yeo amogelwago ke Kopano ya Tumelelano ya Afrika ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukutyikitywa kweSivumelwano sokuSekwa kwe-AMA kunye nokungeniswa kwaso ePalamente ukuze sivunywe.

src_text: Tumelelano thoma semmušo AMA ya kontinente.
tgt_text: Oku kuza kuzalisekisa isivumelwano esamkelwa yiNdibano yeManyano ye-Afrika ngowama-.

src_text: Mokgatlo tla laola ditšweletšwa tša dihlare, gomme wa kaonafatša polokego le bokgoni bja ditšweletšwa tša dihlare ka kontinenteng.
tgt_text: Esi sivumelwano siseka ngokusesikweni i-AMA yeli lizwekazi.

src_text: Go saenwa le go dumelelwa ga tumelelano ye go tla kaonafatša boikgafo bja Afrika Borwa mo lefaseng le mo kontinenteng mo go matlafatšeng lenaneo la taolo ya kontinente mo go ditšweletšwa tša maphelo.
tgt_text: I-arhente iza kulawula amayeza onyango, kwaye iphucule ukhuseleko kunye nokusebenza kwamayeza onyango kweli lizwekazi.

src_text: Pego ka ga Lenaneo la Tlhohleletšo ya Motšhelo la Phethagatšo ya Dinyakišišo le Tlhabollo (R&D) – 2019/20 le 2020/.
tgt_text: Ukutyikitya kunye nokuvunywa kungqina ukuba uMzantsi Afrika uzibophelele kwizivumelwano zeli lizwekazi nezehlabathi malunga nokuphucula imithetho yeli lizwekazi elawula iimveliso zalo zempilo..     Ingxelo ngokuSebenza kweNkqubo yesiBonelelo seRhafu yoPhando noPhuhliso (i-R&D) – yowama-2019/20 kunye neyowama-2020/..     IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente kweNkqubo yesiBonelelo seRhafu ye-R&D kule minyaka mibini idlulileyo (ngowama-2019/20 kunye neyowama-2020/21).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya Motšhelo la R&D Palamenteng mo mengwageng ye mebedi ya go feta (2019/20 le 2020/21).
tgt_text: Oku kuhambelana necandelo 11D (17) loMthetho weRhafu yeNgeniso, wowe-1962 (uMthetho wama-58 wowe-1962), elifuna ukuba ezi ngxelo zandlalwe ePalamente.

src_text: Se se sepelelana le karolo ya 11D (17) ya Molao wa Motšhelo wa Letseno, wa 1962 (Molao wa 58 wa 1962), woo nyakago go alwa ga dipego tše ka Palamenteng.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yesibonelelo serhafu ijonge ukukhuthaza iinkampani zabucala ukuba zityale imali kwi-R&D ukuze zikhuthaze ukukhula kotyalo-mali.

src_text: Lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya motšhelo le nyaka go hlohleletša dikhamphani tša praebete go beeletša mo go R&D gore go hlohleletšwe kgolo ya ekonomi, le go godiša katlego.
tgt_text: Ivumela ukuqhubela-phambili kwenzululwazi kunye nobuchule bokuyilaobuza kunceda ekukhuleni koqoqosho, kwaye ikhuthaza ukhuphiswano.

src_text: Kabinete thabela gore pego bontšha gore dikhamphani tše difsa di dirile kgopelo ya tlhohleletšo ya motšhelo hlohleletša dikhamphani tše dintši go hwetša setlamo se bjalo ka karolo ya go godiša dipeeletšo tša bona le go hlohleletša kgolo ya ekonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukuba le ngxelo ibonisa ukuba iinkampani ezintsha zifake izicelo zokufumana isibonelelo serhafu.

src_text: Dikhamphani tše nne tša godimo tšeo di hweditšego tlhohleletšo ya motšhelo di ka makaleng tshepetšo ya ditšweletšwa tša temo; kaonafatšo ya meepo; dikhemikhale, dibotsefatši, dihlare le elektrotheknikhale le Theknolotši ya Tshedimošo tšeo Kabinete di dumeletšego bjalo ka dikarolo tše bohlokwa mo Leanong la Katlego ya Pholisi ya Intasteri.
tgt_text: Ikhuthaza iinkampani ezininzi ukuba zifake izicelo zokuxhamla esi sibonelelo njengenxalenye yokukhulisa utyalo-mali lwazo kunye nokukhwezela ukukhula koqoqosho.

src_text: Pego ka botlalo ka hwetšwa mo wepsaeteng ya Kgoro ya Saense le Kaonofatšo: www.dst.gov.za.
tgt_text: Iinkampani ezine eziphezulu ezithe zasifumana esi sibonelelo serhafu zikwicandelo lokucola iimveliso zolimo; elezokuxhamlisa kwizimbiwa; elezamichiza, elezithambiso, elezamayeza kunye nelezobugcisa bezombane kunye nelezobuchwepheshe bolwazi ethe iKhabhinethi yawamkela njengemacandelo ekufuneka akhokeliswe phambili kwisiCwangciso sokuSebenza soMgaqo-nkqubo wezoShishino.

src_text: Foramo ya Molao wa Dibaka le Kgolo ya Afrika (AGOA) -.
tgt_text: Ingxelo epheleleyo inokufumaneka kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe lezeNzululwazi kunye noBuchule bokuYila:  www.dst.gov.za..     IQonga loMthetho lokuKhula kunye namaThuba ase-Afrika (i-AGOA) – yowama-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga Foramo ya AGOA ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukusingathwa kweQonga le-AGOA ngowama-.

src_text: AGOA dumeletšwe ke Amerika (USA) ka 2000 go fa phihlelelo ya go ikgetha ya kgwebo ya go ikema go bontši bja dinaga tša Afrika tša Borwa bja Sahara le mebaraka ya gae ya USA.
tgt_text: I-AGOA yaphunyezwa yiMelika (i-USA) ngowama-2000 ukuze yenze kube lula kumazwe amaninzi ase-Afrika akumazantsi e-Sahara ukurhweba ne-USA.

src_text: Dikišontle tša Afrika Borwa ka fase ga AGOA di akaretša dienywa tša go butšwa, dimake, dikoloi, didirišwa, tšhipi, setala le ditšweletšwa tša khemikhale.
tgt_text: Iimveliso zorhwebo zoMzantsi Afrika ezithunyelwa e-USA phantsi kwe-AGOA ziquka iziqhamo ezityiwayo, amandongomane, izithuthi, iintsimbi zemoto, intsimbi, isinyithi kunye neemveliso zemichiza.

src_text: Tšatšikgwedi la nnete le lefelo di sa tlo tsebišwa.
tgt_text: Owona mhla nendawo zisaza kubhengezwa.

src_text: Samiti ya Ditona ya Sehlopha sa Ditlhahlobo tša Lefase (GEO) –.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela yaBaphathiswa ye-Group on Earth Observations (i-GEO) –.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore Afrika Borwa sware Samiti ya Ditona ya GEO ka Motsekapa ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba uMzantsi Afrika usingathe iNgqungquthela yaBaphathiswa ye-GEO eKapa ngowama-.

src_text: GEO ke mokgatlo wa mebušo ya boditšhabatšhaba woo hlomilwego ka 2003 ka morago ga Samiti ya Lefase ya Tlhabollo ya go Swarelela šoma bjalo ka sefala sa kopano moo dinaga di kgathago tema ka go ithaopa go fihlelela nepo ya go swana ya go aga mananeo GEO.
tgt_text: I-GEO liqumrhu eliphakathi koorhulumente elasekwa ngowama-2003 emva kweNgqungquthela yeHlabathi yowama-2002 yoPhuhliso oluZinzileyo.

src_text: Gonabjale GEO na le mebušo ya bosetšhaba ya go feta 113, ye 30 ya yona tšwago ka Afrika gomme mekgatlo ye ka bago 140 kgatha tema, gomme ye 11 ya yona tšwa Afrika.
tgt_text: Isebenza njengeqonga lamazwe ngamazwe apho amazwe anikela ngokuzithandela kwinjongo enye yokwakha iinkqubo ze-GEO.

src_text: Afrika Borwa dutše le leloko la Komitiphethiši go tloga ka 2005 gomme boramahlale ba rena gonabjale ba kgatha tema mananeong dinyakišišo mmalwa ao etilwego pele ke GEO.
tgt_text: I-GEO ngoku inoorhulumente bamazwe abangaphezulu kwe-113, abangama-30 kubo bavela e-Afrika kunye nemibutho ethatha inxaxheba emalunga ne-140, kwaye i-11 lale mibutho livela e-Afrika.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Dinamelwa ya Diphalane (OTM) –.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ube lilungu leKomiti Elawulayo elisebenzayo ukusukela ngowama-2005 kwaye iinzululwazi zethu ngoku zithatha inxaxheba kumaphulo ophando amaninzi akhokelwa yi-GEO.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go thakgolwa ga lesolo la OTM ka Mokibelo, 1 Diphalane 2022, ka fase ga morero: “Sishov’ingolovane: mmogo re aga infrastraktšha ya dinamelwa yeo agago mešomo ya go swarelela”.
tgt_text: Inyanga yezoThutho yeDwarha (i-OTM) –.

src_text: OTM ya ngwaga le ngwaga šomišwa go godiša temošo ka dinamelwa bjalo ka dikarolo tše bohlokwa mo kgolong ya ekonomi le tlhabollo ya mahlakore mararo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukusungulwa kwephulo le-OTM ngoMgqibelo, umhla woku-1 kweyeDwarha yowama-2022, phantsi komxholo othi:  “Sishov’ingolovane: sisonke sakha iziseko zophuhliso zezothutho ezakha nezigcina indlela yokuphila”.

src_text: Go tla ba le ditiragalo tše mmalwa go bontšha dikarolo tše mmalwa tša infrastraktšha ya dinamelwa ka go difofane, dikepe, dinamelwa tša bohle le ditsela.
tgt_text: I-OTM yonyaka isetyenziselwa ukwazisa ngezothutho njengenye yezinto ezibalulekileyo ekukhuleni koqoqosho kunye nophuhliso lweendawo ezihlala uluntu.

src_text: Ditiragalo di lemoša gape ka polokego le tšhireletšo ya dinamelwa.
tgt_text: Imisebenzi emininzi iza kwenziwa ukubonisa imiba eyahlukeneyo yeziseko zophuhliso lothutho kwezophapho, kwezaselwandle, kwezothutho lukawonke-wonke kunye neendlela.

src_text: Go tla akaretšwa gape bakgathatema go boledišana ka ditlhohlo tša go fapana mo lekaleng la dinamelwa.
tgt_text: Le misebenzi iza kwazisa uluntu malunga nokhuseleko kunye nokhuselo lwezothutho.

src_text: Mmušo dula ikgafile mo go kaonafatšeng infrastraktšha ya dinamelwa ya naga, bobedi mo mafelong segae le setoropong, gore go sepetšwe tshepelo ye botse gape ya bokgoni ya dithoto le batho.
tgt_text: Iindibano zokubonisana namahlakani abachaphazelekayo nazo ziza kubanjwa ukuze kuxoxwe ngemiceli-mngeni eyahlukeneyo kwicandelo lezothutho.

src_text: Kopano ya Lenaneo la Magae la Bodulo bja Batho (UN-HABITAT) la Kopanoditšhaba (UN).
tgt_text: Urhulumente usazibophelele ekuphuculeni iziseko zophuhliso zezothutho zeli lizwe, kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni kunye nasezidolophini, ukuze kube lula ukuthuthwa kweempahla kunye nabantu ngendlela esebenzayo nenempumelelo..     Intlanganiso yeZizwe Ezimanyeneyo (i-UN) neNkqubo yokuHlaliswa koLuntu (i-UN-HABITAT).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga kopano ya maloko UN-HABITAT ka Johannesburg ka la 16 Diphalane..  Kgoro ya Bodulo bja Batho tla sepetša kopano ye ya matšatši mabedi yeo tla tsenelwago ke ditsebi tša dipolotiki, ditsebi le banyakišiši, go akaretša malokomagolo Komiti ya go ya go ile ya Baemedi ba UN-HABITAT bao ba lego Nairobi, Kenya.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusingathwa kwentlanganiso yamalungu e-UN-HABITAT eRhawutini ngomhla we-16 nowe-17 kweyeDwarha ngowama-.

src_text: Ditaba tše bohlokwa tšeo go tla bolelwago ka tšona di tla akaretša ditsenogare tša phetogo go badudi ba mekhukhung le metsesetoropo go tlala kudu.
Dipoelo tša dipoledišano tše di tla phethwa mo thakgolong ya Tlhako ya Leano la Katlego la Lefase, yeo tla alwago Kopanong ya UN-HABITAT gore dumelelwe ka  Melaokakanywa.
tgt_text: ISebe lezokuHlaliswa koLuntu liza kuququzelela le ntlanganiso yeentsuku ezimbini eza kuzinyaswa ziintshatsheli zezopolitiko, iingcali kunye nabaphandi, kuquka namalungu abalulekileyo eKomiti yaBammeli abasiSigxina be-UN-HABITAT ezinze e-Nairobi, e-Kenya.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wa Khansele ya Setšhaba ya Dikgaruru tša Bong le Dipolao tša Basadi le Bana (GBVF) wa.
tgt_text: Imiba engundoqo eza kuxoxwa iza kuquka ukufuna amanyathelo okungenelela aza kuza notshintsho kwiindawo zoogob’ityholo kunye nakumatyotyombe..     Iziphumo zezi ngxoxo ziza kufikelela kuvuthondaba ngokusungulwa kweSicwangciso-nkqubo seSicwangciso sokuSebenza seHlabathi, esiza kuthiwa thaca kwiNdibano ye-UN-HABITAT ukuze sivunywe ngowama-     Imithetho eYilwayo.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wa Khansele ya Setšhaba ya 2021 Palamenteng gore go šoganwe le wona.
tgt_text: Umthetho oYilwayo weBhunga leSizwe loBundlobongela obuSekwe kwiSini kunye nokuBulawa kwabaseTyhini (i-GBVF) wowama-..     IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa koMthetho oYilwayo weBhunga leSizwe le-GBVF wowama-2021 ePalamente ukuze uqwalaselwe.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo fa tlhako ya molao mo go hlongweng ga mokgatlo wa molao gore go be le tsenogare ye nepišago mo go šoganeng le GBVF dumelela gape go thongwa ga Boto ya Khansele yeo tla fago taolo yeo beakantšwego gomme ya laola phethagatšo ya Leano la Taolo ya Setšhaba ka ga GBVF, leo le dumeletšwego ke Kabinete ka Diphalane 2020 go phethagatšwa.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo unika ingcaciso ngomthetho oza kusetyenziswa xa kusekwa iqumrhu elimiselwe ngokomthetho eliza kungqala ngqo kule ngxaki ye-GBVF..     Ukwakhululela ukuba kusekwe iBhodi yeli Bhunga eza kukhokela ize ibeke iliso kumalinge okuphunyezwa kwesiCwangciso-qhinga seSizwe se-GBVF, esavunywa yiKhabhinethi kweyeDwarha yowama-2020 ukuba masiqalise ukusebenza.

src_text: Boto tla le kemedi ya 51 go tšwa go setšhaba sa gae le 49% go tšwa mmušong.
tgt_text: Le bhodi iza kuba namalungu angama-51% avela kwimibutho yoluntu aze wona angama-49% aphume kurhulumente.

src_text: Molaokakanywa šetše swayaswayilwe ke setšhaba.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo sele ugwadliwe kwiindibano zovakaliso-zimvo zoluntu...     Umthetho oYilwayo woLawulo lweeMveliso zeCuba neMidiza e-Elektronikhi wowama-.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wa Ditšweletšwa tša Motšoko le Didirišwa tša go Kgoga Motšoko tša Elektroniki wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa koMthetho oYilwayo woLawulo lweeMveliso zeCuba neMidiza e-Elektronikhi wowama-2018 ePalamente, ojonge ukurhoxisa lo Mthetho woLawulo lweeMveliso zeCuba ukhoyo, wowe-1993 (uMthetho wama-83 wowe-1993), njengoko ulungisiwe.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa palamenteng Ditshwayotshwayo tša Molaokakanywa wa Ditšweletšwa tša Motšoko le Didirišwa tša go Kgoga Motšoko tša Elektroniki wa 2018, tšeo di nyakago go phumola Molao wa gonabjale wa go Laola Ditšweletšwa tša Motšoko, (Molao wa 83 wa 1993) go ya le ka moo mpshafaditšwego ka gona.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo ukwajonge ukuqinisa amanyathelo elizwe amalunga nezempilo yoluntu aze enziwe ukuba  ahambelane nesiVumelwano soMbutho wezeMpilo weHlabathi seSicwangciso-nkqubo soLawulo lweCuba kuLawulo lweCuba.

src_text: Molaokakanywa nyaka go matlafatša magato maphelo setšhaba naga gomme dire gore sepelelane le Tumelelano ya Tlhako ya Mokgatlo wa Maphelo Lefase ka ga Taolo ya Motšoko.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uphakamisa, phakathi kwezinye izinto, ukuba kubhangiswe tu ukutshaya ngaphakathi kwizakhiwo nakwezinye iindawo ezingaphandle kwezakhiwo;; ukubhangiswa kokuthengiswa kwecuba ngoomatshini bokuthengisa, futhi ukwaphucula neendlela amaqokobhe ecuba enziwa ngayo kunye nemibhalo yokulumkisa ebhalwe kuwo.

src_text: Molaokakanywa šišinya gare ga tše dingwe, gore go se sa folelwa ka gare ga meago le mafelo mangwe ka ntle ga meago; go fedišwa ga thekišo ya sekerete mo metšheneng ya go rekiša, le go thekga taba ya diphuthelwana tša disekerete le maswao temošo.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uhliwe amahlongwane wade wacokiswa ngamahlakani achaphazelekayo ahlukeneyo, aquka amashishini ecuba, imibutho yoluntu kunye namasebe karhulumente afanelekileyo     Imisitho ezayo.

src_text: Molaokakanywa fetišitšwe dikgatong tša go tsenelela tša go nyaka maikutlo setšhaba go fapana, go akaretša intasteri ya metšoko mekgatlo ya badudi le dikgoro tša mmušo tša maleba  Ditiragalo tše di Tlago.
tgt_text: Iseshoni yama-77 yeNdibano Jikelele yeZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UNGA77).

src_text: Kopano ya bo 77 ya Kopanokakaretšo ya UN (UNGA77).
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uthatha inxaxheba kwi-UNGA77 eqhubeka kundlunkulu we-UN kwisiXeko saseNew York e-USA ukusuka ngomhla wama-20 ukuya kowama-27 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-2022 phantsi komxholo othi:  “Ixesha lesiganeko sokuphawula utshintsho olubalulekileyo lwembali:  Ukuvula izisombululo zenguqu kwimiceli-mngeni edibanayo”.

src_text: Afrika Borwa kgatha tema ka go UNGA77 yeo lego ka go dikantorokgolo tša UN ka Toropokgolong ya New York ka USA go tloga ka la 27 Lewedi 2022 ka fase ga morero: “Nako ya mathata: Go tšweletša ditharollo go kgokaganya ditlhohlo”.
tgt_text: Umonakalo owenziwe ngubhubhane weNtsholongwane ye-Corona kuqoqosho nentlalo yamazwe akumazantsi e-Ikweyitha awufani xa uthelekiswa nesantya sokubuyela kwimo yesiqhelo kumazwe atyebileyo asemantla e-Ikhweyitha kwaye ufuna amazwe ehlabathi ukuba abambisane ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuba akukho mntu ushiyekelayo..     Ngaphambi kweNgxoxo-mpikiswano ye-UN, uNobhala-Jikelele we-UN, uMnu António Guterres, uza kubiza ingqungquthela "ngoTshintsho lweMfundo" kwaye abambe intlanganiso ekwinqanaba eliphezulu egxile kwiiNjongo zoPhuhliso oluZinzileyo (ii-SDGs).

src_text: Go Borwa bja lefase, khuetšo ya ekonomi le ekonomi ya leago ya leuba la Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19) bile bothata kudu malebana le tsošološo go Leboa leo le hlabologilego gomme se se nyaka maitapišo ao kopanetšwego go tšwa dinageng ka moka go kgonthiša gore ga go na yoo tlogetšwego morago.
tgt_text: Intlanganiso yee-SDGs kulindeleke ukuba iphonononge iindlela zokubuyela kula moya wodlamko wangaphambili kunye nokukhawulezisa ukuphunyezwa kwazo.

src_text: Pele ga Ngangišano ya Kakaretšo ya UN, Mongwaledikakaretšo wa UN, Morena António Guterres tla beakanya samiti ka ga “Go fetoša Thuto” le go swara kopano ya maemo godimo yeo nepišago Dinepo tša Tlhabollo ya go Swarelela (di-SDG).
tgt_text: Usuku lwezaMasiko.

src_text: Kopano ya di-SDG swanelwa ke go nyakišiša ditsela tšeo go ka tsošološago maatla le go potlakiša phethagatšo.
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa uza kuba sisithethi sembeko kwimibhiyozo yoSuku lwezaMasiko yeSizwe ngowama-2022 kwiZakhiwo zoMdibaniso ngoMgqibelo, umhla wama-24 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-.

src_text: Letšatši la Bohwa.
tgt_text: Lo Mnyhadala uza kubanjwa phantsi komxholo othi:  “UkuBhiyozela imiSebenzi kaSolomon Linda kunye noMculo weMveli waseMzantsi Afrika”..     Inyanga yaMasiko kulo nyaka igxile kumculo wemveli woMzantsi Afrika ize igxininisa kakhulu kumculo weSsicathamiya kunye negalelo lawo elikhulu kwimidlalo yethu, ubugcisa, inkcubeko kunye namasiko.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fa polelokgolo mo meketekong ya Letšatši la Bohwa la Setšhaba mo Union Buildings ka Mokibelo, 24 Lewedi.
tgt_text: Lo mxholo unika imbeko kwisikhumbuzo seminyaka engama-60 yokusweleka kwemvumi, umculi kunye nomqambi wengoma, uSolomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), nowaziwa njengoSolomon Ntsele, nowaziwa kakhulu njengomqambi wengoma ethi, “Mbube”.

src_text: Moletlo tla swarwa ka fase ga morero: “Go keteka Bohwa bja Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Setšo wa Afrika Borwa”.
tgt_text: UMnyhadala Onxuseneyo woSuku lwezaseLwandle weHlabathi wowama-2022 .

src_text: Kgwedi ye ya Bohwa nepiša mmino wa setšo wa Afrika Borwa ka nepišo ya mmino wa Isicathamiya le tema yeo ikgathago go dipapadi, bokgabo, setšo le bohwa.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kusingatha uMnyhadala Onxuseneyo woSuku lwezaseLwandle weHlabathi ngowama-2022 e-Durban ukusuka ngomhla we-12 ukuya kowe-14 kweyeDwarha ngowama-.

src_text: Morero hlompha matswalo bo 60 go hlokofala ga rammino, seopedi le motšweletši Solomon Popoli Linda (1901-1962), yoo tsebegago gape bjalo ka Solomon Ntsele, yoo tsebegago kudu bjalo ka motšweletši wa koša ya, “Mbube”.
tgt_text: Lo Mnyhadala uza kubanjwa ngexesha le-OTM, nayo eza kuba yinxalenye yokufundisa ngecandelo lethu lezaselwandle.

src_text: Moletlo wa go Lebana wa Letšatši la Dikepe la.
tgt_text: Lo msitho uza kuzinyaswa ngabathunywa abavela kumazwe ahlukeneyo abazakuzibonela ngokwabo icandelo lezaselwandle loMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla be swara Moletlo wa go Lebana wa Letšatši la Dikepe la 2022 ka Durban go tloga ka la 14 Diphalane.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ube lilungu loMbutho waMazwe ngaMazwe waseLwandle ukusukela ngowe-1995, oyi-arhente ekhethekileyo ye-UN enoxanduva lokulawula uthutho lweenqanawa.

src_text: Moletlo tla swarwa nakong ya OTM, woo le wona tla bago karolo ya go godiša tsebo ya lekala la rena la dikepe.
Moletlo tla tliša baemedi go tšwa dinageng tša go fapana bao ba tla itemogelang intasteri ya dikepe ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Inyanga yoKhenketho.

src_text: Afrika Borwa bile leloko la Mokgatlo wa Dikepe wa Boditšhabatšhaba go tloga ka 1995, woo lego mokgatlo wa go ikgetha wa UN wa go laola dikepe.
tgt_text: Inyanga yoKhenketho kulo nyaka ibhiyozelwa phantsi komxholo woSuku loKhenketho lweHlabathi (ngomhla wama-27 kweyoMsintsi) othi “Ukucinga ngokutsha uKhenketho”.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Boeti.
tgt_text: Ukhenketho lwasekhaya lubalulekile ekuvuseleleni icandelo lezokhenketho, elinegalelo elikhulu kwi-GDP yoMzantsi Afrika nakumalinge okudala imisebenzi.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Boeti ngwaga wo ketekwa ka fase ga morero wa Letšatši la Boeti la Lefase (27 Lewedi) wa “Nagana gape ka Boeti”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukuba icandelo lokwamkela iindwendwe libone ukunyuka kwenani labantu abangabatyeleli emva kwexesha le-COVID-.

src_text: Boeti bja gae bo bohlokwa kudu mo go tsošološeng lekala la boeti, leo le kgathago tema kudu go GDP ya Afrika Borwa le go hlola mošomo.
tgt_text: Aba bantu bazizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Kabinete thabišwa ke gore lekala la kamogelo ya baeti le begile kgolo ya baeti ka morago ga nako ya COVID-.
tgt_text: 2 bathathe uhambo apha ngaphakathi elizweni kwisiqingatha sokuqala sowama-2022 babonakalisa ukuba inani labantu abathatha uhambo linyuke nge-114% xa kuthelekiswa neli xesha linye ngowama-.

src_text: Go tšerwe maeto gae  2 milione mo seripeng sa mathomo sa 2022 begile koketšego ya 114% ge go bapetšwa le nako ya go swana ka.
tgt_text: Oku kubonise ukunyuka kakhulu kwenani labantu abathatha uhambo xa kuthelekiswa neli xesha linye ngowama-2019, apho ibingabantu abazizigidi eziyi-8,6 abathe bathatha uhamba apha ekhaya.

src_text: Se se bontšha kaonafalo ya mmaraka ya nako ya go swana ka 2019, yeo bonego maeto ao tšerwego gae  6 milione.
tgt_text: Njengenxalenye yokubhiyozela iNyanga yoKhenketho, iKhabhinethi ikhuthaza abemmi boMzantsi Afrika ukuba bathabathe inxaxheba kwiphulo lokhenketho olubizwa nge-‘Shotleft’ batyelele amaphondo ethu ohlukeneyo.

src_text: Bjalo ka karolo ya go keteka Kgwedi ya Boeti, Kabinete hlohleletša maAfrika Borwa go tšea maeto ‘Shortleft’ go ya diprofense tša rena tša go fapana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwasamkele isigqibo se-Air Belgium sokuba neenqwelo-moya  ngamaxesha athile onyaka eziza kuza eMzantsi Afrika, ukusukela kule nyanga (kweyoMsintsi), nto leyo eza kuphucula ukhenketho kwaye iqinise ngakumbi iwonga lethu njengendawo yokhenketho ethandwayo ngabakhenkethio.

src_text: Kabinete amogela gape sephetho sa Air Belgium go fofiša difofane tša sehla go ya Afrika Borwa, go thoma kgwedi yona ye (Lewedi), seo se tla matlafatšago boeti gomme sa tiišetša maemo rena bjalo ka nepo ya boeti ya kgetho.
tgt_text: I-Air Belgium iza kuba neenqwelo-moya zeveki eziya eKapa naseRhawutini     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Se tla akaretša difofane tša beke ye nngwe le ye nngwe go ya Motsekapa le Johannesburg  Melaetša.
tgt_text: Amazwi okuvuyisana     Ikhabhinethi ithumela amazwi okuvuyisana kunye neminqweno emihle: kuMongameli William Samoei Ruto weRiphabliki yaseKenya, othe wabekwa ngokusesikweni ngoLwesibini, umhla we-13 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-2022, emva konyulo lukazwelonke olunoxolo obelubanjwe ngomhla we-9 kweyeThupha ngowama-.

src_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebogiša le go lakaletša tše dibotse go:Mopresidente William Samoei Ruto wa Repabliki ya Kenya, yoo hlomamišitšwego ka Labobedi, 13 Lewedi 2022, go latela dikgetho tša bosetšhaba tša khutšo tšeo di swerwego ka la 9 Phato.
tgt_text: Usekela-Mongameli u-David Mabuza ubezimase lo msitho wokubekwa ngokusesikweni egameni likaMongameli Ramaphosa, kunye norhulumente kunye nabantu beRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Motlatšamopresidente David Mabuza tsenetše tlhomamišo legatong la Mopresidente Ramaphosa, le mmušo le batho ba Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa.South African Rugby Union le Toropokgolo ya Motsekapa go swara phadišano ya bo seswai ya Rugby World Cup Sevens gare ga 9 le 11 Lewedi be le lekga la mathomo tiragalo ye ye bohlokwa swarwa ke naga ya Afrika gomme barati ba diketekete bao ba tsenetšego ba ilwe ba thabišwa ka dijo tša rugby le kamogelo ye lemogwago ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: kuMbutho woMbhoxo waseMzantsi Afrika kunye neSixeko saseKapa ngokusingatha ngempumelelo itumente yesibhozo yeNdebe yeHlabathi yoMbhoxo ye-Sevens phakathi komhla we-9 kunye nowe-11 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-.

src_text: MahlokoKabinete romela melaetša ya mahloko go malapa le bagwera ba:Bana ba sekolo ba 18 le batho ba bagolo ba babedi bao ba hlokofetšego mo kotsing ye šoro ka Pongola, KwaZulu-Natal ka Labohlano, 16 Lewedi 2022 ka morago ga go thulana ga lori le bene yeo bego nameditše bana ba sekolo  Bao ba Thwetšwego Mešomong.
tgt_text: Oku ibikokokuqala ukuba lo mnyhadala ubalulekileyo usingathwe lilizwe lase-Afrika kwaye amawaka amaninzi abalandeli abebezimasile bayoliswa ngetheko lombhoxo kunye nobubele odume ngabo uMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Batho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona dithuto tla tiišetšwa le go netefatšwa ka maleba  Morena Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale bjalo ka Molaodimogolophethiši (DG): Mokhomišinare wa Setšhaba wa Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Tshokollo  Ngaka Malixole Percival Mahlati bjalo ka Motlatšamolaodimogolophethiši (DDG: lefapheng la go šoma ka merero ya Dikolo tša Maokelo tša Thuto ya Godimo ka moka le ya Tlhabollo ya Bašomi mo Kgorong ya Maphelo  Morena Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki bjalo ka Mohlahlobimogolophethiši mo Kgorong ya Temo, Tsošološo ya Naga le Tlhabollo ya Dinagamagaed.
tgt_text: Amazwi ovelwano      IKhabhinethi ivakalisa amazwi ovelwano kusapho nakubahlobo: babantwana besikolo abali-18 kunye nabantu abadala ababini abasweleke kwingozi emanyukunyezi e-Pongola, KwaZulu-Natal ngoLwesihlanu, ngomhla we-16 kweyoMsintsi yowama-2022 emva kokuba ilori esisigadla esinamatroko ithe yangqubana okweenkunzi zegusha kunye neveni ebithwele abafundi     Izikhundla.

src_text: Morena Phaswa Phineas Mamogale bjalo ka Mohlankedimogolo wa Ditšhelete mo Kgorong ya Maphelo.
tgt_text: Zonke izikhundla zixhomekeke ekuqinisekisweni kwamabakala emfundo kunye nokuqinisekiswa okufanelekileyo kwezokhuseleko     UMnu Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale njengoMlawuli-Jikelele (i-DG):  UMkomishinala weSizwe weSebe leeNkonzo zoLuleko     UGq Malixole Percival Mahlati njengeSekela lika-DG: Iinkonzo zeMpilo zeziBhedlele zaMaziko eMfundo Ephakamileyo kunye noPhuhliso lwezaBasebenzi kwiSebe lezeMpilo     UMnu Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki njengoNocanda-Jikelele oyiNtloko kwiSebe lezoLimo, uBuyekezo loMhlaba noPhuhliso lwasemaPhandleni     UMnu Phaswa Phineas Mamogale njengeGosa eliyiNtloko lezeziMali kwiSebe lezeMpilo..     IKhabhinethi ivume ukuqeshwa kwaba balandelayo     UMnu Tshediso Matona njengoMkomishinala weKomishoni yokuXhotyiswa kwabaMnyama ngokuBanzi kwezoQoqosho     Amalungu eSigqeba seziBheno seBhodi yeFilimu noPapasho:  UMnu Siyazi Tyamtyam (uSihlalo); UNksz Sohani Natasha Chundhur;UNksz Sisanda Nkoala;UNks Shandukani Mulaudzi;UNks Nomaswazi Rachel Shabangu-Mndawe;UGq Litheko Modisane;UMnu Phuti Nehemia Phukubje;UMnu James Shikwambana; kunyenoNksz Manko Thalitha Bufffel (uqeshiwe kwakhona).

src_text: Tšhireletšego ya Meetse.
tgt_text: Ugcino lwamanzi.

src_text: Kabinete lebogile MaAfrika Borwa ka moka ge ba obametše taelo ya go fokotšwa ga meetse ye phethagaditšwego dikarolong tše dingwe tša Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni go boetša sekeng maemo matamo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibulele abemi boMzantsi Afrika ngokuthobela izithintelo zokusebenzisa amanzi eziphunyezwe kwiindawo ezithile zaseRhawutini, eTshwane nase-Ekurhuleni ngeenzame zokuzinzisa umthamo omumethwe ngoovimba bamanzi.

src_text: Matamo ka mehutahuta ka fase ga kgatelelo ye kgolo kudu ka baka la dithemphereitšha tša go fiša tšhiritšhiri gola Gauteng, ebile nyakego ye golelago godimo ya meetse gapeleditše Rand Water go fokotša ka bontši meetse ao abelwago mebasepala.
tgt_text: Amadama kunye noovimba banomthamo ongaphantsi koxinzelelo ngenxa yobushushu obukwiqondo eliphezulu e-Gauteng, kwaye ukwanda kwemfuneko yamanzi kunyanzelise i-Rand Water ukuba icuthe ngesaquphe unikezelo lwamanzi kwaba masipala.

src_text: Rand Water aba meetse go nwega mantši bathong ba go feta 11 milione go la Gauteng, dikarolong tše dingwe tša Mpumalanga, Freistata le Leboa Bodikela.
tgt_text: Eli ziko lamanzi libonelela ngobuninzi bamanzi aselwayo kubantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezili-11 e-Gauteng, kwiindawo zaseMpumalanga, eFreystata naseMntla Ntshona.

src_text: Tšona diphokotšo tše tša go se efogege di nepile go boloka kabo ya meetse ebile di tla dula di le gona go ba go fihlela ge seemo se kaonafala.
tgt_text: Ezi zithintelo esingakwaziyo ukuzibaleka zenzelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuba siyaqhubeka nokuphaka amanzi ngendlela ezinzileyo, kwaye zisezakuhlala zikhona de imeko ibe bhetele.

src_text: Kabinete dirile boipiletšo setšhabeng go tšwelapele go obamela magato phokotšo ya meetse le go kgatha tema ya bona ka go šomiša ka tshwanelo ka ge le sedirišwa sa go hlokwa kudu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlabe ikhwelo kuluntu ukuba luqhubeleke luyithobela imiqathango yothintelo lwamanzi kwaye ludlale indima yalo ngokusebenzisa ngokonga amanzi kuba abaluleke kakhulu futhi anqongophele..   Ugwayimbo lakwa-Transnet.

src_text: Mogwanto wa Transnet.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isivumelwano semivuzo yeminyaka emithathu ekufikelelwe kuso phakathi kuka-Transnet nombutho wabasebenzi i-United National Transport Union (i-UNTU), esi sivumelwano sizosebenza ukusuka kumhla woku-1 kuTshazimpunzi 2022 ukuya kowama-31 kweyoKwindla.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše kwano ya meputso ya mengwaga ye meraro ye kwanetšwego ke Transnet le Yunione ya Mohlakanelwa ya Bosetšhaba ya Dinamelwa (UNTU), ye tlo dirišwago pakeng ya 1 Moranang 2022 go fihla ka la 31 Hlakola.
tgt_text: IKomishini yoXolelwaniso, kunye noLamlo ingenelele ngokulamla esi sivumelwano esenze ukuba luphele ngoko nangoko ugwayimbo obeluqhutywa ngamalungu e-UNTU.

src_text: Khomišene ya Poelano, Bonamodi le Ditherišano namotše kwano ye, gomme magato bona dirile gore boipelaetšo ka maloko UNTU bo fedišwe ka ponyo ya leihlo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwasamkele isigqibo sombutho i-South African and Allied Workers Union (i-SATAWU) sokurhoxisa olu gwayimbo.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše gape sephetho sa go fediša mogwanto ka Yunione ya Dinamelwa ya Afrika Borwa le ya Bašomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuzibophelela kuka-Transnet ekubeni agxininise ekugqibeni umsebenzi osemva okuwo wonke amazibuko noololiwe obangelwe lolu gwayimbo, oluchaphazele uqoqosho kunye namacandelo axhomekeke kwiinkonzo zale arhente.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše boikgafo bja Transnet bja go bea šedi godimo ga go fediša ditšhalelomorago tše bilego gona go ralala boemakepe le dipeakanyong tša ditimela nakong ya magato boipelaetšo, ao bilego le seabe se se mpe ikonoming le makaleng ao tshepetšego godimo ga Transnet go aba ditirelo..   Kabinete bontšhitše tebogo ya yona godimo ga thekgo le tšhomišanommogo ye laeditšwego ke dikgwebo ka nako ya mogwanto hlohleletša kamano ye sa felego magareng ga balaodi ba Transnet le bašomi gore khamphani ye le ikonomi ya naga ka bophara di holege.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise umbulelo wayo kwinkxaso nentsebenziswano ebisuka kwabezoshishino ngethuba logwayimbo.

src_text: Dikamano tša Afrika Borwa le Saudi Arabia.
tgt_text: Ikhuthaza ubudlelwane obukhona phakathi kwabalawuli bakwa-Transnet nabasebenzi ukuze kuxhamle inkampani noqoqosho lwelizwe.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše Ketelo ya Mošomo ye atlegilego ya go ya kua the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia ka Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka la 15 le 16 Diphalane.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane boMzantsi Afrika ne-Saudi Arabia.

src_text: Nakong ya keteko ye, dinaga tše ka bobedi di saenetše Dimemorantamo tše 17 tša Kwešišano go magoro go fapafapana go swana le temo, boreatlhapi, meepo, enetši ya go mpšhafatšega, tšhireletšego, dinamelwa le temo ya diphedi le dimela tša ka meetseng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamkele uTyelelo lokuSebenza lukaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa e-Kingdom of  Saudi Arabia olubeyimpumelelo, lwangomhla we-15 nowe-16 kweyeDwarha.

src_text: Dimemorantamo tše dingwe tša kwešišano tšeo di saenetšwego ke tša mabapi le go hlongwa ga Khansele ya Mohlakanelwa ya Dikgwebo, tšhomišano legorong la diintasteri tša sešole le dithekišetšano, tšhomišano ya ditekolonyakišišo tša thutaswika.
tgt_text: Kolu tyelelo, la mazwe mabini atyikitye iZivumelwano Zokusebenzisana (ii-MoU) ezili-17 kumacandelo ohlukeneyo afana nezolimo, ezokuloba, ezemigodi, amandla ombane ohlaziyekayo, ukhuseleko, ezothutho kunye nezolimo lwasemanzini.

src_text: Mopresidente šomišitše ketelo ye go mema dikgwebo tša Saudi Arabia go iponagatša khonferenseng ya bohlano ya dipeeletšo ya Afrika Borwa ye tlo swarwago ka.
tgt_text: Ezinye ii-MoU ezityikityiweyo zisekusekweni kweBhunga lezoShishino eliDityanelweyo, intsebenziswano kushishino lomkhosi nokuthengwa kwempahla, kunye nentsebenziswano kuphando lwejiyoloji.

src_text: Saudi Arabia ke mogwebišani wa bobedi wo mogologolo wa Afrika Borwa seleteng sa Bohlabelagare ebile ke mothopo wo mogologolo wa diromelwa ka nageng go tšwa go sona selete se.
tgt_text: UMongameli usebenzise olu tyelelo ukumema amashishini ase-Saudi Arabia kwinkomfa yesihlanu yotyalo-mali eMzantsi Afrika eza kubanjwa ngonyaka wama-.

src_text: Dikamano tša boditšhabatšhaba magareng ga dinaga tše ka bobedi di bile le ditlamorago tše botse godimo ga ditlwaedi tša kgwebišano le dipeeletšo.
tgt_text: I-Saudi Arabia ililizwe elikwindawo yesibini ngokomthamo  wezorhwebo kumazwe arhweba noMzantsi Afrika kummandla woMbindi Mpuma, kwaye eli lizwe lingowona mthombo mkhulu wezinto ezithengwayo ezingena eMzantsi Afrika ezivela kulo mmandla.

src_text: Dipeeletšo tša Mananeokgoparara.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane phakathi kwala mazwe omabini bunesiqhamo esihle kurhwebo notyalo-mali.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše go thongwa ga polante ya tšweletšo ya plastiki ya maemo godimodimo lefaseng ka khampani ya go dira plastiki yeo tšwago pele maemong boditšhabatšhaba, ya go bitšwa ALPLA Group, go la Lanseria kua Gauteng.
tgt_text: Utyalo-mali kwiziseko zophuhliso.

src_text: Se se tlaleletša maikgafo Mopresidente Ramaphosa go bea sekeng tlhabollo ya mananeokgoparara bjalo ka mokgwa wa go hlohleletša kgolo ya ikonomi le go atiša mešomo..   Dipeeletšo tša boleng bja US$50 milione di kgatha tema ye kgolo godimo ga Leanolegolo la Toropo ya Mabonwa ya Lanseria leo le tlo hlohleletšago seemo seo se tieletšego le tšhomišoleswa le gape go hlola le go šireletša mešomo ye.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuqaliswa kwamalungiselelo okwakha iziko elikumgangatho ophezulu lokuvelisa iiplastiki yinkampani ephambili kwihlabathi, , i-ALPLA Group, e-Lanseria e-Gauteng.

src_text: Godimo ga dipeeletšo tše go akaretšwa le lenaneo la go ithutela mošomo la batsebi ba 36 ba bointšineere bja dikgerekgere le ba tšhomišogape ba ditiro tša ALPLA Group go ralala selete sa Borwa bja Afrika.
tgt_text: Oku kongeza ekuzinikeleni kukaMongameli Ramaphosa ekubekeni uphuhliso lweziseko ezingundoqo njengendlela yokuvuselela uqoqosho nokwandisa imisebenzi.

src_text: Lenaneo le la boithutelamošomo le tlo thoma ka 2023, ka baithutelamošomo ba mathomo ba 12 ba MaAfrika Borwa ba go tšwa mafelong ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Olu tyalo-mali oluxabisa ama-50 ezigidi zeedola zaseMelika ligalelo elingundoqo kwisicwangciso esikhulu sedolophu yale mihla, ii-Lanseria Smart City esiceba ukuqhuba uzinzo kunye nohlaziyo lweemveliso kwanokudala nokugcina imisebenzi engama-.

src_text: Meepo ye Sego Molaong.
tgt_text: Kukwabandakanywe nenkqubo yokuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi kubasebenzi abangama-36 abazakuba ziingcaphephe zokusebenza ngoomatshini neengcali zokuhlaziya iinkunkuma ibeyimveliso entsha kwimisebenzi yeenkampani ye-ALPLA Group kuwo wonke amazwe  akumazantsi e-Afrika.

src_text: Meepo ye sego molaong kweša setšhaba bohloko le go gobatša ikonomi ya gaborena, ebile dipoelo tša yona ke tobo ya letseno go bobedi mmušo le lefapha la meepo..   Kabinete amogetše go amogwa ga dithunya tšeo di bego di utilwe le go golegwa ga bagononelwa ba 20 ba go amana le meepo ye sego molaong ka nako ya lesolophuruphutšo kua mokoting wa moepo wa Stilfontein go la Leboa Bodikela.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yokuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi iza kuqalisa ngonyaka wama-2023, abafundi bokuqala abali-12 baseMzantsi Afrika bazakuba bephuma kuluntu lwasekuhlaleni.

src_text: Kabinete dira boipiletšo go MaAfrika Borwa go tšwelapele go šomišana le mabotho phethagatšo ya molao go netefatša go atlega ga masolo kamoso twantšho ya bosenyi.
tgt_text: Ukwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho mthethweni.

src_text: Se se tla romela molaetša wo bogale wa gore bosenyi ga bo thuše ka selo, le gore badirabosenyi ba tlo golegwa le go sekišwa ntle poifo goba go šokelwa..  Enetši.
tgt_text: Ukwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho mthethweni kulimaza uluntu kunye noqoqosho lwethu, kwaye kukhokelela kwilahleko yengeniso karhulumente nakwicandelo lezemigodi.

src_text: Eskom saenetše dikwanelo tša go hiriša tša mengwaga ye 30 gotee le babeeletši ba bane ba batšweletši ba go ikema ba mohlagase go aga metšhene ye mefsa ya go fehla enetši ya go hlweka kua ditišing tša mohlagase tša Majuba le Tutuka gola Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuthinjwa kwemipu emininzi kunye nokubanjwa kwabarhanelwa abangama-20 aboyamene nokwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho mthethweni ngethuba kuqhutywa iphulo lokulwa nolu lwaphulo-mthetho kumgodi wase-Stilfontein eMntla Ntshona.

src_text: Khirišo ye ya seripa sa naga tla goketša dipeeletšo tše phopholeditšwego tša go batamela R40 bilione.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoza abemi boMzantsi Afrika ukuba baqhubeleke nokusebenzisana nee-arhente zogcino-mthetho ukuze kuqinisekwe ukuba nakwilixa elizayo amaphulo okulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho abayimpumelelo.

src_text: Babeeletši ba ba bane – HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Solar Group le Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – ba tlo fehla mohlagase wa go lekana dimekawate tše 2 000 godimo ga mohlagase wa go tšweletšwa setšhabeng.
tgt_text: Oku kuza kuthumela umyalezo ongqongqo wokuba ulwaphulo-mthetho alunanzuzo, kwaye izaphuli-mthetho ziza kubanjwa, zitshutshiswe ngaphandle koloyiko okanye ukwenzelela.

src_text: Phehlo ye ye mpsha ya mohlagase go letetšwe gore kgokaganywe le mohlagase wo tšweletšwago nageng ka bophara mo dikgweding tše 24 go fihla go tše 36 go tloga ge ngwaga wo wa ditšhelete fela, ka go latela ditumelelo tša tikologo, tša karolo ya mafelo le tše dingwe tša taolo.
tgt_text: Amandla ombane.

src_text: Tšhireletšego ya Dijo.
tgt_text: Kutshanje u-Eskom utyikitye izivumelwano zengqeshiso yomhlaba zeminyaka engama-30 nabatyali-zimali abane abazimeleyo abavelisa umbane ukuze bakhe amaziko amatsha okuvelisa amandla ombane ococekileyo kwizikhululo zombane zaseMajuba naseTutuka eMpumalanga.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše go swarwa ka mo nageng ga Lekgotla la 2022 la Agri SA go la Pretoria ka la 13 le la 14 Diphalane 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Kgodišo ya Tšweletšo ya ka Nageng”.
tgt_text: Ezi zivumelwano zokuqeshisa ngomhlaba ziza kutsala utyalo-mali oluqikelelwa malunga nama-40 eebhiliyoni zeerandi.

src_text: Lekgotla le le rerišane ka merero ya go swana le go dira gore maanakgolo temo šomele batšweletši ba ka mo nageng; mananeokgoparara go swarelela dijo tša go tšweletšwa ka mo nageng; go dira gore tikologo ya ka mo nageng tšee nako ye telele godimo ga tšweletšo ya dijo ya ka mo nageng le ka bokamosong, le go matlafatša mabokgoni tšweletšo ya dijo go diriša ditšweletšo tšeo di tšweleditšwego ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Abatyali-zimali abane – i-HDF Energy South Africa, i-Red Rocket SA, i-Sola Group kunye ne-Mainstream Power Renewable Developments South Africa – baza kufaka ubuncinane iimegawathi ezingama-2 000 kwiziko lombane lesizwe.

src_text: Ka gona go bea pele tšhireletšego ya dijo kamoso, Kabinete amogetše go tsebagatšwa ga Hapo ya Bosetšhaba ya Tšhireletšego ya Tlhago, ka Kgoro ya Saense le Lenaneo la Kgwebišano ya Temo ya Ikonomi ya Diphedi, ka tšhomišano le Yunibesithi ya Pretoria.
tgt_text: La maziko matsha okuvelisa umbane kulindeleke ukuba aqhagamshelwe kuthungelwano lombane kwisithuba seenyanga ezingama-24 ukuya kwezingama-36 ukusuka kumhla wokutyikitywa kwezivumelwano zezimali, kodwa ke konke oku kuzakuxhomekeka kumaphepha-mvume endalo, okucandwa komhlaba kunye neminye imithetho enxulumene nolawulo lomhlaba.

src_text: Hapo ye tla thekga thibelo, phokotšo le taolo ya dipuno le malwetši diphoofolo, ao tlo bago le seabe sa tšweletšo ye hlatlogetšego godimo, tšhireletšego ya dijo le tlhabollo ye swarelelago ya dinagamagae   Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: Ukufumaneka kokutya.

src_text: Go Dumelelwa ga Tšhatha ya Kopano ya Afrika (AU) ya go Hlongwa ga Makala.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusingathwa kweNkongolo ye-Agri SA yowama-2022 ePitoli ngomhla we-13 nowe-14 kweyeDwarha 2022 phantsi komxholo othi: “Silima Ukutya ekuHlaleni”.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ga Tšhatha ya AU ka Mehola le Metheo ya go Hlongwa ga Makala, Pušoselegae le Tlhabollo ya ka Nageng gore dumelelwe.
tgt_text: Le nkongolo ibishukuxa imiba efana nokwenza izicwangciso eziphambili kwezolimo zisebenzele abalimi basekuhlaleni; iziseko zophuhliso ezizinzileyo zokutya okulinywa ekuhlaleni; ukwenza imo yendalo nokusingqongileyo kwendawo kukwazi ukugcina imveliso yokutya okuveliswa ekuhlaleni nakwixesha elizayo, kunye nokomeleza amandla abavelisi bokutya ukuze bakwazi ukuqhubeka nemveliso elinywe ekuhlaleni.

src_text: Afrika Borwa saenetše tšhatha ye ka Phato.
tgt_text: Ekubekeni phambili ukufumaneka kokutya, iKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuphehlelelwa kweziko lesizwe lezoKhuseleko lwendalo i-National Biosecurity Hub, ngaphantsi kwenkqubo ye-Agricultural Bio-economy Innovation Partnership Programme, okuyinkqubo yeSebe lezeNzululwazi kunye nokuSungulwa Kwezinto eyenziwe ngentsebenziswano neYunivesithi yasePitoli.

Eli ziko liza kuxhasa uthintelo, ukuncitshiswa kunye nolawulo lwezifo zezityalo nezilwanyana, nto leyo eza kuba negalelo elihle ekwandeni kwemveliso, ukufumaneka kokutya kunye nophuhliso oluzinzileyo lwasemaphandleni   Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Tšhatha ye ya go Hlongwa ga Makala fana ka tlhako go mebušo ka moka ye lego maloko ka sengwalwa sa tlhahlo ka khuetšo ya go hlongwa ga makala le mehola ya ona go tloga mmušong wa bosetšhaba go ya didikong tše dingwe tša mmušo.
tgt_text: Ukuqinisekiswa koMqulu wokuNabisa amaGunya weManyano ye-Afrika (i-AU).

src_text: Tšhatha ye swaragane kudu le phatlalatšo ya taolo le mehola, tlhako ya pušo le tlhabollo ya ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente koMqulu we-AU oqulathe iMithetho-siseko yokuNatyiswa Kwamagunya, uLawulo lweeNgingqi kunye noPhuhliso lwaseKhaya.

src_text: Khansele ya bo-32 ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Polokego ya Ditimela (IRSC).
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika utyikitye lo mqulu kweyeThupha kowama-..   UMqulu wokuNabisa amaGunya ubonelela ngoxwebhu olusisikhokelo kuwo onke amazwe angamalungu e-AU, esi sikhokelo simalunga nokunatyiswa kwamagunya nemisebenzi yabasemagunyeni ukusuka kuzwelonke ukuya nakwamanye amanqanaba karhulumente.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga Kopano ya bo-32 ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya IRSC gola Johannesburg go thoma ka la 1 go fihla ka la 6 Diphalane 2023 ka fase ga morero wo: “Phetošo ya sebopego sa ditimela mo Lefaseng leo go sa tsebjego tša kamoso”.
tgt_text: Lo mqulu ujongene kakhulu nokwaba amagunya nemisebenzi, isikhokelo solawulo lwengingqi kunye nophuhliso lwengingqi.

src_text: IRSC ke foramo ya boditšhabatšhaba ya go kopantšha mmogo ditsebi tša polokego ya ditimela go tšwa lefaseng ka bophara go fana maitemogelo go kaonafatša polokego ya ditimela..   Bjalo ka leloko la IRSC, Kemedi ya Afrika Borwa ya Polokego ya Ditimela swere foramo ye la mafelelo ka.
tgt_text: IBhunga  Lentlanganiso Yamazwe Ngamazwe yoKhuseleko kumzila kaloliwe ebanjwa rhoqo ngoNyaka yama-32  (i-IRSC).

src_text: Seakanywa sa Leano la Bosetšhaba sa Mananeokgoparara 2050 (NIP 2050) Kgato ya.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukusingathwa kweNtlanganiso ebanjwa rhoqo ngonyaka ye-IRSC yama-32 ezakubanjwa eRhawutini ukusuka ngomhla woku-1 ukuya kowesi-6 kweyeDwarha 2023 phantsi komxholo othi: “Ukubunjwa ngokutsha koololiwe kwiHlabathi elingenakuqinisekiswa”.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše phatlalatšo kuranteng ya mmušo ya Kgato ya Bobedi ya seakanywa sa NIP sa 2050 gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona.
tgt_text: I-IRSC liqonga lamazwe ngamazwe elidibanisa iingcali zokhuseleko koololiwe ezivela kwihlabathi liphela ukuze zitshintshiselane ngamava ngeenjongo zokuphucula ukhuseleko lukaloliwe.

src_text: Leano le le fa tlhahlo matlafatšong le kaonafatšong ya diprotšeke tše logetšwego maano tša mmušo tša mohlakanelwa..   Seakanywa se se hlaola diprotšeke tše logetšwego maano madulong batho; mohlagase wa mmasepala; meetse; dilahlwa tše thata; dinamelwa tša banamedi; thuto le mananeokgoparara maphelo; mananeokgoparara titšithale, le bosenyi le bomenetša.
tgt_text: Njengelungu le-IRSC, uMlawuli woKhuseleko kuLoliwe waseMzantsi Afrika ugqibele ukusingatha le ndibano ngo-.

src_text: Sebopego sa leano le se fana ka ponelopele ya fao go swanetšego go fiwa šedi, se fana ka phetleko ya seemo sa bjale, se hlatholla dipeelano tše bohlokwa tša go atlega le go bolela gore go swanetše gore go dirwe eng go fihlelela ponelopele ye.
tgt_text: UYilo lwesiCwangciso seSizwe seZiseko zoPhuhliso sowama-2050 (i-NIP 2050) iSigaba sesi-.

src_text: Se šišinya tshepedišo ya phethagatšo ye swanetšego go latelwa mo leanong la magato la go gagaba tekano ya mengwaga ye meraro.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa koyilo lwe-NIP 2050 iSigaba sesi-2  kwiphephandaba likarhulumente ukuze nalo uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Tlhako ya Phethagatšo ya Bosetšhaba ya go Fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso sinika umkhombandlela ekomelezeni nasekwandiseni iiprojekthi ezihlangeneyo zeqhinga likarhulumente.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Tlhako ya Phethagatšo ya Bosetšhaba ya go fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Ichonga iiprojekthi ezicwangcisiweyo zokuhlaliswa koluntu; umbane kamasipala; amanzi; inkunkuma nelindle; izithuthi zabakhweli; iziseko zamaziko emfundo nezempilo; iziseko ezingundoqo zobuchwephesha, ulwaphulo-mthetho norhwaphilizo.

src_text: Tlhako ye phatlaladitšwe ka 2021 gore setšhaba se ntšhe sa mafahleng sona..   Tlhako ye fana ka maikokotlelo mahlano mo magatong go hloma bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Ubume besicwangciso bucacisa ngombono wenkalo ekufuneka kujongwane nayo, bunikezela ngovavanyo lwemeko yangoku, buchaza iimeko eziyimfuneko ukuze kubekho impumelelo kwaye buchaza ekufuneka kwenziwe ukufezekisa umbono lowo.

src_text: Metheo ye ya boikokotlelo akaretša kgoketšo ya pele tsena le tlhokolo mo Ditirelong tša Mmušo; kgakolo le tlwaetšo; thulaganyo le taolo ya bodiragatši; thuto ye tšwelagopele, kgatelopele ya kgetho ya mošomo le ditiragalo tša mabapi le kgetho ya mošomo.
tgt_text: INkqubo-sikhokelo yeSizwe yokuPhumeza uBungcali beNkonzo kaRhulumente.

src_text: Diphetogo ka Gare ga Dipeelano tša Mošomo tša Balaodipharephare (di-DG).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume iNkqubo-sikhokelo yeSizwe yokuPhumeza uBungcali beNkonzo  kaRhulumente.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše pego ya go šišinya magato go matlafatša mabokgoni le bokgoni bja Balaodipharephare (di-DG) Ditirelong tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Le nkqubo-sikhokelo yapapashwa ngowama-2021 ukuze kuboniswane noluntu..   Esi sicwangciso-nkqubo sibonelela ngeentsika ezintlanu ezizama ukungenelela ngoncedo lokwenza iNkonzo kaRhulumente ibe nobungcali.

src_text: Pego ye dirile ditšhišinyo tše mmalwa, go akaretšwa le paka ya ka kantorong ya di-DG le taolo ya baromiwa ka Lekgotlaphethiši go bahlankedi ba taolo..   Pego ye šišintše gape le gore Molaodipharephare Kantorong ya Mopresidente tla neelwa Hlogo ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Ezi ntsika zibandakanya ukuhlolwa nokuchongwa kwangaphambi kokungena emsebenzini komntu osele ekwiNkonzo kaRhulumente; uqeqesho loqhelaniso nomsebenzi; ucwangciso nolawulo lwentsebenzo; ukuqhubeka nemfundo kunye nophuhliso lobungcali, kunye nenkqubela phambili yekhondo lomsebenzi kunye nokujonga iimeko zamakhondo emisebenzi.

src_text: Kua diprofenseng, mošomo wo tla neelwa Balaodipharephare dikantorong tša Ditonakgolo.
tgt_text: Utshintsho kwiimeko zengqesho kuBalawuli-Jikelele (ii-DG).

src_text: Pego ye šišintše gape le magato go hlahla dikgoro ka taolo ya dikontraka le Balaodipharephare.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyamkele ingxelo ephakamisa amanyathelo okomeleza amandla kunye nokukwazi ukusebenza kwabo bakwisihlalo sika-DG kwiNkonzo kaRhulumente.

src_text: Peakanyo ye Fetlekilwego ya Taolo ya Bodiragatši go Balaodipharephare gare ya fetlekwa gore gate ka mošito tee le diphetogo tšeo di dumeletšwego.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yenze izindululo ezininzi, kubandakanywa ixesha lokulawula lee-DG kunye nendlela elandelwa ngayo imiyalelo yamaLungu esiGqeba soLawulo  ngamagosa aphendulayo.

src_text: Tona ya Motšwaoswere ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo, Ntate Thulas Nxesi tlare mo bekeng ye tlago sware kopano ya tshedimošetšo ya babegaditaba go hlatholla Tlhako ya Bosetšhaba ya Phethagatšo go fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo le gape go hlatholla gabotse diphetogo tše dumeletšwego dipeelanong tša go thwalwa ga Balaodipharephare.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ikwandulule ukuba i-DG kwi-Ofisi kaMongameli yonyulwe njengeNtloko yoLawulo Lwemisebenzi kaRhulumente.

src_text: Pego ya Bohlano ya Mošomo ka Phethagatšo ya Sengwalwa sa Makgoraditsela ka Ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole (WPRPD) 2020-.
tgt_text: Kwinqanaba lamaphondo, lo msebenzi uza kunikwa ii-DG kwii-ofisi zeeNkulumbuso.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Pego ya Bohlano ya Mošomo ka phethagatšo ya WPRPD, yeo fanago ka seemo sa bjale ka phethagatšo ya WPRPD.
tgt_text: Ingxelo iphinde yaphakamisa amanyathelo okukhokela amasebe kulawulo lwezivumelwano zengqesho zee-DG.

src_text: Pego ye akaretša le ditshwayotshwayo go tšwa dikgorong tša mmušo tša bosetšhaba le tša profense fana ka seemo sa bjale ka phethagatšo ya pholisi ye akaretšago diriparipana tša ditekanyetšokabo..   Pego ya mathomo ya seemo sa mošomo ya ngwaga ka ngwaga phatlaladitšwe ka.
tgt_text: Inkqubo ehlaziyiweyo yoLawulo lweNtsebenzo yee-DG iyahlaziywa ukuze ihambelane nolu tshintsho lwenziweyo.

src_text: Pego ye ya bohlano dumeletšwe go gatišwa kuranteng ya mmušo le go phatlalatšwa ke Kgoro ya Basadi, Baswa le Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa oBambeleyo wezaBasebenzi bakaRhulumente noLawulo, uMnu Thulas Nxesi, kule veki izayo uza kubiza intlanganiso noonondaba ukuze achaze iNkqubo-sikhokelo yeSizwe yokuPhunyezwa kobuNgcali beNkonzo kaRhulumente kunye nokucacisa utshintsho oluvunyiweyo kwiimeko zengqesho yee-DG.

src_text: Phetošo ya Athikele ya 20(1) ya Kopano ya Phedišo ya Mehuta ka Moka ya Kgethollo Kgahlanong le Basadi (CEDAW).
tgt_text: Ingxelo yesihlanu yeNkqubela-phambili engokuphunyezwa kwePhepha leNgcaciso yoMgaqo-nkqubo waMalungelo Abantu abaPhila nokuKhubazeka (i-WPRPD) yama-2020-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Phetošo ya Athikele 20(1) ya CEDAW gore dumelelwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyivumile ingxelo yesihlanu yeNkqubela-phambili engokuphunyezwa kwePhepha leNgcaciso yoMgaqo-nkqubo waMalungelo Abantu abaPhila nokuKhubazeka (i-WPRPD), ibonelela ngohlaziyo lokuphunyezwa kwe-WPRPD.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di fana ka nako ye teletšana ya dikopano tša komiti tša go lebelela dipego tša mebušo ye lego maloko.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ibandakanya amagalelo avela kumasebe kazwelonke nawephondo.

src_text: Afrika Borwa saenetše kwano ye ka 1993 le go dumelela moragonyana ga fao ka Manthole.
tgt_text: Ikwanika ingxelo ngomiliselo lomgaqo-nkqubo olubandakanya ulwabiwo lohlahlo-mali.

src_text: Tlhagišo ye Palamenteng šetšane le go tsamaiša ka mošito tee kwano ye dumeletšwego kua morago gotee le phetošo ya Athikele 20(1) ya kwano ye.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yokuqala yenkqubela-phambili eye inikezwe rhoqo ngonyaka yapapashwa ngowama-.

src_text: Kwano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Kamogelo ya Mangwalo Thuto Mabapi le Thuto ya Godingwana.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo yesihlanu yenkqubela-phambili ivunyiwe ukuba ifakwe kwigazethi ize ipapashwe liSebe labaseTyhini, uLutsha kunye naBantu abaKhubazekileyo.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Kwano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Kamogelo ya Mangwalo Thuto mabapi le Thuto ya Godingwana gore dumelelwe.
tgt_text: Ukulungiswa kweSiqendu sama-20(1) seSivumelwano sokuPheliswa Kwazo Zonke iiNtlobo zoCalucalulo Olujoliswe kwabaseTyhini (i-CEDAW).

src_text: Ge šetše dumeletšwe tla romelwa Mokgatlong wa Ditšhabakopano (UN) wa Thuto, Saenthefiki le tša Setšo le go kgontšhwa go šoma ka mo nageng ka Molao wa Bosetšhaba wa Tlhako ya Mangwalo Thuto, 2008 (Molao 67 wa 2008).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente kwesilungiso seSiqendu sama-20(1) se-CEDAW ukuze samkelwe yiPalamente.

src_text: Kwano ye ya Lefase ka Bophara hloma metheo ya motlalanaga ya temogo ya go se tšee lehlakore le ya go se kgetholle ya mangwalo thuto ya godingwana le mangwalo thuto ka kakaretšo dumelela temogo ya mangwalo thuto dinagašele mo mebušo ye 193 ye lego maloko UN.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo zibonelela ngexesha elongezelelweyo leentlanganiso zekomiti ejonga iingxelo zamazwe angamalungu.

src_text: Kgogelomorago ya Diphetošo tša Tlhahli ya Maloko Komitiphethiši.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika wasityikitya esi sivumelwano ngowe-1993 waza emva koko wasiphumeza kweyoMnga ngowama-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše kwalakwatšo ye kwalakwaditšwego ke Kantoro ya Mopresidente ka Mošupologo, 17 Diphalane 2022 go gogelamorago diphetošo tšeo di dirilwego go Tlhahli ya Maloko Komitiphethiši, yeo bitšwago Pukukgakollo ya Ditona, ya..   Diphetošo tše di dirilwego ka Moranang 2022 di fane ka thekgo ya tlaleletšo go tše dingwe tša dikantoro tša Ditona tšeo di rwelego maikarabelo lefapha la go feta le tee.
tgt_text: Ukungeniswa kwesi silungiso ePalamente kujonge ukulungelelanisa isivumelwano esamkelwa ngaphambili kunye nolungiso kwiSiqendu sama-20(1) sesivumelwano.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di be di nyaka gore Mmušo rwale maikarabelo ka botlalo disenyegelo tša go amana le kabo ya mohlagase le meetse madulong semmušo go dulwa ke maloko komitiphethiši..   Kabinete lemogile dipelaelo tšeo di hlagišitšwego ke maloko setšhaba ebile tšeere sephetho sa go sekaseka Tlhahli ya Maloko Komitiphethiši.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano seHlabathi sokwaMkelwa kweziQinisekiso zeMfundo ePhakamileyo.

src_text: Tshepedišo ye šogašogwa ke setheo sa go se tšee lehlakore ebile ge fihlile mafelelong, tlhahli ye tlo phatlalatšwa setšhabeng ka wepsaete ye ya Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo: www.dpsa.gov.za.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukungeniswa ePalamente kwesiVumelwano seHlabathi soKwamkelwa kweziQinisekiso eziphathelene neMfundo ePhakamileyo ukuze siqinisekiswe yiPalamente.

src_text: Kgwerano Diphetogong tša Enetši tša go se Tšee Lehlakore (JETP) le Leano la Dipeeletšo la JETP (JETP-IP).
tgt_text: Sakuba sivunyiwe siza kuthunyelwa kuMbutho wezeMfundo, ezeNzululwazi neNkcubeko weZizwe eziManyeneyo  (i-UNESCO) emva koko unikwe amandla okusebenza ngokoMthetho weli lizwe weNkqubo-sikhokelo kaZwelonke yeziQinisekiso, wowama-2008 (uMthetho wama-67 wama-2008).

src_text: Ka morago ga go amogela tlhagišo ka JETP le JETP-IP, Kabinete thekgile ka atla pedi ETP-IP le go laetša ka fao kgotsofetšego ka gona ka mošomo wa go tsenelela wo dirilwego go kaonafatša..   JETP-IP hlatholla dipeeletšo tšeo di nyakegago go fihlelela maikgafo go fediša khabone ao dirilwego ke Mmušo wa Afrika Borwa mola ka go le lengwe go hlohleletšwa tlhabollo ya go swarelela nako ye teletšana, le go netefatša gore go fihlelelwa diphetogo tša go se tšee lehlakore go bašomedi bao ba amegago le setšhaba..   Komiti ya Magareng ga Ditona ka Phetogo ya Klaemete tlare go se goye kae ya swara tshedimošetšo le babegaditaba go fana ka tshedimošo ka botlalo   Melaokakanywa.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano sehlabathi sisungula imigaqo-jikelele yemfundo enobulungisa, eselubala nengenamkhethe kwiziqinisekiso zemfundo ephakamileyo.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wa 2022 wa Dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi.
tgt_text: Esi sivumelwano senzelwe ukukwamkelwa kweziqinisekiso zemfundo zamazwe angaphandle kumazwe angamalungu e-UN ali-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Molaokakanywa wa 2022 wa Dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi gore lebelelwe goya pele.
tgt_text: Ukurhoxiswa kwezilungiso kwiSikhokelo saMalungu eSigqeba esiPhezulu.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo mpshafatša Molao wa Dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi wa go ba le mengwaga ye 70 ka bogolo, 1951 (Molao 57 wa 1951).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isivumile isibhengezo esenziwe yi-Ofisi kaMongameli ngoMvulo, umhla we-17 kweyeDwarha 2022 sokurhoxisa izihlomelo ezenziwe kwiSikhokelo saMalungu esiGqeba esiLawulayo, esikwabizwa ngokuba yiNcwadana yabaPhathiswa, yowama-..   Izihlomelo ezenziwe ngenyanga kaTshazimpuzi kowama-2022 ziphakamise ukuba kongezwe inani labasebenzi kwezinye zee-ofisi zabaPhathiswa abaphethe amasebe amaninzi.

src_text: Ge šetše dumeletšwe, Molaokakanywa wo tlo fana ka tlhako ya semolao ya dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi go laola magatokamano dikepe.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo zikwafuna ukuba uRhulumente ahlawule zonke iindleko  ezinxulumene nombane namanzi kwiindawo zikarhulumente ezihlala amalungu esigqeba.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo, magareng ga tše dingwe tla laola tlhamo, boingwadišo, go rea maina le go ntšhwa ga dikepe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iziqaphele iinkxalabo eziphakanyiswe luluntu yaze yagqiba ekubeni iphonononge iSikhokelo saMalungu esiGqeba soLawulo.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di tlo ba le seabe tsošološong ya lefapha la dinamelwa tša mabopong le go tsamaiša naga ye ka mošito tee le Kwano ya Mokgatlo wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa tša Mabopo.
tgt_text: Le nkqubo iza kusingathwa liqela elingathathi cala kwaye emva kokuba igqityiwe, esi sikhokelo siza kwenziwa esidlangalaleni ngewebhusayithi yeSebe lezaBasebenzi bakaRhulumente kunye noLawulo:  www.dpsa.gov.za.

src_text: Afrika Borwa dumeletše kwano ye.
tgt_text: Intsebenziswano Kutshintsho Nobulungisa Kwezamandla (i-JETP) kunye neSicwangciso soTyalo-mali lwe-JETP (i-JETP-IP).

src_text: Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2020 wa Dipalopalo.
tgt_text: Emva kokwamkela intetho nge-JETP kunye ne-JETP-IP, iKhabhinethi yamkele i-JETP-IP yaza yavakalisa umbulelo wayo ngomsebenzi oneenkcukacha ezicacileyo owenziweyo wokuyiphuhlisa.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2022 gore lebelelwe goya pele.
tgt_text: I-JETP-IP ichaza utyalo-mali olufunekayo ukuze kuphunyezwe izibophelelo zokungangcolisi umoya ezenziwe nguRhulumente waseMzantsi Afrika ngelixa ekhuthaza uphuhliso oluzinzileyo, kunye nokuqinisekisa utshintsho olunobulungisa kubasebenzi kunye noluntu oluchaphazelekayo.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo šišinya phetošo ya Molao wa Dipalopalo, 1999 (Molao 6 wa 1999).
tgt_text: Kungekudala Ikomiti yabaPhathiswa ejongene noTshintsho lweMozulu iza kubamba indibano noonondaba ukuze inike iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngale nkqubo   Imithetho Esayilwayo.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di fana ka tlhabollo le phethagatšo ya Peakanyo ya Bosetšhaba ya Dipalopalo yeo thekgago diphetho tša go ba le bohlatse..   Di matlafatša tšhomišano ye lego gona magareng ga Dipalopalo tša Afrika Borwa le ditho tše dingwe tša mmušo, ebile di nabiša tlhako ya taolo ya Molao wo   Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.
tgt_text: UMthetho osaYilwayo wokuHanjiswa kweeMveliso zoRhwebo  ngeeNqanawa wango-.

src_text: Samiti ya Bosetšhaba ya Lesolo la Mopresidente ka Dikgwebopotlana, tše Nnyane le tša Magareng (di-SMME) le Dikoporasi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukungeniswa ePalamente koMthetho osaYilwayo wokuHanjiswa kweeMveliso zoRhwebo  ngeeNqanawa wango-2022 ukuze uphicothwe.

src_text: Kgoro ya Tlhabollo ya Dikgwebo tše Nnyane, ka kgwebišano le bakgathatema ba lefapha la praebete tla swara Samiti ya Bosetšhaba ya Lesolo la Mopresidente ka Dikgwebopotlana, tše Nnyane le tša Magareng (di-SMME) le Dikoporasi gola Bryanston, Gauteng go tloga ka la 13 go fihla ka la 15 Dibatsela..   Samiti ye tla kopantšha mmogo bakgathatema ba bohlokwa ba praebete le ba lekala la mmušo ka gare ga peakanyo ya dikgwebo tše nnyane, go rerišana ka go hwetša ditsela tša go šomišana mmogo go matlafatša lefapha le.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho usaYilwayo ungena endaweni yoMthetho wokuHanjiswa kweeMveliso zoRhwebo ngeeNqanawa wowe-1951 (uMthetho 57 wowe-1951), obusele uneminyaka engama-70 uqhuba..   Wakuba uphunyeziwe, lo Mthetho uYilwayo uza kubonelela ngenkqubo-sikhokelo yomthetho wokuthumela intengiso ngeenqanawa ozakulawula ikhonkco lokuthumela iimpahla ngeenqanawa.

src_text: Bakgathatema bao ba letetšwego ba akaretša lekgotla la dikgwebo, ditsebi tša di-SMME, bahlami ba dipholisi le ditheo tša tlhabollo ya ditšhelete.
tgt_text: Iza kulawula, phakathi kwezinye izinto, ukuyilwa, ukubhaliswa, ukuthiywa kwamagama kunye nokuchithwa kweenqanawa.

src_text: Samiti ye tla rerišana le ka Leanolegolo la Bosetšhaba la Mohlakanelwa la Dikgwebo tše Nnyane, leo le fanago ka tlhako ye logetšwego maano ya go matlafatša lefapha la di-SMME.
tgt_text: Olu tshintsho luza kuba negalelo ekuvuseleleni icandelo lezothutho lwaselwandle kunye nokulungelelanisa eli lizwe libe kwizinga leZizwe ngeZizwe loMbutho waseLwandle.

src_text: Samiti ye go letetšwe gape gore tsebagatše Difoka tša Ngwaga ka Ngwaga tša Bosetšhaba tša Mopresidente tša di-SMME.
Go Swarwa ga Samiti ya bo-2022 ya Dikgaruru tša go Ikala ka Bong le Polao ya Basadi.
tgt_text: UMthetho-sihlomelo osaYilwayo weNkcukacha-manani wowama-.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla swara Samiti ya Bobedi ya Mopresidente ya GBVF kua Sentharengkgoparara ya Gallagher gola Gauteng ka la 1 le la 2 Dibatsela.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukungeniswa ePalamente koMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weNkcukacha-manani wowama-2022 ukuze uphicothwe.

src_text: Samiti ya mathomo ye bego swerwe ka 2018 šomišitšwe go itlama ka boswa ga mmušo le bagwebišani ba leago go fediša ditiragalo tše lego godimo tša dikgaruru kgahlanong le basadi ka mo nageng..   Samiti ya bobedi tla šomišwa go sekaseka pele kgatelopele ye fihleletšwego ya Leano la Bosetšhaba le Logetšwego Maano ka GBVF.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uphakamisa isihlomelo kuMthetho weeNkcukacha-manani, wowe-1999 (uMthetho wesi-6 wowe-1999).

src_text: Yona tlo swarwa ka fase ga morero wo: “Boikarabelo, Potlakišo le Tlaleletšo GONA BJALE”..   Samiti ye tla rerišana ka, magareng ga tše dingwe, go hwetša mekgwa ya go potlakiša magato le boikarabelo go tšwa dikgorong tše bohlokwa le bakgathatema ka moka ba go akaretša mekgatlo ye lego setšhabeng, lefapha la praebete le bašomi..   Imbizo ya Bohlano ya Mopresidente kua Kapa Leboa.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo zibonelela ngophuhliso nokusetyenziswa kweNkqubo yeNkcukacha-manani yeSizwe exhasa izigqibo ezisekelwe kwiinkcukacha ezinobungqina.

src_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Mmotlolo wa Bohlano wa Tlhabollo ya Dilete (DDM) go la Upington, Kapa Leboa tla phethagala ka Labohlano, 21 Diphalane 2022 Lepatlelong la fao la Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs Stadium..   Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya DDM tlo sekaseka kgatelopele ya kabo ya ditirelo le ditlhotlo tša kua Kapa Leboa le go tsena seemo seo ka bogare go rarolla ditlhotlo tšeo.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo ziqinisa ulungelelwaniso olukhoyo phakathi kweziko leeNkcukacha-manani yoMzantsi Afrika (i-Stats SA) kunye namanye amaziko karhulumente, kwaye zandise ubume bolawulo lwalo Mthetho   Imisitho Ezayo.

src_text: DDM netefatša gore thulaganyo ya kabo ya ditirelo, phethagatšo le bolekanyetši ba monwana le lenala go kaonafatša kabo ya ditirelo bathong..   Ka gona go itokišetša Imbizo ye, Ditona, maloko makgotlaphethiši le dimeyara ba tlo tsenela ditiragalo tša go fihlelela setšhaba ka gare ga Upington le go potologa..   Pego ya Pholisi ya Tekanyetšokabo ya Paka ya Magareng (MTBPS).
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela kaMongameli yeSizwe yamaShishini amaNcinci, amaNcinane naPhakathi (ii-SMME) kunye nooKopolotyeni.

src_text: Kabinete dumela gore MTBPS ya 2022 yeo tlo hlagišwago ke Tona ya Ditšhelete Enoch Godongwana ka Laboraro, 26 Diphalane 2022 ke karolo ye bohlokwa ya tshepedišo ya phatlalatša le ya boikarabelo ya bolekanyetši..   MTBPS ke mokgwa wa go phethagatša maikgafo mmušo ntle le go fetiša magomokakaretšo disenyegelo ao mmušo ka kgonang hlatholla goya pele ka fao mmušo tla netefatšago gore disenyegelo ga di fete letseno, le go dira tše ntši ka didirišwa tše lego gona..   Ditlhahlobo tša Marematlou.
tgt_text: ISebe loPhuhliso lwamaShishini amaNcinci, lisebenzisana namahlakani ecandelo labucala, liza kubamba iNgqungquthela kaMongameli yeSizwe yee-SMME  kunye nooKopolotyeni e-Bryanston, e-Gauteng ukususela ngomhla we-13 ukuya kowe-15 kweyeNkanga..

src_text: Ditlhahlobo tša 2022 tša Bosetšhaba tša Mphato wa Marematlou di thoma ka la 31 Diphalane le go fela ka la 7 Manthole.
tgt_text: Le ngqungquthela iza kudibanisa ndawonye abathathi-nxaxheba abaphambili becandelo labucala nelikarhulumente kwikhonkco lamashishini amancinci, ukuze baxoxe ngokufumana iindlela zokusebenzisana ekomelezeni eli candelo.

src_text: Kabinete lakaletša Barutwana ba Marematlou ba 2022 mahlatse le mahlogonolo ge ba le gare ba tsena kgatong ya mafelelofelelo ya leeto la dithuto tša bona.
tgt_text: Abathathi-nxaxheba abalindelekileyo baquka amagumbi orhwebo, iingcali ze-SMME, izifundiswa, abenzi bomgaqo-nkqubo kunye namaziko emali yophuhliso.

src_text: Thekgo ye tšwelagopele go tšwa go barutiši, batswadi le bahlokomedi tla fihla kgole go thuša bona barutwana ba go itebanya le ditlhahlobo tše ka boitshepho..   Kabinete hlohleletša batswadi le bahlokomedi go kgatha tema ya bona ka go hlohleletša le go šušumetša barutwana, le go dira gore go kgonagale gore ba kgone go ithuta ge ba le gae.
tgt_text: Le ngqungquthela iza kuxoxa kwakhona ngeSicwangciso esiDityanisiweyo esiPhambili seSizwe soPhuhliso lwamaShishini amaNcinci, esibonelela ngesicwangciso-nkqubo sobuchule sokomeleza icandelo le-SMME.

src_text: Leanotlhabollo la Bosetšhaba (NDP) le Khonferense ya Mabokgoni Mmušo.
tgt_text: Le ngqungquthela kulindeleke ukuba ibamba umsitho wokuqala wokunikezelwa kwamaWonga oNyaka kaMongameli e-SMME eSizwe..   Ukubanjwa kweNgqungquthela kaMongameli yoBundlobongela obuSekwe kwiSini kunye nokuBulawa kwabaseTyhini (i-GBVF) yama-.

src_text: Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo, ka tšhomišano le Khomišene ya Bosetšhaba ya Dithulaganyo le Sekolo sa Yunibesithi ya KwaZulu-Natal sa Thutotlhabollo tlo swara Khonferense ya NDP le ya Mabokgoni Mmušo go thoma ka la 7 go fihla ka la 9 Dibatsela 2022 Khamphaseng ya Kholetše ya Howard, Yunibesithing ya KwaZulu-Natal..   Khonferense ye tlo lebelela mabokgoni mmušo bodiragatši ka mengwaga ya mathomo ye lesome ya NDP, ebile tlo swarwa ka fase ga morero wo: “Tebeledišišo ya Mabokgoni Mmušo le Bodiragatši bja Mmušo ka mengwaga ya mathomo ye lesome ya NDP”.
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa uza kubamba iNgqungquthela kaMongameli ye-GBVF yesibini kwiZiko leNgqungquthela lase-Gallagher e-Gauteng ngomhla woku-1 nowe-2 kweyeNkanga.

src_text: Neelano ya Sethikifikeithi sa go Amogela Kgoši Misuzulu KaZwelithini Bjalo ka Kgoši.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela yokuqala eyayibanjwe ngowama-2018 yasetyenziselwa ukubophelela ngokutsha urhulumente namahlakani ezentlalo ukuba azibophelele ekupheliseni iziganeko ezikwiqondo eliphezulu zobundlobongela obujoliswe kwabasetyhini kweli lizwe.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla neelana ka Sethifikeithi sa go Amogela Kgoši Misuzulu KaZwelithini bjalo ka Kgoši Lepatlelong la Moses Mabhida go la Durban ka Mokibelo, 29 Diphalane.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela yesibini iza kusetyenziselwa ukujonga inkqubela esele yenziweyo ekuphunyezweni kweSicwangciso-qhinga seSizwe kwi-GBVF.
Iza kubanjwa phantsi komxholo othi: “Ukuphendula; Ukukhawulezisa kunye noKwandiswa NGOKU”.

src_text: Se se latela moletlo wa setšo wa go hlomamiša kgoši wa go bitšwa “Ukungena eSibayeni” wa yena Kgošikgolo wo bego swerwe ka la 20 Phato 2022, fao go ona hlomamišitšwego bjalo ka kgoši ya Setšhaba sa MaZulu   Melaetša.
tgt_text: Le ngqungquthela iza kuxoxa, phakathi kweminye imiba, ukufumana iindlela zokukhawulezisa iintshukumo zokungenelela kunye nokuphendula kwamasebe aphambili kunye nabo bonke abachaphazelekayo ababandakanya uluntu, icandelo labucala kunye nabasebenzi.

src_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebiša ditebogišo tša yona le go lakaletša bao ba latelago mahlatse: Ntate Sam Matekane, Tonakgolo ya Mmušo wa Lesotho.
tgt_text: Imbizo kaMongameli yesihlanu yaseMntla Koloni.

src_text: Kabinete bile le Baromiwa ba AU ba Bahlokomedi ba Dikgetho Dikgethong tša Kgothakgothe tša Bosetšhaba Pušong ya Lesotho ge ba be ba reta peakanyo ye buditšwego ya dikgetho ya sepolotiki ya Batho ba Pušo ya Lesotho ge ba swere dikgetho tše atlegilego.
tgt_text: IMbizo kaMongameli yoPhuhliso lweSithili yeSihlanu (i-DDM) iza kuqhutywa ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-21 kweyeDwarha 2022 kwiBala Lemidlalo lasekuhlaleni i-Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs, e-Upington, eMntla Koloni..   Imbizo kaMongameli ye-DDM iza kuvavanya inkqubela phambili esele yenziwe yonikezelo lweenkonzo nemingeni ekhona eMntla Koloni ngeenzame zokungenelela ngezisombululo.

src_text: Afrika Borwa santše ikgafetše go maatlafatša le go boelanya dikamano tša magareng ga dinaga gotee le go kaonafatša tšhomišano mererong ya selete, ya kontinente le ya lefase ka bophara ya go tsenelana.
tgt_text: I-DDM iqinisekisa ukuba ucwangciso lonikezelo lweenkonzo, ukuphunyezwa kunye nohlahlo lwabiwo-mali ziyadityaniswa ukuze kuphuculwe unikezelo lweenkonzo eluntwini.

src_text: Mahloko Kabinete lebiša mahloko yona go ba lapa le bagwera ba: Ntate Albert Nolan (88), Moruti wa Boikgafo wa Kereke ya Afrika Borwa ya Khatholiki yo bego sa dumelelane le mebono ya sedumedi ya go hlohleletša le go šireletša peakanyo ya mmušo wa kgethollo.
tgt_text: Ngaphambi lwale  Mbizo, abaPhathiswa, amalungu amabhunga esigqeba kunye noosodolophu baza kuqalisa imisebenzi yokufikelela eluntwini lwase-Upington nakwiindawo eziyingqongileyo.

src_text: Ka 2003, Mopresidente wa nako yeo Thabo Mbeki mo file Sefoka sa Luthuli sa Silibere ka boikgafo bja gagwe bja bophelo ka moka phenkgišanong ya temokrasi, ditokelo tša botho le toka le go se kwane le ditlwaedi tša sedumedi kudukudu tšeo di fahlelago ka mabaka go bea gabotse le go šireletša mmušo wa kgethollo   Bao ba Thwetšwego Mešomong.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yoMgaqo-nkqubo woHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali lweXesha eliPhakathi (i-MTBPS).

src_text: Batho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona thuto tlo kgonthišišwa ka tsela ye maleba   Moadbokheiti James Mlawu – Molaodipharephare: Kgoro ya Dinamelwa   Ntate Shabeer Khan – Mmaledipharephare: Matlotlo Bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikholelwa ukuba i-MTBPS yowama-2022 eza kuthiwa thaca nguMphathiswa wezeziMali u-Enoch Godongwana ngoLwesithathu, umhla wama-26 kweyeDwarha 2022 yinxalenye ebalulekileyo yenkqubo yohlahlo lwabiwo-mali oluvulelekileyo nolukwathatha uxanduva loMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete kwanetše go thwalwa ga bao ba latelago:.
tgt_text: I-MTBPS inika isiseko kwizibophelelo zikarhulumente ezikwinqanaba lenkcitho  elikwaziyo ukufikeleleka esizweni.

src_text: Maloko Boto ya Afrika Borwa ya tša Boeti   Ngaka Nondumiso Maphazi (Modulasetulo)   Ngaka Aubrey Mhlongo (Motlatša Modulasetulo)   Mme Pretty Ntombela   Mme Nomahlubi Mazwai   Ntate Odwa Mtati   Ntate Ravi Nadasen thwetšwe leboelela)   Ntate Enver Duminy thwetšwe leboelela)   Mme Nandipha Mzileni Mbulawa   Ntate Mduduzi Zakwe thwetšwe leboelela)   Mme Rosemary Anderson   Mme Lehlohonolo Rapodile; lel.
tgt_text: Iqhubeka inika iinkcukacha ngendlela urhulumente aza kuwuvala ngayo umsantsa ophakathi kwengeniso nenkcitho, aze asebenzise kangangoko kwimithombo yobutyebi ekhoyo elizweni.

src_text: Mme Nonkqubela Silulwane (Moemedi wa Kgoro).
tgt_text: IiMviwo zeMatriki.

src_text: Maloko Boto ya Lekoko la Taolo ya Sephethephethe Mebileng   Ngaka Eddie Mogalefi Thebe thwetšwe leboelela)   Mme Thandi Clara Thankge thwetšwe leboelela)   Moprofesara Maredi Mphahlele   Mme Nomusa Mufamadi (Modulasetulo)   Moadbokheiti Xola Stemela   Mme Lerato Magalo   Moprofesara Chitja Twala   Ntate Nkumeleni John Kudzingana   Mme Jaxa (Moleloko wa Tlaleletšo); le   Mme HM Mbanyele-Ntshinga (Moleloko wa Tlaleletšo).
tgt_text: Iimviwo zowama-2022 zeSatifikethi seMatriki sikaZwelonke ziqala ngomhla wama-31 kweyeDwarha zize ziphele ngomhla wesi-7 kweyoMnga.

src_text: Ntate Tshepo Monaheng – Mohlankediphethišimogolwane (CEO): Khamphani ya Kagodithokgwa ya Afrika Borwa (Kontraka ya gagwe mpshafaditšwe tekano ya mengwaga ye meraro).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inqwenelela abafundi beMatrikgi boonyaka wama-2022 okuhle kodwa njengoko bekwibanga lokuqqibela esikolweni.

src_text: Ntate Reginald Lavhelesani Demana – CEO: Kemedi ya Afrika Borwa ya Bosetšhaba ya Ditsela..   Mme Ditebogo Kgomo – CEO: Molekanyetši wa Bosetšhaba wa Nyuklea.
tgt_text: Inkxaso engagungqiyo esuka kootitshala, abazali nabagcini babantwana iza kuba nceda kakhulu aba bafundi ukuba bajongane nezi mviwo ngokuzithemba.

src_text: Ntate Risenga Maluleka – Radipalopalopharephare (Kontraka mpshafaditšwe).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoza abazali kunye nabagcini babantwana ukuba badlale indima yabo ngokukhuthaza abafundi, nokudala imeko efanelekileyo yokufundela ekhaya.

src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Issues in the environment.

src_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).
tgt_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.

src_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..
tgt_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..

src_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..
tgt_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..

src_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.
tgt_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.

src_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.
tgt_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.

src_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..
tgt_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..

src_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..
tgt_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..

src_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.
tgt_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.

src_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.

src_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.
tgt_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.

src_text: Safety and security .
tgt_text: Safety and security .

src_text: Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS) – which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force – has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.
